objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.

history.p: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).

projectDesc.p: This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

div.head: {@sāraḷā mahābhārata<lb/>madhyaparba<lb/>[dvitīẏa khaṇḍa]@}

lg.l: oṛaśā srakāraṅka yāṁskr̥tiika byāpāca bibhāga<lb/>dvārā prakāśita
1| baḷarāmaṅka hastinā tāṛana o siṁhadvāra batrakaraṇa 613

lg.head: {@sāraḷā mahābhārata<lb/>madhyaparba@}
{@[dvitīẏa khaṇḍa]@}
{@baḷarāmaṅka hastinā tāṛana o siṁhadvāra batrakaraṇa@}
lg.l: śuṇa baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti ye muni
nicaẏe rāsāṁgata muṁ karimi hastinā nabara | 3 |
āmbha bacana śuṇimā hou āgahuṁ kopa kimpe saṁtriṣeṇa | 4 |
śrīhaste lekha lekhi āmbhe dūta baragibā | 5 |
tāḷapatra goṭiẏe āṇi hari karanti lekhana
sura sanakādi bandita | arka bidhu udita | 8 |
trailokya nātha | baḷe baḷabanta | bitrama siṁgha matta | 9 |
rohiṇī garbha sambhūta | aśeṣa koṭi brahmāṇḍa ādhipatya | 10 |
śrī biśva yogeśvara | śrī anādi deba paraṁbrahma īśvara | 11 |
aṁkuśa dharaṇa nīḷāmbara | caturddaśa bhmabana pratagyāṁ prakhara | 12 |
biśvāsī hitasādhaka | samasta śrīaṅga aḷaṁkr̥ti karaka | 13 |
sura manuṣya maryyādārakṣita abhiṣeka | satya sādhaka | 14 |
utapatti sthiti nāśa kāraka | duṣṭa jana nāśaka | 15 |
sudhā gaḷita abhaẏa deba | koṭi kandarpa lābaṇya sarūpa | 16 |
duṣṭa jana nāśana | deba kuḷa rakṣaṇa | 17 |
kadambā moḍaṇa | jarāsandha marddana | durbinda bānara nāśana | 20 |
sūta paurāṇika bidhvaṁsana | praḷambā chāṇura darpa daḷana | 21 |
śāmba gada padmana mahāchatrī paribāra bhuṣaṇa | 24 |
gomanta pabongta giri maṇḍana | br̥ndābana mohana | 25 |
driyodhana chāmuku āgyāṁ śrīmukha | śrīhasta prasāda santaka | 28 |
śāmba kumara tule tohora duhitā candrābatīki gheni | 29 |
naile nauceta dhuśāsana | durjaẏa durbinda jadyaratha karṇṇa | 30 |
nohile tu āsi mora tule samara karibu | 32 |
na jāṇu ki śāmba kumara kāhāra nandana | 34 |
mohora nāma goṭi jāṇīthibu baḷare baḷarāma | 35 |
āho mānagobinda | tohora bāpa sinā andha | 36 |
mohora putraku kimpe ẏeḍe kaṣṭa deuachu | 37 |
putra abhābe tunāśa ye hoiṇa | samasta jana marāiṇa | 38 |
ẏemanta karibi | hastinā nabara laṅgaḷa munare tāḍibi | 39 |
tadyapi mane prate na yiba | muhiṁ aṭai baḷe baḷadeba | 41 |
muda dile candana karpūra miśrita kari dei | 42 |

div.note: baḍabānaḷa samodra | bārānidhi śaṅkhanābhi | bhitare māḍibi |<lb/>to dhuna chaḍāibi | dānta jhāḍibi | māḍi basibi | jibha upāḍibi |<lb/>chāti upare caḍhibi | to rājya jaḷe buḍaibi | bahuta abastā<lb/>karibi | kathā rakhibi | śāmba candrābatīki bibhā karāibi | tebe yāiṁ<lb/>āsibi | (ca)

lg.l: paṭhiāibāku manuṣya anusarai | driyodhanaku dūta baragai | 43 |
āho caitana nārada āge kahanti deba haḷī
ẏehikṣaṇi yāa tumbhe hastinā yura caḷi | 44 |
nicinta hoiṇa se hastinā pure thāu | 45 |
na dile pura tāra kiribi nārakhāra
ẏemanta kahiṇa se ye lekha goṭi dei
śiṇa ho baibasuta manu badanti agasti
nāradaṁku āgare paṭhi āi dvārikāru bāhāra hoile śrīkr̥ṣṇa haḷapati | 48 |
nārade boile ẏethe āsi paḍilā paramāda | 49 |
sabhāre basiṇa ye thile driyodhana bhīṣma droṇe
muniṁkara pāde sabonge kale dibya pūjā
nārada boile tu ho śuṇa kururājā | 52 |
dharma udita hoilā tu ye na māila tāhāku | 55 |
sādhu sādhu pāṇḍabe se tumbhara jībati
sehi se pañchu kaṭake hoibe ādhipati | 56 |
kr̥ṣṇara dulāḷa se ye jambubatīra baḷā
śāmba kumāra nāma tā kr̥ṣṇabarṇṇa kaḷā | 57 |
kautuka kheḍare se harilā tohora dulaṇī
ẏeḍebaḍa dvanda kala tumbhe ta na jāṇi | 58 |
kemanta buddhire ẏebe toara baṁśa rakṣā yiba | 59 |
putra dohitāku gheni yāi pāde karibu praṇāma | 60 |
ẏehā śuṇi kopa kalā mānagobinda catrabratī
sāja sāja samadaṇḍa boli śubhilā ucce bāṇī
dvārikā pura thāṭha āja sabu pakāibā hāṇi | 62 |
ẏebe ratichorara pakāa re muṇḍa kāṭi
ẏemante kopeṇa āgyāṁ dilā rājā dhr̥tirāṣṭi | 63 |
nārade boile tu ho śuṇa kurunātha
mānagobinda boilā muni he dekha ẏehikṣaṇi
nicaẏe prāṇatyāja ho karibi kāhnu saṁtriṣeṇa
de rakṣā kariba ratichorara muṇḍa puṇa | 66 |
dhuśāsanaku boilā āṇa śāmba kumaraku dhari
āna prāẏe bujhi muhiṁ thili heḷā karu | 67 |
ẏe mohora bhmabane paśi lagālalā kāḷi
ẏeḍe garaba hoilā harilā mohora dulāḷī | 68 |
aśi sahasra yoddhā se gheniṇa kumāra dhuśāsana
śāmba kumaraku beḍhanteṇa pāṇḍaba pañcha bhāi
ye yāhāra śahasra dhari ḍākanti tuhāi | 70 |
pañchu pāṇḍabe beḍhi kari karante raṇagoḷa
pacchima mūrati se ye dvārikāra thāṭha
prabeśa hoile yāi hastinā pura nikaṭa | 72 |
āho caitana nārade miḷile yāiṁ rāmakr̥ṣṇaṁaka pāśe
bege āsa boli kope dhāiṁle haḷadhārī | 74 |
bhīma arjuna tule se samara apramiti | 78 |
nārade kahile yāiṁ śuṇa ho baḷarāma
pāṇḍabaṁkara tule kaurobe hāde aneka sāṁgrāma | 79 |
haḷamune tāḍibi muṁ hastinā nāme purī | 80 |
puṇa puṇa pratagyāṁ se karanti haḷadhārī | 81 |
tetiśa koṭi debe kampile sargapure thāi | 83 |
trailokya kampila ye baḷarāmaṁkara śuṇi siṁgharaḍi
samarthaka laṅgaḷa ye haḷa mūṣaḷa pāṇi
kope prajvaḷita rāma ye jīmūta megha jāṇi | 87 |
pūbong digare rahile pāṇḍabe śāmba kumaraku gheni | 89 |
agnire paḍile yehne pataṅge na bratanti puṇi | 91 |
rāmakr̥ṣṇaṁku yāiṁ śānti kara ho samaste | 92 |
bābu re trailokya kampuacchi baḷarāmaṁka raḍughoṣa | 93 |
bābu tāāra putra saṅge dohitāku gheni
āmbhanta dekhiṇa se kopa karibe śānti
madhura bacana śuṇi se hoila kopa ati
gadā konta nārāja gheniṇa khaḍaga phaḷā
ẏeka prahāra karante āreka hvanti āga
ugrasena ra upare gadā nei piṭi | 103 |
āja ye hastinā kaṭaka pakāibi tāḍi
ẏete boli deba haḷa mūṣaḷa kare dhari

div.note: madhura bacana śuṇi se hoilā kopamūrtti | (ṅa, ḍha, ṇa, ca, ṭha)
tini bhmabana kampilā kamoile samarāṣṭra murāṭa | (ña, ca)

lg.l: kiñchita mātrake tāhā dhaile haḷa agre
rakha rakha svāmī boli ḍākanti degaloke | 115 |
trāse paḷāile ye sura siddha muni | 117 |

div.note: mahā biśvamūrtti bikaśile teja kari | (ka, tha)
śaẏe pañchabiṁśa yojana ye hastinā rājyasthaḷī<lb/>haḷa mūṣaḷe achanti baḷarāme toḷi | (bahapāṭha)

lg.l: sehimati diśai ye hastinā rājya goṭi | 121 |
tini bhmabana madhye ye heucchi ulukāpāta
dekhṇa bhaẏe kale bhīṣma droṇa senapati | 124 |
haḷa agre thāiṇa samaste dyanti ḍāka
bho deba kāmapāḷa svāmī hastinā bāre matra rakha | 125 |
na śuṇanti kaurobaṁka binaẏa tusti bāṇī
dakṣiṇābrateka kari bulānti pabana ghāta jāṇi | 126 |
ambikāra nandana gaḷāre koṭhāra ye dantare tiraṇa lagāi
dhuśāsana durjaẏe mūḷe aneśvata bhāi gheni
tu deba anādi ye saṁsāra prasiddhi
tu pratakṣe nirañjana tu pratakṣe nirākāra
mānaba mātrake tote ke dkariba gocar | 131 |
ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍa yāhāku tiḷamandā prāẏe | 132 |
kiñchita mātrake hastinā dahilu deba toḷi
tumbhe se baḷabhadra ati baḷe baḷī | 133 |

div.note: ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍa yāhāku tiḷapuṣpa praẏe | (ka, gha, ṭha, ḍha)

lg.l: tuhi deba jaḷa sthaḷa anādi debatā
pāda nakha kone yāra brahmāṇḍa koṭi thitā | 134 |
pr̥thī nābhikhaṇḍa pātāḷa pāda ākāśa yāra śira
ẏe saṁsāra sāgaraku mukati gati arthe
nija kāẏā dekhāila svāmī kāraṇa nimante | 136 |
śūnyaku ākāra deba to tahuṁ āna nāhiṁ | 138 |
aneka tusti se ye karanti bedabrahmā
ke āna kariba deba tohora mahiṁmā | 139 |
ẏe sacarācaraku deba tuhi se ẏeka stambha
svāmī āumāne cañchaḷa tuhi ẏekā dambha | 141 |
tuhi se pr̥thibīki ye karu ẏekā bhoga
tohora kopa kale ki rahiba madhyasarga | 142 |
kehu brahmā kehu biṣṇu kehu maheśvara
jyeṣṭha nāma gṭi tora saburi upara | 143 |
kāhum utapati hoilu nātha tote na jāṇanti kehi
nirākāra puruṣa tu tora kuḷa gotra nāhiṁ | 145 |
tuhi se ānara kopa karu deba śānti
tohora kopa kale ki rahiba basumatī | 146 |
tu deba dānaba ye nara nāga lokakaiṁ
na jāṇi saṁsāre deba heuchanti baṇā
to tahuṁ pr̥thīki āne nāhimṭi dhāraṇā | 148 |
śānti nuhanti ye rāma śāmba kumarara śoke | 149 |
āho caitana debaloke karante yahuṁ tusti
āmbhe rāsāṅgata hoilu tohora acchi ye aprīti | 150 |
bho kāmapāḷa ye kara deba rakṣā
yābata kāḷaku deba rahilā tora kakṣā | 152 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka chāmure kaha tu bege yāiṁ | 153 |
ẏe pañchurājya prāpata ye hoiba tāhāṁku | 154 |
kāli se pañchu kaṭake hoibe ādhipati
āsana tejiṇa ye uṭhile pañchu bhrāthe
se rāma kāḷasarpa tumbhe se khageśvaa
dekhi kopa śānti ye hoiba tāhāra | 161 |
bābu tumbhanta dekhi se baḷarāma karibe kopa śānti
kare kuṭhāra ye dante tiraṇa gheni
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya aśastamā śakuni | 164 |

div.note: “nāradaṁka bacane pāṇḍabe uṭhile taḍati” pāṭha pare ‘ja’<lb/>pothire pāṭha–
driyodhana bhīṣma droṇa aśastamā śalya karṇṇakaiṁ rāi
ābara pātra mantrī driyodhana aṭhāṇoi bhāi
ẏekā ṭhāba kariṇa se basāi samastaṁku
bichāra kari bābu ẏebe kahani āmbhaṁku |
ye tumbhara cittaku ye āsai boile |
yujheṣṭhi boile āmbha manaku āsibaṭa yāhā
āmbhe kale na puṇa nāsti kara tumbhe tāhā |
yāhā tumbhe kahiba se āmbhara sammatai |
yujheṣṭhi boile śāmba kumar acandrābatīki āmbhe gheni
śāmba candrābatī dui jaṇa, saṅge gheni
karanti tusti aśastamā śalya karṇṇa bhīṣma droṇa |
hātha yoḍi kari ḍaka dianti upare
śarana rakha boli ḍāka śubhilā uccare |

lg.l: śaraṇa śabada goṭi ye śubhilā ghora bāṇī
rakha rakha kopa chāḍa he haḷapāṇi | 166 |
pr̥thī na sahai ye tohora kopa bharā
ẏe saṁsāra sāgaraku tahi se naukā
samasta niśodhana tuhi se karu ẏekā | 168 |
tumbhara kopa kale ki rahiba hastinā
ẏe saṁsāraku dhāraṇā uruṣa tuhi sinā | 170 |
śikhe rahi kari bahuta tusti kari
uddhari dhara baḷarāma boli chāḍiel dīrgha raḍi 171 |
svāmī kṣaṇaka biśra ma karibā heu ẏethe | 172 |
śaraṇa rakṣaṇa nātha tumbha nāma goṭi | 174 |
muhiṁ na jāṇaiṁ deba śāmba kumara boli
stirīchora boli muṁ aneka dukha deli | 176 |
tu deba mohora ye doṣa kṣamā karibā
muṁ ye satya kariacchi hastinā samodra pakāibi boli | 178 |
gobinde boile svāmī hastinā samodre pakāile
pāṇḍabe pāñche achanti ye sohodrāra tule | 1790 |
śāmba kumara tule samaste yibe nāśa
gāndhārī pua doṣe kimpe āmbha putra heba nāśa | 180 |
nija thāne thoa hastināra kisa doṣa
āmbahra sañchilā deba sinā ẏehu basurī
āmbhe nāśa yibā ki śatr̥ra doṣuṁ kari | 184 |
tāhāra doṣe nāśa yiba se yugate
kopa śānti karibā deba saburi dekhante | 185 |
aneka pārthanā ye binaẏa bhābe boli
ẏemāne samaste aneka binaẏa bhagati bhāba | 187 |
agāda gabhīra jāṇi diśai hastinā bhmabana | 190 |
prabeśa hile hastinā bhumi mumi ṭhāba | 191 |

div.head: {@kaṭambāsura upākhyāna@}

lg.l: śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badanti agasti
tahuṁ siṁghadvāra batra kale deba haḷahastā | 2 |
siṁghadvāra biṁkā kathā pucchilu mora kati | 3 |
tora āge kahilu hastinā siṁghadvāra batrabhāba | 4 |
kahiba mahāmuni mote śāmba candrābatī bibhā | 5 |
tu ye pucchākalu bibhara yisa rīti | 6 |
tu deba ho yogeśvara puruṣa uttamā
daśa doṣa aprādha karibā mora kṣamā | 10 |
aprādha kṣamā mora kara ho haḷapati | 11 |
kanyā goṭi deiṇa muṁ hoili samarpi
aprābhañjana svāmī mote daẏā karibā adyāpi | 12 |
gobinde boile ho chāḍilu sabong doṣa
ẏe pañchu rājyara tu ho hoibu catrabratī
ubhaẏa kuḷa madhye rahiba tohora kīrati | 15 |
biṣṇura carita śuṇi pāpa karasi dahana | 16 |
āho caitana baḷarāmaṁaka agrate kakahile acyute
sātukīki boile dvārikāku yāa tu bahane | 19 |
śubha yoge āsi bheṭilu putra śāma
prabodha hoile samaste sātukī bacana śuṇi | 22 |
śubha yoge bheṭa pāile putra śāma | 23 |
śuṇa āho caitana hastināẏe kale maṅgaḷa bidhi
bibhā hoibe chāla dekhibā kr̥ṣṇara nandana | 28 |
brāhmaṇe kahile baraṇa bidhi āṇa ho bahana | 29 |
bidhi pūbongmate bibhāre yete drabya lāgai
hātha yoḍaṇa beḷe loḍile kāhiṁki na pāi | 30 |
kaṭambā āṇa boli boile byāsa taponidhi | 31 |
sāṁsārika bebhāre yeteka drabya bidhi gheni | 32 |
tāhāra na thile puṇa nohai ye bibhā
byāse kahile tumbhe śuṇa ho maharāẏe
yujheṣṭhi boile ẏe baḍāi sandeha kathaẏe | 36 |
mānagobinda boilā ẏe jāṇi ta nuāci
kaṭambā āsana boli somapāḷa latā ye kari | 37 |
kaṭambāsura kathā śuṇa ho lakṣe rājāmāne | 38 |
madhu saṁbatsara boli ẏekai satya yuge
kañchana boli brahmā basanti yaśobantī nāme sarge | 39 |

div.note: ṭa pothire “kaṭambā āṇa boli boile byāsa taponidhi”<lb/>pādānta pare baibāhika sāmagrīra barṇṇana acchi |
madhuparka = madhu, dadhi, ghr̥ta, śarkarā, jaḷa ehi pāñchadrabya miśrita<lb/>khādya bā naibedya biśeṣa |
kaṭambā = bedi upare byabahr̥ta masiṇā, paruḍi masiṇā |

lg.l: ẏe brahmāra bhāriyā nāma aṭai sābitrī
se sarasvatīki pachārile kañchana nāme brahmā
tu āẏi dhabaḷāṅgī go kāhāra hoibu bāmā | 41 |
kāhāku pradāna tote karibā re bāḷī
debatāgaṇa madhye ke to manara hiāḷi | 42 |
sarasvatī boile pitā ho tr̥ṣṇa abatāre
sehi kr̥ṣṇa nicaẏe aṭai mohora bare | 43 |
dohitāra bacana śuṇi santoṣa hele brahmā
meru sabhā karāi basile tahim mahātamā | 44 |
nāradaṁku chāhiṁ boile kañchana nāme brahmā
sakaḷa debatānta bari āṇa ho mahātamā | 45 |
indra bije kale meru sabhāra madhye
sehi ye prabeśa hele meru pr̥ṣṭha sthāna | 49 |
bāsukī bije kale saṅge gheni aṣṭakuḷā nāganta | 52 |
dohitā gheni bije kañchana nāme brahmā
kare arghya gheni ye pārijāteka māḷi
karpūra kuṁkuma kastūrī dile hari hr̥da taṭe | 60 |
deba sabhāku chāhiṁṇa brahmā kahanti uttara
binoẏī bhāba hoi yoḍiṇa beni kara | 62 |
mohora dohitā nāma goṭi aṭai sarasvatī
debe boile yemanta āgyāṁ tora pitā

div.note: kare arghya gheni ye amaḷāna ratnamāḷi | (ka, tha, kha)

lg.l: tu yebe pradāna ho karibu kumārī
yehne tohora āgyāṁ bañchita ke pāri | 67 |
barabeśa hoi kr̥ṣṇa bsile bedira upara | 69 |
bibhā cahaḷe ye śubhilā beda bāṇī
meru thāne thāi tāhā kaṭambāsura śuṇi | 70 |
koke deśa boli śāmadīrgha nāme pura
kisa śabada goṭiẏe śubhilā re bābā | 73 |
mantrī boilā śuṇa ho dānaba śirimaṇi
ẏesanaka akthāku bichāra kara tu datyamaṇi | 76 |
boilu kemanta se ye tāhāṁkara kathā
āji se māribi muhiṁ samasta debatā | 77 |
āre āre boli dilā garu ḍāka
tule nāhiṁ tāra ratha gaja saini
luhāra lahaḍi ẏeka kare acchi gheni | 80 |
śūnyeṇa śubhilā ye asura śabada garuḍāka
biṣnuṁ āgyāṁ dile raha raha debatāẏe | 86 |
muhiṁ na jāṇaiṁ ẏethi ẏeḍe baḍa datya acchi
pātāḷagāmī muhiṁ tumbhe mote kimpāi na pucchi | 88 |
āṇṭa kari pakānte caraṇa rudhira bahai mora mukhe
kāhāra āgare kahibi mohora yete mana dukhe | 90 |
yāiṁṇa prabeśa hoilā meru sarga lage | 91 |
re re kāra kariṇa asura ḍāka dei
byāghra piṭhire basi se gadābara bulāi | 92 |
boile sabhāku na uṭha re asura rahithāa sehiṭhāra | 93 |

div.note: āgahuṁ na jāṇai ho tumbhe mote ta na puccchi (ṭha)
muhiṁ pātāḷagāmī hoili na puccchi | (aneka pothi pāṭha)

lg.l: ẏehā śuṇi kope asura karai pahija
raha raha boli asuraku pāḍile bāmakara | 96 |
śrīkare śūḷa gheniṇa deba ye kāpāḷī
śūḷa paḍante dānaba pātilā bāma hātha
puṇi daita ẏeka śakati bulāi kopa kalā
pratagyāṁ kari dānaba bolai tote ke kariba rakṣā | 102 |
dīrgha raḍi chāḍai sabhāku uṭhante danuja
pabanahuṁ khara kari datya dhailā bāma hāthe | 104 |
bāma pāda nei indra upare prahāri
bhmaja dhari indraku phiṅgidilā asura tatakṣaṇānti | 106 |
kuberaku dehi asura māilā bajra muthe
keśa dhari tāhāku antarīkṣe dilāka sehu phiṅgi | 110 |
pr̥thī debī na sahai pādara garu bhārā | 112 |
kañchana brahmāra koḷe bijaẏe kariachanti sarasvatī
dhyāna kale brahmā ye nārāẏaṇa dile dekhā | 114 |
āhānika sāri āsanti puṣyeke bije kari
brahmāra chāmuku bije karuchanti deba daitāri | 115 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta muna badanti agasti
yebaṇa kr̥tya kala dānaba duṣṭa mati | 116 |
brahmāṁkara chāmure miḷila aneka bhrachanā boli
mohe paḍi pitā ḍākanti he kr̥ṣṇa kara trāhi trāhi | 118 |

div.note: meru sabhāre bije asura mahābīra | (ja, ka, ṇa)
kañchana nāme brahmāra koḷe sarsvatī<lb/>nārāẏaṇ aāgare basiṇa achanti | (dha, ña, ṅa, tha, gha, jha)
padmadvāpe achai nārāẏaṇaṁka pādujā<lb/>dhyāẏe kale nārāẏaṇa kr̥ṣṇa dile dekhā | (dha, ña, ṅa, tha, gha, jha)

lg.l: kaṭambā asura bolai tora ẏeḍeka bharasā
bāḷakāḷahuṁ ẏe kanyāku muṁ kariacchi āśā | 119 |
mote chāḍi kari kr̥ṣṇaṁku kalu bibhā
kāhiṁ acchi rakhu ẏebe āsi dekhibā bāsudebā | 120 |
aneka kāḷara br̥ddha tu aneka sarjanā kari | 121 |
ẏete boli koḷuṁ kanyā ghenilā sarasvatī
kākhe basāi kanyā datya hoilā śūnyagati | 122 |
leuṭi āsante kr̥ṣṇa bheṭile śākalya dvīpa | 123 |
sarasvatī ḍāka dile ho kr̥ṣṇa muṁ tohora bhārikṣā
mote kaṭambā asura baḷe neucchi ho debarājā | 124 |
se tohora patnī tāhāku dānaba neuacchi 125 |
asura uparaku muṭhi kari māileka khara | 127 |
kaṭambā asura bolai tu deba daitāri
asurabaḷa nisūdana tu deba dānaba antakārī | 128 |
āja paḍilu tu mohora chāmure tora yibāku bāṭa nāhiṁ
yatane yāhāku loḍuthili dekhili tāhāku muhiṁ | 129 |
ẏeteka boli dānaba pabanuṁ khara bege
kaumodakī gadā kare bulāi deba hari

div.note: aneka kāḷara br̥ddha tu dānaba antakārī | (gha, ḍha, jha, ca)

lg.l: dekhiṇa danaba tahiṁ pātilā bāma hātha
kr̥ṣṇara karu gadā gheni galā se turita | 132 |
sehi gadā gheni tahuṁ leuṭāi piṭi
bāma aṅga pātiṇa śrīkr̥ṣṇa tāhā meṣṭi | 133 |
dui bhmaje dhaile se durbhāra kauṇopa | 137 |
daita aṅga paḍi pabongta hoilāka dhūḷi | 138 |
praśaṁsā karanti dhanya dhanya re danuja | 139 |
ẏehāra deha lāgi biṁjhagiri hoilā masiguṇḍā | 140 |
puṇi dui pāda dhari bulāi antarīkṣe
ki jāṇi asura deha abheda bajrasehnā
kr̥ṣṇa praśaṁsā karanti dānaba sādhu sādhu
datya kuḷe janama hoi ke abā tote nindu | 143 |
asura kuḷe jāta tora mahimā agocara | 144 |
debātāmāne pache na thāntu sarga bhmabi | 145 |
svāmī debatā brahmaṇa ruṣi nāśi ẏe hoilā pr̥thīki mahābhārā
kr̥ṣṇa bile ẏe na marai mohora hāthe
mote bhagati hoi ẏe bahuta kalā pūjā | 149 |
nirāśa hoi yahuṁ sebā kalā mote
muhiṁ boili bara māga re dānabā
se boilā tumbhara samāne mora āẏuṣ ahoibā | 151 |
bhale boili mohora āẏuṣa heu re dānaba | 153 |
nārāẏaṇ aboile ẏe brahmāra aṭe baḷā
tumbhara bara pāicchi nāśa ẏe na yāu | 156 |

div.note: “tumbhara bara pāicchi nāśa ẏe na yāu” ẏehi pāda pare<lb/>‘ja’ pothira adhika pāṭha–
sarasvatīṁki gheni basa ẏehāra upare bibhākāḷe |
yesaneke bibhāra ye bidhāna sandeha | abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre–

lg.l: brahmāṁku āgyām dei kanya gheni kr̥ṣṇa bije kale | 157
teṇu kari kaṭambā boli bidita tini pure | 158 |
se dinu kaṭambā āsanaṭi bibhāra bidhāne | 159 |
moha teji uṭhile sabong ye yāhāra icchā | 162 |
sarasvatīṁki bibhā kale amr̥ta yoga beḷe
dohitā gheni basile brahmā kaṭambā bakṣasthaḷe | 163 |

div.note: bibhāyoga beḷe muhiṁ chāri yuge thibik |
brahmāẏe boile tu ye bara māgiachu
ẏe āmbhara bara tote hou sādhu sādhu |
ẏe chāri yugare kanyā pradānara beḷe

lg.l: pitāẏe māḍi basibe kanyā thiba koḷe |
lg.note: ẏebe asura pākarma tora hoiba niruna

div.note: ẏe rūpe ẏe kathā chāri yugaku rahilā |
brahmāra bacane asuraku rakṣā kale murāri
biṣṇunāthaṁku brahmāẏe ye bibhā karibe kumārī |

lg.l: ohokuḷa gotra ye uccāri deba debā
śubha yoge nārāẏaṇa sarasvatīṁki hoileka bibhā | 165 |
byāse boile tu ho śuṇa dharmarāẏe
kaṭambāsura kathā bibhābeḷe ẏemanta ye hoẏe | 167 |
yābata kāḷaku kathā rahilā pr̥thibī madhyasvarge | 168 |
āho budha janamāne ẏehā sañchapi śuṇibā | 169 |
śrī mahābhāratha ẏe amr̥ta rasa bāṇī
jība thibāyāẏe ẏethaku mana dia praṇī | 171 |
muhiṁ ye jaḷīkāḷa darpa dhaṁsibā nimante
janme janme sebā mora sarasvatīṁka padmapāẏe
badanti sāroḷā dāsa sabongmaṅgaḷā pāde binaẏe | 173 |
āho caitana śrīkr̥ṣṇa sarasvatīṁka bibhā antareṇa kathā

div.head: {@candrābatī bibāha@}

lg.l: śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badanti agasti
bibhāyoga beḷe kaṭambā māḍi basile kurupati | 1 |
aneka dāna dile ye aneka āhuti
gāgraba muni kale deśa kāḷa pātra bākye
yadu kuḷe jāta śāmba ye kumara
kuśa bandhana kale bara kanyāṁka hāthe | 9 |
kusuma burṣṭi bara knyāṁka upare ye kari | 10 |
driyodhana kare purohite dile nei kari | 11 |
prathame pāṇi chāḍi dohitā dilu dāna
ẏebe dakṣiṇā dia ho rājā driyodhana | 13 |
puṇa dāna dilā nabaratna śuddha subarṇṇai
batsā sahite dilā sahasre dhenu gāī | 15 |
saṁkalpa uccāri dilā dui sahasra gaja chāri sahasra haẏe
āu kete dile se ke kariba lekhana | 17 |
yautuka dei rājā hoila binaẏa mati
daśa doṣa aprādha kṣamā karibā haḷapati | 18 |
agyāna mateṇa muṁ kalaiṁ yebaṇa droha
mahālakṣmī yāhāra bhāriyā sarasvatī yāhāṁku ārādhi
tāhāṁku yautuka debāku ki mohora sampraddhi | 20 |
bho deba nārāẏaṇa mote karibā kāraṇa
kanyā goṭi deiṇa muṁ paśili śaraṇa | 21 |
kahuṁ aśr̥jaḷa bahai ānande beni ākhi | 22 |
kanyāku samarpi rāẏe caḷile nija pure
bara kanyā basaile nei ẏekai āsanare | 23 |
agni debatara bārakai badana sapata jibhyā | 25 |
āẏuṣa barddhamāna hoai ye baḍhai santati | 26 |
homa kale puṇa ye yathā śāhāsra mate
ghr̥ta pāraṇā kale bara kanyā yugate | 27 |
ẏe bidhimate helā para ye āpaṇā | 28 |
ghr̥a pāraṇā kari bara kanyā antapure paśi
śubheṇa prapata tote hou ye santati | 30 |
maṅgaḷa gīta gāi huḷahuḷi dile bāḷī
śire arghya dile jaẏe maṅgaḷa toḷi | 32 |
arghya dei sabong śubhe gale ye kāmenī
jaẏe jaẏe śabada śubhilā maṅgaḷa dhuni | 33 |
amr̥ta rasa paka supaṁku drabya annamāna
amr̥ta rasa pāka supaṁka drabya annamāna
ẏekā patre bara kanyā karanti bhojana | 35 |
huḷahuḷi saṅge śubhai jaẏa jaẏa dhuni | 36 |
aneka niśāṇa ḍhola ghana ghana bāje
aśva gaja rājā ye yeteka dileṭi badhāi
kr̥ṣṇaku samādhanā karanti pāṇḍaba pāñcha bhāi | 38 |
tumbhe mora pañchabhuta ātmā aṭa pāṇḍabe
bara kanyā sannidhye maṅgaḷa gīta gāi | 40 |
ratha gaja aśva sājanti aneka pādānti
lāgilā jagahuḷā dibasa prāẏe diśilāka rāti | 42 |
sāta bhaṇḍāra dile rājā candrābatīra tule
bara kanyāṁku gheni deba dvārikāku bije
bara kanyā yānte dekhinti sabong bāḷī
bolanti dhanya dhanya go debī candrābatī
aṣṭa pāṭabongśī se ye dvārikā upamā | 51 |
kautuke nāṭa muni ye karanti nārade | 52 |
lg.note: bara kanyānti bandāpanā ye karanti sabong bāḷī
dekhanti bara kanyā ye manaa hiāḷi | (ja)

lg.l: ghare ghare bara kanyānta arghya ye bandāi | 53 |
bmañjai kumara sānanda hoiṇa pañchu bhute
abheda ātmā tahiṁ ye baḍhilā pīrati
kumara kumārī ye manare śānti hvanti | 56 |
yahiṁ paḍuacchi dhāḍi kāma ye debara | 57 |
lambita mukutā jharā jhaṭakanti ratna maṇi | 59 |
bara kanyā ẏeka āsaneṇa kale ubhā
candra rohiṇī praẏe diśanti beni śobhā | 65 |
ucchaba baḍhila bhitaraku gale kumara kumārī | 68 |
aneka haraṣa mana huanti huanti kaurobe
ẏeka āreka matta hoi na maṇanti kicchi bhaẏe | 70 |
ẏekara upare āreka niuḍi ye dhūḷi | 73 |
ẏe keuṇa carita muni tumbhe jāṇiṭi ki | 75 |
byāse boile ho śuṇa tu basudeba
pāpa puṇya āsi miḷanti ẏeka ṭhāba 76 |
saṁsāra kathā ẏehā kehi na jāṇai | 77 |
puṇya hoilā ye puṇa bibhāra yugate
nānādi beśa beśana hoile ye pañchudibasa pariyante | 78 |
kāḷe pāpa puṇya kariba nāhiṁki bādhā | 79 |
se dehe paḍilā dhūḷi karddana goṭāẏe | 80 |
pāpa puṇya duheṁ ye hoile airi sari
debatāmāne ye ẏehā nuārile anta kari | 81 |
ẏekā putre bibhā kari ucchaba kale jagabandanā | 82 |
māẏā moha saṁsāra ẏe hoilā mote baṇā
biṣṇu bitrake mohora mana anya gatiki na yāu | 84 |
badanti sāroḷā dāse saṁsāra jana hite | 89 |
ẏehā śuṇiṇa baibasuta manu ye boilā
putrabadhr̥ dekhi ye kaḍakā chāḍile tāhānta | 91 |
lg.note: ihaloka paraloka sadāi abhyāse | (ña, ka, tha, ja)
putrabadhu dekhi ye kopa chāḍile tāhānta | (ña, tha, ṅa)

lg.l: ẏethu anantare kisa hoilā muni deba | 92 |
badanti agasti tu pucchā kalu yāhā
tumbhe pucchila ye hastinā siṁghadvārara prastāba
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa śīkr̥ṣṇa caraṇe sebanti | 95 |
namaste sāroḷā mā go jaṅkhera pura bāsī
prasanne bara dāẏinī draśane dukha dhaṁsi | 96 |
karbā kāraṇa mā go debā sadabuddhi | 97 |
śrī sarasvatī debī go biṣṇura pāṭarāṇī
sapata svara bīṇāẏe susvare gāẏana kalu
koṭi koṭi praḷaẏa ye nimiṣake kari | 100 |
yahuṁ se prasanna hoile śrīcaṇḍī sāroḷā
teṇu sapata sāheraku kari loḍai bheḷā | 103 |
koṭiẏe yuga basi se anta na pāile
tumbhe ye pucchā kala binaẏa bhagate
kahibā biṣṇu purāṇa saṁsāru taribā nimante | 2 |
ye abā śuṇanti hoiṇa ẏeka citte | 4 |
ẏekamane śuṇa ho śrī mahābhāratha kathā | 6 |
śoṇita pura boli baitaraṇī nadī tīre
baḷīra ccumara se mahādebaṁku sebi pāilā bara
yuge yuge amara se sahasre tāra kara | 8 |
yuge yuge ajāmbara tāa bhaẏaṁkara rūpa | 9 |
lg.note: tu ye pachārilu surekha janma carita
se kathā kahibā śuṇa tu ho bilaṁka nr̥pa nātha | (ja)
“yuge yuge ajāmbara tāra bhaẏaṁkara rūpa” pare ‘ja’ pothire–
ẏeka mana hoi śuṇa tu bilaṁka nr̥pati |
prathama bhāriyā nāma tāra uttalā aṭai
tāhāra garbhe yāiṇa jāta helā se tanaẏi |

lg.l: koṭiẏe pābongtī rūpaku pārai se jiṇi | 10 |
suku mārī sundarī se mohai jagata
baba nāme karaṇa ye śubha nāme yoga
kumbha saṁtrantiki ye bāiśi dina bhoga | 13 |
dibasa bhoga yāiṁ raẏaṇī hoilāka arddha | 14 |
ẏemanta samaẏeṇa se jāta hoilā kumārī
teṇu kari rājā tāra uṣā nāma diẏe | 16 |
dinuṁdina kumārī ye baḍhai ānu āna
śukaḷa pakṣe yehne udita hoẏe jahna | 17 |
madana pasarā jāṇī diśai beni kuca ābhā | 18 |
naẏana nīḷa utpaḷa nāsā tiḷa phula

lg.note: “kumbha saṁtrāntiki ye bāiśi dina bhoga” pare ‘ja’ pothira pāṭha
ẏete yoga gheni jāta helā se dulaṇī
sundara sukumāra dekhi tāra piara jananī
uṣā boliṇa nāma ye tāhāra dile puṇi |

lg.l: karṇṇeṇa ratna kāpa guru śutra gañje | 24 |
bāhe ratna cuḍi nānā maṇī dhāpa | 25 |
aṅguṣṭhi mudrikā diśe sūryya jyoti sama | 26 |
nāna jāti kusuma se toḷe manaicchā
pūjai sadāśiba bara māgai mana bāñcchā | 29 |
bhr̥ṅga dhuni śuṇi camakai tāra tanu
puna puṇa basana se pheḍai sarāge
cadnrakaḷā sumari ye rati icchā kari

lg.note: nānā paribandha manare sumari | (gha, ña, ṅa, ṭha)

lg.l: ati kaṣṭe bañchilā se dibasa raẏaṇī | 45 |
upare dei hātha chāṭu bacana bhāṣi | 47 |
cakṣu maḷi chāhiṁlā bāḷī palaṁka uparaku
na dehi darāṇḍiṇa na pāilā tāhāku | 49 |
hā prāṇaṇanātha boli ucce rāba dilā
abhinaba puruṣe mo pāśe thilā ẏehikṣaṇi | 53 |
adhara cumbiṇa more bahu chāṭu kalā | 55 |
āgo sakhī saceta hoi kaha mote
tini pure thile niceṁ āṇī debi tote | 58 |
nohasi agyāna go cetā hoi kaha
tu sakhī mohore go karasi sadaẏe | 60 |
tu yebe aṭu go mo prāṇara mitaṇī
svapane dekhili sakhī go yeuṁṇa mūrati
se mohora jāṇa niceṁ aṭe pati | 62 |
tāhāra bihune mo na sarai dina
sehi se aṭai sakhī mohora jībana | 63 |
muhiṁ se anāsta sakhī kara go kāraṇa | 65 |
ātmā baikulya mora tora kaṣṭa dekhi | 66 |
ye tohora icchā āṇidebaiṁ muṁ tāhā
ẏe se citrapaṭa sakhī nirekhiṇa chāhāṁ | 68 |
ẏe se sakhī indra debatāṁka rājā
ẏeka ẏeka kari kahilā sabuṁkari nāma | 72 |
rati māhātmāṇī aṭai ẏehāra nija māta | 81 |
koṭiẏe īśvara pūjile ẏehāku na pāi | 82 |
ẏehi se sakhī re puruṣaṁka sāra
dhanya jībana sakhī re aṭai tohora | 83 |
mohore daẏā yebe acchi tora puṇi | 84 |
bege āṇi sakhī dia ẏehu pati
ẏehāra bitrake āne na beḷe mora mati | 85 |
nohile sakhī āre na rakhai śarīra
ke āṇi deba mote puruṣa ratna sāra | 86 |
ẏe kaṣṭaru sakhī go rakṣākara mote | 87 |
mohora āsibā yāẏe dhauryya hoi thāa
āja raẏaṇīre āṇīmi go kandarpa pua | 90 |
raẏaṇī arddha samaẏe prabeśa dvārābatī pura | 91 |
citta udabega ye mana channa channa | 93 |
dibya kautuka ye na rucai manaku
kṣaṇake saceta kṣaṇake nidrā māḍai naẏana | 96 |
mantra sumari palaṁka śire ghenilā taḍati | 97 |

lg.note: “kṣaṇake saceta kṣaṇake nidrā māḍai naẏana” pare<lb/>‘ja’ pothire pāṭha |
nr̥tyaraṅga karante arddha hoilā ye niśi
haṁsulī tuḷī teji se palaṁke śutilā | (ja)

lg.l: ājahuṁ jāṇa sakhī muṁ tohora parichārī | 102 |
candramā pāśare ki āreka candra uiṁ | 103 |
nidrā teji kumara cakṣu maḷī dekhi | 104 |
ẏe se deba aṭai śoṇita nāme pura | 106 |
ẏehāra nandanī uṣā ẏe chāmure tora rahe | 107 |
sādr̥śe bara nāhiṁ hoi nahiṁ bibhā | 108 |
ke tumbhara mātā ke tumbhara pitā
tumbhanta dekhi baśa hoilā ẏe rājāra dohitā | 110 |
lg.note: “cakite kumaramaṇi caudige chāhiṁ” pare<lb/>‘ja’ pothire pāṭha :–
kemante aili ẏe bhmabanaku muhiṁ ẏekā
kemante aili ẏe bhmabanaku muhiṁ ẏekā |
kimbhūta māẏā ẏeta puṇa jaṇā ye na galā |
lg.l: kebaṇa nāma tumbhara kāhāra koḷe jāta
ki kāryye āsi ẏethe hoila upagata | 111 |
kumara boilā dvārikā aṭai āmbhara pura
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka putra padmana aṭai mohora piara | 112 |
tumbhe kimpā bhaẏa ẏethe paucha manaku | 113 |
ẏehā śuṇi citrarekhā bolai tumbhara rūpa dekhi
kumara boilā dhanya dhanya ājara dina
kebaṇa tīrthe abā kalaiṁ kebaṇa puṇya | 116 |
ẏete boli ye palaṁkaru uṭhilā dhātikāre
kanya bhmaja dhari nei basāilā jānure | 118 |
lg.note: na jāṇaiṁ kemanta prakāre muṁ aili ẏethaku | (ja)
“bidhātā ghaṭasūtra kariacchi ẏehā” pare ‘ja’ pathire pāṭha :–
ẏehā śaṇi kumara ye haraṣa citta helā
śuṇa go sundarī ! tumbhe mohori batana
muṁ ta sabhābe aṭai bāḷuta kumara |
ẏe gupata kathāmāna go abaśya phiṭiba
ẏe kathā bichāri mote kaha prāṇasahī | abaśiṣṭāṁśa para pr̥ṣṭhāre–

lg.l: se beni janaṁkara utsuka dekhi mati
ṭerā pāḍi citrarekhā antara helā dhāti | 120 |
birahe beni jane turpta kale manabāñcchā | 121 |
bibidha binode ye beni jane toṣa | 122 |
gupata pīrati ye na jāṇanti kehi

lg.note: tumbhe yebe niceṁ śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka nāti pradyumna nandana |
tumbhakaiṁ ki kariba ẏe asura chāra kisa
rāmakr̥ṣṇa kopa kale saṁpoḍe yiba nāśa |
ẏe kathā chāḍa tumbhe kicchi na bichāra
haraṣa hoiṇa mora sakhīki bhogya kara |
nityakarma sāriṇa prabeśa śubhrakeśī | (ṅa, gha, ṭha, ca, ḍha)

lg.l: kanyāra pura dekhi khoji āsa yāiṁ | 129 |
tumbhe bujhi āsani dekhi tahiṁra bāratā | 130 |
se ṭhābaku śubhilā beni janaṁkara uttara | 133 |
paśā kheḷuchanti bhitare beni jane paśi
ḍagara kahibā kathā atai deba sata
trodheṇa asura ye garjai ghana ghana | 137 |
boilā nr̥pati tu re kāhāra kumara
yamara ghareku dhāraṇā paḍilu re tuhi | 144 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ prajvaḷita asura kuḷa rāẏe
dekhiṇa kumara ye tabada hoi chāheṁ | 142 |
kopeṇa daanba ye māiḷā bajra muthe
aṅga ḍhāḷi dei se bañchāilā turite | 143 |
dekhiṇa asura ye dhanu ādhāna kari
hāboḍa śareka ye binddhalā bege ṭāṇi | 145 |
dekhiṇa kumara ye peṣilā tīkha śara

lg.note: deba śasra ādhāna kalā asura bīramaṇi |
puṇi atreṣi asura pārthiba śara binddhalā
puṇi troṇu kāḍhi asura kuhukā śara peṣi
sūryyābrata śasra kari tāhā kumara bināśi |
aniryāpa samara kalā asura kumarara saṅge
lg.l: bimukha hoi ahi śara kare dhailāka bege |

div.note: dhanure basāi mantra sumari peṣi dilā
ahi śasraku pratiśasra kumara kari nuarilā |
yahuṁ ahi śaraku tahiṁ pesilā nr̥pati
caḷilāka śahasra tahuṁ hoiṇa pabana gati |

lg.l: caḷilā asra ye apbanahuṁ khara gati | 150 |
dekhilā nāgaphāśa bandhane kumaraku bānddha cchi mahābaḷī | 153 |
āhā praṇanatha mote ẏekā kari gala chāḍi
mohora bikaḷa dekhi kehne dhariacha deha
caṇḍāḷa piara mora kalāka ẏeḍe karma
sukumāra sundara mohana mukha dekhi kari
kemante sata baḷilā prāṇe galā māri | 161 |
bābu daibare tu kalusi mote ẏehā
jāṇili tora pāṣāṇuṁ niṣṭhura ye hiẏā | 162 |
agni āropaṇa kara tu muṁ paśibi bahana | 163 |
kebeheṁ na marai go ẏe tohora pati | 164 |
bege se āsibe ye pāile bārata | 165 |
tāhāṁkara trodhe sakhī nr̥pati nāśa yāẏe | 166 |
uṣā boilā ke kahiba tāṁku yāi
marantu piara pache rakhantu mora sāīṁ | 167 |
na robara sundarī mohora bola kara
tāhāṁka āsibā yāẏe rakhithāa yatna kari
patiṁ dehi patiṁ dehi boliṇa boilā | 173 |
droṇamegha br̥ṣṭi prāẏe naẏanaruṁ nīra paḍai gaḷiṇa | 174 |
ẏete kahi nārada muni kaleka gabana
mana pabana daṇḍe caḍhiyāiṁ miḷile dvārikā bhmabana | 175 |
muniṁka caraṇe se ye karanti dibyapūjā
bho mahāmuni mote na kara gupata
sandeha tuṭiba ye tumbhara mukhuṁ śuṇi | 179 |
nārade boile ho śuṇa rāmakr̥ṣṇa beni bhāi
abibāita kanyā se pitāra ghare thilā
padmana putra tāra tule pīrati baḍhāilā | 181 |
tāhā jāṇi nr̥pati kalā samara ghora
ahi śareka peṣi putraku bandī kalā bīra | 182 |
karai rodana uṣā svāmīra mukha chāhiṁ | 183 |
agnire paśibe sehu nuja patira nimante
ẏe kathā sarūpe kahilu tumbhara agrate | 184 |
padmanara dehare ye gyāna āu nāhiṁ | 185 |
keteheṁke beḷe se ye sacega hoi uṭhi | 194 |
robai padmana ye putrara nāma dhari
keṇe galu bābu re mote ẏekā kari | 195 |
āhā re putra mora saṁsāra sundara aniruddha
dānabara hāthe tu hoilu prāṇe badha | 197 |
sātabongśa yādabe bege saja kara tuhi | 198 |
tāḷadhvaja ratha mora āṇa saja kari | 199 |
nandighoṣa ratha āṇa bege tu sajāi | 200 |
sāja sāja boli ye paḍilāka ḍāka
ḍhola marddaḷa śaṅkha mahuri ṭamaka bādyamāna | 205 |
dhāmanti bīramāne ẏeku ẏeka āga hoi
tāḷadhvaja ratha ye caḷai ghana ghana
garuḍa gabana tahiṁ karai ati roṣe
grāma pura pāṭaṇā aṭā{??}ḷi jagatī puramāna
ye mukhe paḍai se hoai nidhana | 211 |
bāṇāsura nr̥patira āgare kahile chāra yāiṁ
ẏe tohora rājya ẏebe sambhāḷa gosāīṁ | 213 |
śuṇiṇa nr̥pati āgyāṁ dilā sāja āmbhara saini | 214 |
dvādaśa kṣauṇī baḷa nei ogāḷilā yāiṁ | 215 |
dekhiṇa padmana ye miḷilā tāra āga
chāgaḷa pala dekhi yehne palāśai byāghra | 216 |
trodhe aruṇa barṇṇa ye śrīṣṇara suta
āgabhara hoi padmana dilāka śara chāḍi
tini śata rathī paḍile hāboḍā hāboḍi | 218 |
re re kāra kariṇa ye deba kāmapāḷa
kare bulāi se ye piṭile saunanda mūṣaḷa | 220 |
ẏekā prahārake ye koṭi koṭi māri
koṭi koṭi kari nārāja chāḍi dilā | 225 |
īśvara sebā kari se pāiacchi bara
kāhākuhiṁ bhaẏa nāhiṁ yahuṁ hoicchi amara | 226 |
bāri ta nohilā tahiṁ dibasa raẏaṇī | 227 |
aneka samara ye karanti yahuṁ bīre
kehi kāhāku ocha ye nohanti samare | 228 |
yete śara asure bindhu thile tahiṁ
śuṇa deba śaṁkara gaurā debī sāiṁ | 233 |
baḷe āsiṇa kanyā harilā mora pura | 234 |
kopeṇa ahi śare tāku kalaiṁ bandhana
ajāge paśi mora kaṭaka karai nāśa
teṇu kari deba aili tumbhe pāśa | 236 |
āmbhara bare tu ye hoilu amara | 237 |
kr̥ṣṇara tule ẏebe kara yā samara | 238 |
śuṇi bitrami asura ailā khara bege
sainiṁku boila re paḷāicha dekhi śatr̥ | 242 |
kṣatrī hoi kari re maribāku ḍara
meru giri śikhara abā paḍila ki bhāji | 244 |
kare śūḷa gheniṇa se hoilā āgusāra
samara karai se bhaẏa bhīti chāḍi
muṇḍa pāti asura rāma śara meṇṭi
rakate karddana ye beni janaṁkara aṅga | 250 |
gādā chela catra ye śakati mudugara
aneka juḷujuḷā poka ki uḍai gagana | 252 |
ẏemantara samaẏe ye bije kale hara
ḍibi ḍibi ḍambaru ye bājai susvara | 253 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa jāṇīle ye bijaẏa kaleka āsi hara
bāṇāsura pāiṁ se ye karibe samara | 254 |
puṇa yāi bāma bhmaja upareṇa paḍi
puṇa sudriśena catra dhaile deba kara | 259 |
āmbhara bara debāra ta biartha hoiba | 260 |
ẏete boli śaṁkara śrīkr̥ṣṇa āge miḷi
mohora bare ẏe ta aṭai amara
tumbhe yebe sudriśena dhaila nija kara | 262 |
āmbhanta kemante īśvara kalu ho bāsudeba | 263 |
trodha śānti kara āhe deba catradhara
prasanna hoi kari dia tumbhe bara | 264 |
bho muni agasti mote lāgilā sandehe | 267 |
asura hoi kari pr̥thibīre yete thile
amara hoi kari jaṇeheṁ na rahile | 268 |
catre chedana kiṁpā hoilā tāra kara | 269 |
badaẏanti agasti śuṇi ho manu rājā
bahuta sebā kalā ye baḷira tanujā | 270 |
boile bara māga re asur rājana | 271 |
amara hoilu tu hua sahasra bāhu | 274 |
bara pāi asura ailā nija pura
aneka nr̥pati se jiṇilā kariṇa samara | 275 |
jagata buli asura sādhya kalā mahī | 276 |
śire kara dei se kahai uttara
tohora prasanne deba sahasre kara mora | 278 |
samara kara tu ho pañchai mauḷi | 280 |
ẏehā śuṇi kopeṇa sadāśiba bolanti bacana
kr̥ṣṇa se chedana karibe nā tora kara | 282 |
biṣāde asura āsi miḷilā āpaṇā bhmabana | 283 |
se kaḷara kathā āsi hoilāka ẏebe
catre bhmaja tāra nāśa kaleka bāsudebe | 284 |
sadāśiba prasanne bāṇāsura pāilā chāri kara
rāmakr̥ṣṇa īśvare bije kale bāṇāra nabara | 286 |
bhaẏe paḷāilā se hoiṇa bahuta dūra | 287 |
moha teji uṭhilā se padmana nandana | 288 |
rāmakr̥ṣṇe bije kale sātabongśa yādabanta gheni
nagra pura maṇḍai maṅgaḷa dhuni kari
nagra nara nārī ye kāmadebara saṁjāta
baruṇa pūjā sāri bara kanyā āṇi
koṭiẏeka ratha ye beni koṭi hāthī
chāri koṭi aśva ye daśa koṭi pādānti | 299 |
pāṭa chatra ālamba ye netara supāti
śaraṇa pañjara nātha karibāka mote trāhi | 302 |
kṣamākara doṣa boli karai rājā śoka | 303 |
āmbhara putraku dohitā dilu teṇu doṣa ye na ghenu | 304 |
yuge yute thibu tu amara tanu dhari
tebe se kirati sinā rahiba āmbhari | 306 |
nagra nara nārī ye dekhanti ānanda mane | 307 |
baraku kanyā kanyāku bara ye sādriśi | 308 |
bara kanyāku arghya se dianti kāminī | 310 |
anteśvara puraku bara kanyā gale gheni
ẏeka patre beni jane karanti bhojana
yibāku udabega se subeśa honti tahiṁ | 313 |
nandighoṣa rathe bije kale madana gopāḷa | 314 |
ratnamaẏa rathe ye bara kanyā basi
gaganuṁ candra ki paḍilā pr̥thīre khasi | 316 |
huḷahuḷi dianti ye aneka sadhabā banitā
arghya bandābanti ye dvārikā pura bāsī | 320 |
bara kanyā dekhi ye aneka haraṣa
śubha maṅgaḷara beḷe āsi nabare prabeśa | 321 |
aṣṭa pāṭabongśī mūḷe śrīkr̥ṣṇara yete bāmā
bara kanya dekhīṇa utsāha sabong rāmā | 322 |
kanyāku paraśaṁsā se ye karanti bahuta
dhanya tohora pitā dhanya tohora māta | 223 |
dhanya ẏe dvārikā pura śobhā diśi
dhanya bidhātā ketekāḷa gaḍhilā tote basi | 324 |
dhanya hoilāiṁ ye āmbhe dekhiluṁ beni ḍoḷe
dhanya aniruddha kanyāku dhailu tuhi koḷe | 325 |
dhanya tora puṇya sādriśe pāilu ẏe pati | 326 |
dhanya re sundarī dhanya śobhā tuhi diśu
dhanya dhanya tuhi kuraṅgī baḷi naẏana prakāśu | 327 |
lg.head: {@śrīkr̥ṣṇa baḷarāmaṅka bidyā paṭhana@}

lg.l: kheḷante prabeśa deba abantī nāme pura | 4 |
pachāranti brāhmaṇa bābhiẏe aṭa tumbhe kebaṇa deśī
deba kumāra prāẏe ta abaẏaba diśi | 7 |

lg.note: pāṭha paḍhānti se bāḷaka pilāmāna gheni | (ṅa, ñja)
nirekhi śāntipani brāhmaṇa dilā chāhiṁ | (ṭa, jha)
lg.l: bho deba paṇḍita tumbhe pachārila yāhā
basudeba nandana hari baḷarāma boli tāhā | 12 |
satī sābitrī aṭanti se beni bhaẏeṇī | 13 |
śāhāsra saṁgati nāhiṁ apaṭheka sehu pura | 16 |
kusthāna bāse āmbhe padilu beni jane
beda bidyā na jāṇu na śuṇuṁ beni karṇṇe | 17 |
dhara dhara māra mara chanda bandha kathā
mūrkha sabhāre ki paṇḍita karai bhāba | 19 |
gyāṇa thāuṁ thauṁ āmbhe murkha hoibuṁ kemante
mātā pitā tejilu kuḷa gotra grāma
tohora daẏā kale āmbhe hoibuṁ chāṭa dharma | 21 |
binaẏa bhābe deba bākya ye uccāru
dekhi daẏā kale paṇḍita bhāgya guru | 22 |

div.note: bho paṇḍita tumbhe pachārila yāhi |<lb/>basudebaṁkara nandana hari caḷarāma boli āmbhe beni bhāi | (gha, kha)
gopāḷa bongśe jāta mathura nagrapura |<lb/>śāhāsra saṅgati nāhiṁ goṣṭheka se pura | (ñja, ṭa, jha, ṅa)

lg.l: bābu pāṭhaku yebe icchā hoilā tumbhara
tumbhe pāṭha paḍha ẏebe mohora gr̥hara | 23 |
putra kaṣṭa pāsorilā keśaba mukha chāhiṁ | 24 |
cautriṁśa akṣara puṇa bārahiṁ ye mātrā
siddhi kaṁ kya tra kḷa kva kna kma rka rkya rtra
śikhiluni guru he ābara ki pāṭha kaha | 30 |
rkḷa rkva rkna rkma kr̥ ṅka ska sta stra aṁśa yoga
sādhile śiḷoka na dekhi na cihnā | 33 |
ẏemāna sadhya hoilā dibasa ye tini

div.note: prathamare lekhile tāṁku ye śrīphaḷā<lb/>niśvāsake sādhya kale debakīra baḷā | (keteka pothi)

lg.l: dakṣiṇa ujjinī pacchimā mandāra kāuṁrī bhāratī
naba dibase lekhi bidyā tāḷi paṭi | 38 |
daridra brāhmaṇa tule pīrati deba hari | 39 |
batiśa dibase se ye sabu sādhya kale | 41 |

div.note: bīa cīra mahācīra mahā mahā sākhi
ḍāhāḷa belauḷa ẏe se pañchama lekhi |

lg.l: beḷe guru paḍhāile hr̥de tāhā gheni | 42 |
naba anta mantra phaḷa grantha pāñji
stambhana mohana baśya uccāṭana guṭika añjana mantra siddhā | 46 |
ẏemāna sādhya kale ẏegāra dina ante | 47 |
bhūta bhabiṣya barttamāna ye adr̥ṣṭi aśr̥ti
bākyadebī bidyā ādi kari śikhile nabarātri | 48 |
cauda bidyā ādi kari cauṣaṭhi bindhāṇa
udeka bidyā sādhya karāile paṇḍita bhāgyabara | 50 |
dekhi śikhile sādhile bidyā naba koṭi | 51 |
ẏe bidyāmāna kāhuṁ pāile brāhmaṇa śāntipani | 52 |
mukuḷā dijabara hoi sakaḷa bidyā sādhi
mañcha bhmabane janma hoi keuṇa guru bodhi | 53 |

div.note: beḷe guru paḍhāile hr̥de sneha gheni | (ṅa)
tada ante jyoti śāsra ārambha karanti
tada antare ye nabagraha pāñji | (ḍha, ṭha)

lg.l: se śāntipanira mahimāṁ mote kahibā muni he
nārāẏaṇaṁka guru se hoilā dusaha sandehe | 54 |
deba golekha boli nāma tāhāra dilā | 57 |
pracaṇḍa brahmabettā se pailā mantra kaḷā
beda śāhāsra bhaji se ākāśaku galā | 58 |
bhaẏe candra debatā na rahile ākāśe
svarga mañcha teji paśile haṭakeśvara kapiḷāse | 59 |
dine se īśvare aile kapiḷāsuṁ svargabāse
īśvara debatānta basa boli na boilā
brahmā se aṭai naba sr̥ṣṭi karatā
dhatā se arjita puruṣa bihantā bidhātā | 62 |

div.note: yogeṇa brahmā se rūpaku bhiāilā | (ṭa, ñja, jha)
yogeṇa brahmā se guru kari bhiāilā | (ca, ḍha)
beda śāsra bhāṣi se ākāśaku galā | (cha, ḍha)
bidhātā boliṇa ye sakaḷa sr̥ṣṭi karttā
āu debatāmānanta muṁ ye kāhiṁre na gaṇai | (ja, ṅa)

lg.l: aneka mate bhrtsanā haraṁku se boli
āstānaku uṭhante se haraṁku dilā peli | 64 |
gaḷathā dilā se ye bhmaje bhmaja paḍitāḷe
uḍi īśvare yāi paḍile agāda jaḷe | 65 |
brahmā debatānta tahiṁ kopa kale sadāśiba | 66 |
brahmā sinā kalā thāra kisa doṣa
dhātāra prasāde ye āmbhe tejiluṁ ākāśa | 67 |
yāa re brahmā apūjā hoiṇa thāa tini svarge | 68 |
golaka puruṣa ye ākāśe kalu rājā
tohore debatāẏe kehi na pāile pūjā | 69 |
mānaba mātraka tote na pūjantu ẏebe | 70 |
teṇu se brahmā apūjya hoilā tini sthaḷī | 71 |
teṇu kari patā nāma dile śāntipani | 75 |

div.note: brahmā ẏehā kalā kāhāku dabā doṣa | (ṅa)
yāa re brahmā apujā hoiṇa thāa madhyasvarge | (gha, cha)
sodara na māni ye ẏemanta kalu tu<lb/>debaloke nāgaloke mānabalone kehi<lb/>tote na pūjantu | (ḍha, gha, ca)

lg.l: bichārai dhātā mote rudra śāpa garu
anugraha kari mote nārāẏaṇe karibe pūjā | 77 |
tu yāhā pucchā kalu yugapati mahātamā
se śāntipani brahmaṇa ye pratakṣe aṭai bedabrahmā | 78 |
yābata kāḷa pitāmaha aai jyeṣṭha bhrāta
taṇu kari gurupada cintilā svaẏaṁ tāta | 79 |
pūjāra nimante kari se svaẏaṁ padmayoni
bichāranti rudra baṣṇu aṭanti ẏe bhāi beni
aṁśā abatāra ẏe aṭai deha gheni | 81 |
rudra abatāra ye aṭanti pratakṣe baḷarāma
śāntipanira śiṣya ẏe hoile śāhāsra dharma | 82 |
cauṣaṭhi dibasa madhye samasta kale siddhi | 83 |
bichāranti rudra biṣṇu aṭanti ẏe bhāi beni | 84 |
pitāmaha nohile ki se ānaku hoiba pāra | 85 |
manu pachārai śuṇa agasti muni he
kathā gotiẏe āsi mora paḍilā manara
teṇu kari pucchi muṁ tumbhara chāmura | 87 |
gopa puruṁ yāiṁ mathurā nagare rahile
kaṁsa nāśi ugrasene sehu rājā kale | 88 |
baraja kuḷare baḍhi na paḍhile pāṭha
yadu kuḷe baḍhanti bidyāku mane kale uccāṭa | 89 |
kaṁsa sunāmā ye ugrasenaṁkara putra dui
daibara baśe sehi duheṁ nāśa yāi | 90 |
kaṁsara putra haṁsa ḍimbhaka beni ye nandana
sunāmāra putra ye sātukī boli jāṇa | 91 |
haṁsa ḍumbhakaku ta gaṅgā jaḷare buḍāi
prāṇa pañchabhūta se hu tāhāṭhāre dei
yeṇe yibe tāhāku se saṅgare ghenithānti
ẏebe se ye bidyā paḍhibāre gale
sātukī jenāṁku kimpe saṅgate na nele | 96 |
bhojana śaẏane na chāḍanti sehu kṣaṇe
bhinna na karanti tāku prabhma nārāẏaṇe | 97 |
tāhāku saṅgate prabhma kimpāi na nele
āpaṇe prabhma ye bidyā paḍhibāku gale | 98 |
ẏebe se rasa bidyā paḍhi bāre gale
tāhaku kimpāi se bidyā na śikhāile | 99 |
ẏethira carita mote kaha ho bujhāi
teṇu kari muhiṁ tumbhanta pucchai gosāiṁ | 100 |
mohora bacana tu ho śuṇa nr̥pabara | 101 |
ẏeḍe gupata carita pucchā kalu mote
sābadhāne śuṇa tu ho kahai muṁ tote | 102 |
khaḍi bidyāṭhāru dhanu bidyā pariyante yete bidyā thila
tāhāṁkara saṅgate thāi se samasta bidyā sādhilā | 105 |
rāmakr̥ṣṇa saṅge thai sehu hoilā mahāyodhī
ẏethira kathā muṁ ye kahili sampādi | 106 |
tu ye pachārilu mote nr̥pati śekhara
yāha pachārilu śuṇilu ki ẏethira bichāra | 107 |
makara śukaḷa pakṣa ye dvādaśī rātra kāḷe
srāhāna karite bipra ailā sindhu jaḷe | 109 |
se kumāra pitāṁka tule goḍāiṇa āsi | 110 |
bāḷuta nandanaku bipra jaḷa kuḷare basāi
bāḷuta putra goṭika brāhmaṇara nelā hari | 112 |
hā hā putra boli bipra paḍilā yāiṁ jaḷe
agāda gabhīre se paḍilā putra goṭi
āre āre putra boliṇa brāhmaṇa paḍile mahī loṭi | 115 |
putrara guṇamāna sumari śire kara tāḍi | 116 |

div.note: abagāhī = anubhabī |<lb/>keteka pothire abagāhi madhya dekhāyāe |

lg.l: dāmodara thile ye dhoti piḍhā gheni
koḷa kari dhaile se guru śāntipani | 117 |
dhaile toḷi tāṁku rāmakr̥ṣṇa beni bhrāthe | 119 |
brāhmaṇī pākhare brāhmaṇa paḍilā yāi mūrcchā
kāhiṁ chāḍilā paṇḍā he khelantā bāḷa bacchā | 120 |
āre keṇe galu mora kheḷantā putra goṭi | 121 |
keśaba samārjanti he śoka chāḍa guru
nāśa galā nandana ābara kimpā śoka karu | 123 |
dekhu dekhu putra ta paḍilā agāda kaḷe
abhogya liṅga se hoilā tumbhe bāḷe | 124 |
dvijabara boilā bābhiẏe muhiṁ baḍa pāpī
pāñcha putra mora nāśa galeni adyāpi | 125 |
chāḍibaiṁ nija prāṇa mora putrara nimante | 126 |
gobinde boile tāṁka pāpe sehu male
tumbhe puṇya prāṇī kiṁke maraṇa iccha bhale | 127 |
guru he bhogya purandara bhmabane upujilā
puṇya thile praṇī bratanti nā bhale
tmbhera pātaka na jāṇimā aḷape nāśa gale | 129 |

div.note: se putrara saṅgate bāḷakhiḷā ẏeka thilā | (ja, tha)
dhāiṁ yāi śāntapani brāhmaṇa bhāriyā sumati āgare kahile | (ṭa)

lg.l: tetekaiṁ sinā bhogya kariba nā ẏebe | 130 |
aneka prabodhanā kari guruṁku śānti kari | 132 |
ghr̥ta pāraṇā se ye karāile guruṁku
śāntipani boile bābhiẏe mohora yeteka bidyā thilā
kathāẏe kahibuṁ guru he śuṇimā subāge | 138 |
thoke dina tumbhe ho thāa ẏebe rahi
āhuri bidyā paḍhibāku āmbhara mana hoi | 140 |
tumbhara bidyāre āmbhe hoilu mahā bhāri
tumbhara dharmaputra āmbhe āmbhanta na yā chāḍi | 141 |
ẏehāṁkare putra kaṣṭa yiba abā mohora
na yibā tīrtha pheri thibā thoke dina
putramānanta gheni ye pāṭhaśāḷāku bije kale
sabu śiṣyamāna āsi guru pāśe miḷile | 147 |
sahasre chāṭa ye sehu paḍhābanti niti
guruṁkar amana kebeheṁ bhrama ye nohilā | 149 |
tāhāra manare kimpe heba abā bhrānti | 150 |
āmbhanta dekhi guru manu cintā upekṣile | 151 |
guru dakṣiṇā na dile yibā kemanta hoi | 152 |
bhāriyāẏe kahanti ye kara he abadhāna | 154 |
āja anna rānddhabāku ghare jāḷa nahiṁ
putranta paṭhāi jāḷa guḍā āṇajinā bhiāi | 155 |
tebe se anna āja muṁ karibi randhana | 156 |
chāṭaśāḷī madhye guru ye ubha hoi
sabu puamānanta se ye anāiṇa kahi | 159 |
tumbhe sabu poẏe ẏehikṣaṇi bahana hoi yiba
kāṭha guḍaẏe lekhāẏeṁ banastu bhāṅgiṇa āṇiba | 160 |
gr̥hare āmbhara ho tiraṇa kicchi nahiṁ
śuṇi āga hoiṇa ye kahanti dāmodara
yibu guru he kāṭha āṇimuṁ tatapara | 162 |
sabu chāṭa gheni śrīkr̥ṣṇa bāhāra hoile
ye yāhāra mate ye kāṭha bhāṅgibāre gale | 164 |
ye yāhāra mate ye kāṭhamāna sāji | 165 |
guru ye bāṭa chāhuṁṇa achanti khaṇḍe dūra | 167 |
ẏemanteṇa māẏā ye kaleka deba nārāẏaṇa
śrīkr̥ṣṇara māẏāre ye samaste moha gale
yeuṁ māẏā brahmā ye jāṇi nuārile | 169 |
gupata kariṇa se ye kahanti bacana | 170 |
chāri megha ghoṭi tumbe baraṣiba pāṇi
pabana debatā rāi gupate kahanti puṇi | 171 |
ṭopi ṭopi hoi jaḷa paḍuthiba kṣitire | 172 |
chālibāku pahaṇḍe ye goṭāẏe na diśiba | 174 |
ẏemanteṇa āgyāṁ se ye dileka jagannāthe
sātukī haḷadharanti gheni rahile ye thoke dūra pathe | 175 |
ye yāhāra mate poẏe kāṭha sajāḍuṇa thile
ghuu ghuu garajana kari baraṣile pāṇi
ghana ghana bijuḷi ye māre puna puṇi | 177 |
ghana ghana jhāṁka jhāṁka hoi ye bahai pabana
rumaku ruma bāhāku bāhā na diśilā | 179 |
ke keṇe gale tāhā nuārile jāṇi | 180 |
śāpare mr̥tu pure janami acchi ẏehāṁka | 182 |
bipra kaḷare se ye hoiacchi jāta
pūbong janma katha tāra jāṇile acyuta | 183 |
ẏeka goṭi br̥kṣa troṭa madhyare paśile | 184 |
tumbhara nāma kisa ho boliṇa bolanti | 185 |
bhagatara mana se ye jāṇanti catradhara | 186 |
sehi bipra bāḷakaku chāhiṁ aneka paśaṁsi | 187 |
se bipra bāḷaka bolai śuṇimā gosāiṁ
mohora nāma ye pachāribā heuacha bhābagrāhī | 189 |
tāhā śuṇi mane bichāranti deba catradhara | 190 |
pūbong janmare ẏehu ta aṭai mora sakhā
ẏehāra saṅge maitra hebāku mohora manīkhā | 191 |
tumbha nāma āmbha nāma ẏeka helā jāṇa | 192 |
ẏekā nāma yahuṁ hoilā beni jana
tumbhara saṅge maitra hoite mora mana | 194
tumbhanta dekhiṇa ye mora śaradhā baḷilā
kr̥ta kr̥ta hoi kari kahe bipramaṇi | 196 |
mitrapaṇe muhiṁ chāra nuhaiṁ ye kṣama

div.note: mohora nāma ye pachārila bhāba bahi | (kha)

lg.l: biprar binaẏa ye bhagati bhāba dekhi
baḷatkāre bipra hātha goṭi se dhaile
maitra boliṇa se ye sukr̥ta ācarile | 201 |
satya satya bākya āmbhe maitra bandhāi
yahuṁ se beni jane maitra hoile
śuṇa ho manu puruṣa badanti agasti
bhagata jana nimante sabu cetauthaānti śrīpati | 204 |
tu ye pachārilu ho ẏekamane śuṇa
ye yāhāra sthānaku ẏebe yāa he meghamāne
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka āgyāṁre meghe ye caḷile gagane | 207 |
ye yāhāra mate br̥kṣa budā mūḷare ye thile
kāṭha gochāmāna se ye muṇḍare gheniṇa

div.note: bhakataṁka hite prabhma sabongsthāne sthiti | (kha, ṭha)

lg.l: br̥kṣa koṭare ye śrīkr̥ṣṇa thile rahi
baḷarāma sātukī ye saṅge gheni dui | 212 |
dāmodara paṇḍā tahuṁ bāhāra ye hoi
kāṭha gochāmāna muṇḍe chanti sabonge bahi | 213 |
ẏemante sabong poẏe hoile ẏeka meḷa
chāṭamāne boile thiluṁ br̥kṣara ye taḷa | 215 |
sabu chāṭa poẏe kāṭha bahile muṇḍara | 217 |
āga pacha hoi kari samaste caḷanti
daibara yoge poẏe kāṣṭha āṇi gale
jaḷa br̥ṣṭi helā ruhe pheri se na aile | 219 |
mane baḍa bhīti kale deba śāntipani
patha anusari āsanti ḍākanti ye puṇi | 220 |
guruṁku dekhiṇa poẏe kāṣṭa taḷe thoiṇa
uṭha uṭha boliṇa guru tāṁku takṣaṇe toḷanti | 224 |
kāṭha gochāmāna gr̥he sabonge gheni gale
bābhiẏe āmbhe yibu tīrtha ye pheriṇa | 228 |
tebe sinā putra kaṣṭa dukha pāsoribu | 230 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa deba ye tahuṁ mane bichārile | 231 |
mokṣa na māgi guru putrare mana dei
muṁ ye parama brahma mote se na cihnai | 232|
daibī māẏāre ẏebe guru mha gale
koṭi ṭirtha moho pādare achai ye bhale | 233 |
āja ẏehānta nicaẏe muṁ karibi bāraṇa
guru dakṣiṇā dāna sarūpa muṁ debi putra dāna | 234 |
āmbhanta melāṇi kara āhe guru svāmī | 235 |
guru dakṣiṇā debuṁ āmbhanta tumbhe māga | 236 |
dakṣiṇā na dile bidyā nohai ye siddhi
binā saṁkalpe ki prāpata hoẏe ruddhi | 237 |
guru boile tumbhara dakṣiṇā dāna dhyāna

lg.note: binā saṁkalpare ki prāpata hoẏe puṇyanidhi | (ja)
ṛūddhi = siddhi, lakṣmī, pābongtī, māṅgaḷika kāryya (bibāha o brata) sampatti |
lg.l: kāhāku dhana sañchibā putra yebe nahiṁ
guruṁka bacana śuṇi bolanti beni bhāi | 239 |
dakṣiṇā na dile bidyā prapata nohai
kicchi dakṣiṇā guru he āmbhaku māga tuhi | 240 |
māgile na puṇa na dia āmbhaṁku | 241 |
dhana darabeṇa kicchi kāryya nāhiṁ hāde muku
toṣamane yebe dakṣiṇā deba ho muku | 242 |
guruṁka na kahuṁ guru patnī ye kahanti
yāhā muṁ māgibi tāhā deba ki śrīpati | 243 |
guru dakṣiṇā kariṇa tāhānta debu bhale | 244 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ śoka kale beḷuṁ ye beḷaku | 145 |
nauceta tumbhara puraku caḷa yā beni bhāi | 249 |
gobinde boile tumbhe parama pabitra guru
amānuṣa br̥tta se ẏehā kiṁke na bichāru | 250 |
aśi baraṣa hoilāṇī ādi putra gale nāśaiṁ
śāntipani boile bābhiẏe yebe nuāsai tohore
nauceta tumhbe caḷi yāa nija pure | 252 |
gobinde boile yebe ẏehā māgila he guru
yatane loḍibu āmbhe yete dūra pāru | 253 |
guruṁka āgyāṁre tahuṁ caḷile bhrātha beni
samodra bhitare yāi muṁ dekhai guruṁkara pañchuputre
āmbhe thāānte ratnākara kimpe kalāka anitye | 256 |
baḷarāma bije kale nija ye bhmabana
samodra bhitare yāiṁ paśile śrī madhusūdane | 257 |
rātra kāḷe paśanti pure pure unneṣi
aneka pūjā kalā tahiṁ kr̥ṣṇaṁku bārānidhi | 259 |
yeuṇasi mate nāśa yānti sabong prāṇī
yamara bhmabana chaḍa thāna kāhiṁ puṇi | 262 |
garuḍa piṭhire svāmī yānti bije kari | 264 |
lg.note: aneka kaṭāḷa kari boile prabhma madhuhārī | (ja)
yama deca tahuṁ ke tāhā āne jāṇi | (jha, cha, ṭa)
yama debatā tahuṁ āna kehu nema puṇi | (ja, tha)
lg.l: pañchujanya śaṅkha prabhma kariṇa ye dhuni
aneka pāpī jananta nāśakara diai śāsti
jaganāthaṁka draśane sabonge hoile mokṣa gati | 266 |
garuḍadhvaja dekhi kari se nāśakara daibata
pādāarghya deiṇa keśaba caraṇe kalā praḷambita | 267 |
caraṇa pakhāḷi se udeka jaḷa bande
aneka yuga helā bijaẏe nāhiṁ svāmī | 269 |
toteheṁ kāraṇa kari tarile bahuta pāpī
tu deba saẏaḷa saṁsāra jana cintā
buḍilā medinī deba tuhi se uddharantā | 271 |
kāhiṁki se ẏethiki bijaẏe kimpte anagr̥ha
kahiba heu jagata tāraṇa mote kebaṇa sandeha | 272 |
ati anīti katā āmbhe śuṇiluṁ tohora | 273 |
tuhi se aṭu yama tuhi se aṭu dharma
tu daṇḍadhārī kimpā kalu anīti karama | 275 |
muhiṁ kimpe rājye deba karibi anīti | 276 |
svāmī mātā reta pitā bīryyaru upujai santati
se putra kimpe hoiba aḷapa āmbhuṣa | 279 |
svāmī kukarma boli kari yebaṇa puruṣa
nāśakara puruṣa se ye na jāṇaiṁ kāḷa beḷā
ayoge stirī puruṣa karai ẏeka meḷā | 282 |
puruṣa meṇṭi nuārai tāhāra ye kakṣā | 283 |
aḷapa āṣya tāra lekhā karai debarāja | 284 |
svāmī sāta daṇḍe kāḷa puruṣaṁka paḍai dhāḍi | 285 |
svāmī prathama ghaḍire yebe karai śr̥ṅgāra
janma hoile se putra hoiba apahāra | 286 |
baraṣake se putra hoai prāṇe kṣati | 287 |
pañcha daṇḍare yebe rahai nija dhātu
biśāśaẏe baraṣara chāri bhāge paẏe mr̥tu | 288 |
chaḍa daṇḍara madhye rahai yebe bāḷa
taruṇa baẏase tāra abaśya huai kāḷa | 289 |
yebe bīryya rahai sāta daṇḍara madhye
se putra nāśa yāi pañchāśa abade | 290 |

div.note: dibase śr̥ṅgāra karai tāhāra mana iccchā |<lb/>meṇṭi nuārai se stirīṅka pratiāśā | (ja)

lg.l: se putra praṇa pāi saturi baraṣara | 291 |
tahiṁ santati upujile aśi barasa bratanti | 292 |
sapata daṇḍa bhedi tithi kāḷa hoẏe lakṣi | 293 |
svāmī prathama sāta daṇḍe yebe upujai santati
aḷapa āẏuṣa hoi se bahuta kāḷa na brati | 294 |
madhya sapata daṇḍe kāma candra kaḷā
svāmī prathama sāta daṇḍare hoai ye doṣī
tahuṁ sāta daṇḍare ye hoanti nirddoṣī | 298 |
svāmī pāhantiki sāta daṇḍa rātra thāuṁ
tahiṁra doṣa aśeṣa boli deba kahuṁ | 299
bho prabhma aneka puruṣa doṣe nāśa yānti prāṇī
mote doṣa se ye dianti na jāṇi | 300 |
saṁsāraku doṣa ye debā ki nimante
satyeṇa beni yuga galāni dharma arthe | 301 |
tohora kalā kr̥tya ābara kāhāku doṣa debi
ratra dibasa na mānilu tu mānitī gaurobī | 303 |
anukṣaṇe śr̥ṅgāra ta kalu ho śrībacchi
āpaṇe laṅghilu deba doṣa ye na bācchi | 304 |
nityakarma puruṣa hoi deba kalu tu anīti
parama biṣṇu deba saburi dehe brati | 305 |
svāmī āpaṇe na bichāri kopa karu muku
kāśī nadīṭhāru rudra nadī pariyante yete
paradārā doṣa na lāgiba tete dūrahiṁ pariyante | 309 |
ẏe khaṇḍika chāḍibu tu na karibu kopa | 310 |
tahiṁki śāsti debu tu nāśakara yamadebe | 311 |
caubimśa koṣa ẏe ye dakṣiṇa dvārikā
paradārā haraṇa doṣa nāhiṁ ẏethe ẏekā | 312 |
yama boile svāmī he tarile bahuta pāpī
aṁsāraku kāraṇa nātha tu kalu ta adyāpi | 313 |
tu deba saẏaḷa saṁsāra jana rakhntā
buḍilā medinī deba tuhi se uddharantā | 314 |
he budha jane mote na karibā kopa
sabong maṅgaḷā agyāṁẏe mote ẏesaneka sarūpa | 315 |
se rātre boile muhiṁ lihai dibase
yama purāṇa kahili bistāriṇa śāsra biśeṣe | 317 |
mānabe meṇṭibe ki yāhā jagannāthe bhiāile
badanti agasti se kumbha ruṣi bacchi
jagannāthe boile mo bhrāthamāne kāhiṁ acchi | 319 |
badaẏanti puruṣottama śāntipani paṇḍāẏe āmbhara guru
tāhāṁkara putra āmbhara bhrātha āmbhe se nimante loḍu | 320 |
teṇu kari āmbhe ta ailu tora pura | 321 |
yama boilā muṁ ye jāṇai samasta
yahiṁra nimante muṁ āṇili guraṁka pañchuputa | 322 |
svāmī satya yuge sampada nāmeṇa nr̥pati
ẏebe daṇḍa pāuacchi bāiśi lakṣa baraṣa
śimuḷi br̥kṣe bānddha kāṭai tāhāra māẏeṁsa | 324 |
se mohore daṇḍa pāuacchi baḍa dukha
muṁ śāsti dei tāku hoili bimukha | 325 |
nabalakṣa baraṣa helāni muṁ ẏehāku delini ẏeḍe śāsti
stirī hatyā kalā ẏe kauśika nr̥pati | 327 |
ẏeḍe baḍa rājāku muṁ delaiṁ bahuta śāsti
ẏesaneka sampāda kahile yama ye nr̥pati | 328 |
svāmī tohora daraśane mukati huantu tini rāẏe
ẏehṁka nimante āṇili tumbhara guruṁkara tanaẏe | 329 |
nārāẏaṇa draśane se pāile biṣṇu patha | 331 |
bahana yibu āmbhe guru putranta pāile | 333 |
kāśīśvara nāme tahiṁ liṅga ye suḍhaḷa | 336 |
abhoga liṅga se bije dakṣiṇa kāśī | 337 |
cauryya karme se bratanti deba nitye | 338 |
yebaṇa drabya se ninti chori kari
bāṇṭanti dhanya drabya karanti bhāga chāri | 339 |
pāñcheheṁ bratanti deba beni bhāga gheni | 340 |
rāi āgyāṁ dilā tāṁku kr̥tānta nr̥pati | 341 |
guru pañchuputre tumbhe bega kari āṇa | 342 |
lg.note: kāmeśvara nāme tahiṁ liṅga ye suḍhaḷa | (ṭa, jha, ña, ḍha, ṇa)
lg.l: āgyāṁ paramāṇe se caḷile nāśakara chāra
kumāranta bheṭile se kāśī nadī tīra | 343 |
āmbhe ṭasakara aṭuṁ haruṁ para dhana | 348 |
beni prahāre se cchiḍile pañchu bhrāthe | 349 |
mohe bandhana kari guruṁka pañchuputra gheni
nirdhūma agni jāṇi se putraṁkara kāẏe
yama chāmure deiṇa se praṇapatya hvanti padmapāẏe | 352 |
aneka bhuṣaṇa aḷaṁkāra ābharaṇa kale kumaraṁku
yamara āstāna teji tini pābachara taḷe
dekhi paṇḍu nija kara dilāka kapāḷe | 354 |
lg.note: mohaśare bandhana kari guruṁka pañchuputra gheni | (gha, ṭha, tha, ṇa, cha)

lg.l: āsa āsa pitā boli keśaba koḷa kari | 355 |
keuṇa pātake ẏehānta āstāne na basāi | 357 |
svāmī īśvara debatā ye brahmahatyā kalā
tāhāṁkara hatyā puṇi meṇṭaṇa na galā | 360 |
gobinde boile ho ẏe mohora dharmatāta
yama boile ho ẏe hoilāni mokṣa
brahmahatyā doṣa pitāra khaṇḍantu pāñcha bhāi | 363 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile ho keuṇa puṇya kale
pitā mokṣa hoiba keuṇa tīrtha kale | 364 |
yama boile putra yebe dhārātīrtha karai
bongśe kaḷaṁka thile sabong doṣa harai | 365 |
lg.note: “tāhāṁkara hatyā puṇi meṇṭaṇa na galā” pādāṁśa pare ‘ṇa’ pothire adhikā pāṭha–

lg.l: rājusi yāga kale prāpata hoẏe ruddhi siddhi | 366 |
paṇḍu boile svāmī mote anagr̥ha kara
rājusi yāga kari anna dāna se diantu
āmbhara aṭanti ẏe guru parama debatā | 370 |
yama boilā mote chāẏā śāpa dilā
bāma pade mora gaḷuta kuṣṭha byādhi ye hoilā | 372 |
rājusi yāga yebe karibe paṇḍu nāne
mohora byādhi nāśa yiba paṇḍura parasanne | 373 |
svāmī tumbhara prasanne muṁ paṇḍuṁku houcchi bhatgatā
rājusi yāga na kale debi muṁ abastā | 374 |
ẏehā kahi aneka ratna ābharaṇa kale ye paṇḍuṁku
yama debatā daṇḍa dhari ghenigale āstāna uparaku | 375 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa draśane se paile mokṣa gati | 378 |
samasta janamānaṁkara śāsti keśaba kale rakṣā
yama debatā ye śata sahasra praṇapatya

lg.head: {@surekhā haraṇa@}
lg.l: bilaṁka deśara rājā ye baibasuta manu
