tumbhara rājāku kaha āmbhar aāgyāṁ yāi | 166 |
ḍagare bolanti abadhāna kara ho mantrībara | 168 |
tāhāṁkara pitā ye āsuchanti yuddha kari | 169 |
baḍa pratāpī se ye aṭai nr̥pabara
thāṭa saina tāra saṅgate achai apāra | 170 |
pādabhare dala dalita kampu acchi mahī
boilā tumbhara rājyaku muṁ pakāibi tāḍi
bajra mūṣaḷeka ye hāthare acchi dhari | 172 |
se boilese boile āmbha rājya aṭai dvārābatī pura | 173 |
yadu bhojabongśara he āmbhe aṭu rāẏe
āmbhara tanaẏa se bandīre yehu rahe | 174 |
rājā āgyāṁ dile ye ḍagaraku chāhiṁ
kāhiṁra rājā se ye kāhiṁki āsai | 178 |
boile āmbhara putraku dhariacchi tumbha rāẏe
āmbhara thāṭha sajakara boliṇa āgyāṁ dilā | 182 |
na kahile kathā ta nohai gosāiṁ
mantrīle boilā ho tohora kisa dosa
nirbhaẏa hoiṇa ye kaha mohora paśa | 186 |
mantrī boilā muhiṁ jāṇaiṁ tahiṁra bidhāna
gaṇa gandhabong debatāẏe se na karai bhaẏe | 189 |
dānaba baḷa patāḷu āsi sāhā hele | 190 |
ẏemanta rājya se karai kaṁsa nr̥pabara
ḍare pr̥thibīra rājā diel āṇī kara | 191 |
daibakī nāmeṇa tāra jyeṣṭha ye baheṇī
ẏehi garbharu śatr̥ upujiba boli jāṇaiṁ āpaṇa | 194 |
ẏete boli bhaẏeṇīki jagiā dei rakhāilā
kaṁsara hāthare se dilāka nei bhale | 197 |
baḷeṇa kaṁsa ye markata śiḷāre kachāḍilā puṇi
bijuḷi kanyā ye gope janamiṇa thilā
ye tote māriba se gopapure rahilāṇi
tāhā śuṇi kasaṁrājā baḍāi cintā kalā
teṇu kari rājāra ye uḍilā sāhāsa | 203 |
dhanu ucchaba boli yātrā goṭiẏe bhiāi | 204 |
daibara māẏā se ye kahaṇā na galā
rāmakr̥ṣṇaṁkara pitā basudeba daibakī aṭai mātā
tāhānta bandī kari rakhithilā kaṁsa maharathā | 207 |
ẏemanteṇa tahiṁ ye thokāẏeka dina galā
pitā āgare guhāri kale sehu yāiṁ
aṭhara beḷa pariyante mathurāku dhāḍi dilā
sākṣāte parama berahma se manuṣye abatāra | 213 |
debataṁka chaḷe se mānaba tanu bahi
jārāsandha baḷe tāku kisa kari pāri
debatāṁka kāryya acchi boli tāku na maile śrīhari | 215 |
kr̥ṣṇara prathama putra se kāmadeba abatāra | 218 |
surekhā kanyāku se ye neuthilā hari
tāhaku tumbhe ho dharāi rakhicha bandī kari | 219 |
mote ye āgyāṁ tumbhe dila ho nr̥parāẏe
yuddha kale rājā ho na paibuṭi jaẏe | 220 |
yahiṁ tahiṁ duhitā ta bibhā karāibā
mantrī boilā āhuri kathāẏe achai gosāiṁ
kuñjagaḷa deśa rājā tāhāṁka saṅgate achai | 224 |
se rajāra nāma aṭai ye yujheṣṭhi nr̥pabara | 225 |
sāṁgrāma kale tāṁka saṅge yaśa na pāibā
binā kāraṇare thāṭha saina samasta marāibā | 227 |

div.head: {@surekhā bibhā@}

lg.l: agasti bolanti śuṇa bilaṁka deśa rāẏe
rājāra bimana birūpakṣa mantri ye jāṇilā
yeteka kathā muṁ ye chāmure jaṇāili
sābadhāna citte tāhā śuṇila ho nr̥paśāḷi | 4 |
rājā boilā mote baḍa saṁśaẏa helā
ki buddhi karibi boli manare bikaḷa hoilā | 5 |
ẏemanta samaẏe dekha ho daiba bhabiṣa
nāradaṁku dekhi kr̥taśekhara rājā ye uṭhile
rājā boile muni he baḍa bhāgya mohora hoilā
mohora rājyare tumbhara pāda raja paḍilā | 8 |
muni boile tu ye aṭu bhāgyarāśi
rājā boilā kathāẏe chāmure jaṇāib muhiṁ
sābadhāna hoi śuṇimā hou he gasāi | 10 |
puruṣa mātra goṭiẏe kehi meḍhare na paśai | 11 |
padmana kumara boli nāma ye tāhāra | 12 |
kumarara pitā nāma ye śrīkr̥ṣṇa aṭai
mohora mantrī kahanti se aṭanti svaẏeṁ nārāẏaṇe | 18 |
boile tohora putra nīḷasenakaiṁ āṇa hakarāi
muni boile bābu bāsa tuhi bege
gupata kathāẏe ye kahibā toho āge | 21 |
muni boile tu ho thāṭha saja kara
āga pacha hoi samaste saṅge thiba
ẏe kathā āmbhara ye manaku āsuacchi | 31 |
muniṁkara kahante rājā tūnī hoi rahilā
muni boile ye kaha ho kumara
bhala praẏe diśilā ki āmbhara bichāra | 33 |
āmbhara bhāgyare yebe se miḷiacchi bara | 35 |
ẏethuṁ adhika bara ta khojile na pāi
ẏe kanyāku bara ẏe dullabha miḷai
bināśa kāraṇe kaḷi dvanda na karibā
putrara kahante kr̥taśekhara rājā ye hasilā
nīḷaśekhara yāhā kahilā mo manaku yogāilā | 40 |
nārade boile ho kahilu yāhā tote
sulabhe dullabha bara pāilā to hohite | 41 |
ẏete boli rājā ye bhitaraku galā
boilā rāṇī go apūbong kathāẏeka śuṇa
baḍara putra boli ẏebe se jāṇilu | 44 |
dvārabatī pure se ye śrīkr̥ṣṇa kumara
ugrasena sahite thāṭha saini gheniṇa bāhile | 46 |
se baraku jhia bibhā karāibā ẏebe | 48 |
hou boli rājā āge rāṇī sanamata kalā | 49 |
padmana kumaraku ho gheni āsa yāi
nāradaṁku dekhiṇa ye padmana ku mara
muni boile tote kalyāṇa hou re kumare
surekhā kanyā dhāryya hou re ẏe āmbhara bare | 55 |
dibya beśa kari kumāraku rathare basāile nei | 58 |
mājaṇā bidhi karibāku ye dāsīmāne gale
puṇa chāpasari ābara subarṇṇa māḷa kahñjile gaḷāre | 60 |
aruṇa uiṁlā prāẏeka ye surekhā diśile | 62 |
jāṇi paṭāntara ki ye anaṅga gharaṇī | 63 |
thāṭha saina caḷāi ye nr̥pati bāhāra
mantrī rahiṇa ratha caḷāi dhīra dhīra | 66 |
dekhā daraśani dhana gheni ubhā ye huai | 67 |
nārada muniẏe ye thokāẏe dūra saṅge gale
nāradaṁku dekhiṇa hasile ye rāma banamāḷī
nārade boile sabu kathā bhala hoiacchi
bara kanyā gheniṇa kr̥taśekhara rājā śaraṇa paśuacchi | 71 |
nāradaṁka mukharu ye ẏesanaka bacana śuṇi
nārada muni haraṣe bīṇayantra ye bāile | 76 |
kr̥taśekhara rājā chāmuku gale sehu khare
āsa āsa bege ho yibā nr̥pabare | 77 |
rājānta gheni muni āsanti dhīra dhīra | 78 |
hātha dhari dekhāi dile tapaśāḷī tahiṁ | 80 |
yete pāpa acchi aṅge hoiba se bhasma | 81 |
śaṅkha catra gadā padma dekhilā carmaḍoḷe | 82 |
puṇi uṭhi rājā ye niuchāḷi kalā | 83 |
uṭha uṭha rājā ho bolanti catradhara | 84 |
gobindaṁka śrīcarṇa taḷe praḷambita kala nei | 86 |
namaskāra karai śire yoḍi beni kara | 87 |
kumārīhiṁ namaskāra karai paḍiṇa pāda taḷe
uṭha uṭha boliṇa bolanti hari kāmapāḷe | 88 |
karapatra yoḍi rājā ubhā hoilā khaṇḍe dūre
gobinde āgyāṁ dile āsa basa ho nr̥pabare | 89 |
kalyāṇa kari boile uṭha ho nr̥pasāiṁ | 90 |
oṭha uṭha bli śrīhari āgyāṁ dile
tohora rājyaku kadāścite na paḍe birodhe | 94 |
nārade bolanti tumbhe śuṇa ho kahnāiṁ
ẏe mantrīra prasāde rājyaku apacaẏe nāhiṁ | 96 |
māri pakāa boli mantrīki āgyāṁ dilā | 97 |
rājāku boilā tumbhe śuṇa ho nr̥pabara | 98 |
kumara rūpa guṇa dekhi mantrībara jāṇilā
ẏe baḍa kuḷe janmicchi boli rājāku bujhāilā | 99 |
ẏethira sulabha kathā tote prapata hoilā | 100 |
sābadhāna hoi tumbhe śuṇimā deba rama hari | 102 |
śaṅkha catra gadā padma śāraṅgadhanu bahi | 104 |
muhiṁ ye hīna arakṣita aṭāi gosāiṁ
tohora daẏā na kale mohora acchi kahiṁ | 105 |
yete doṣa kacicchi karibā mora kṣamā
nirantare aparādhī muṁ tumbhe ye aṭā guṇasīmā | 106 |
āpaṇe daẏā kari ye kahanti padmaākhi | 107 |
saunanda mūṣaḷare tora muṇḍa checante haḷasāiṁ | 109 |
nāradaṁka bacane baḷarāme śānti ye bhajile
yete doṣa kali mora aparādha na dhara
rājāra binaẏa ye bikaḷa bhāba dekhi
kathāẏe kahibā kehi na karibā nāsti | 116 |
nārade boile chāla karamaṇḍaḷa rājyaku yibā
bara kanyā gheniṇa sukhe yibā caḷi
tebe se sabu sukha rahai ho rāma banamāḷī | 119 |
kisa bichāra karibā ho pheḍi kaha muku | 121 |
ye yāhā manare ye kathānta bhāḷile | 123 |
āsa ho maharājā kahibā āmbhe bhale 124 |
daibe ta kumārī ye āmbhara helāṇi
rājā boilā mora kisa doṣa achai
yāhā kahibi tāhā abadhāna kara ho gosāiṁ | 127 |
thāṭha saini gheni mora rājyaku caliyibā
maṅgaḷa bidhi yātrā mohora purare sāribā | 128 |
ugrasena rājāṁkara pañchadaśa kṣauṇī ye baḷa
sāta ẏeuṇī baḷa ghenichanti yujheṣṭhi nr̥pabara | 132 |
ẏete sainiṁku tumbhe pāribaṭi ki sambhāḷi
keuṇa drabya apūbong achai mote hāde | 134 |
nagra maṇḍāa boliṇa śrīmukhe āgyāṁ dile | 135 |
gharamāna maṇḍāa ye surekhā bibhā hoẏe | 139 |
uchahaba ānanda ye hoilā nagra pure
mantrīki chāhiṁ kr̥taśekhara rājā āgyāṁ dilā
bibhāra sāmagrī bhiāṇa kara ho boilā | 143 |
tāhāṁka pāiṁ ghara bhiāṇa kara ho mantrībara | 146 |
biri ghāsa ādi kari yeteka bhiāṇa | 147 |
bakharā mūḷa kari bhiāa sabong ghara | 150 |
panti panti dhāḍi dhāḍi rekha rekha hoi
sabu ghare bicitra pratimāmāna lekhāibā dhātikāra | 152 |
yāhāku ye bidhire se pūjā karāiba | 153 |
śveta paruā śveta haṁsa krīḍā karuthibe ākāśara | 154 |
yete yete prakāre kr̥taśekhara rājā āgyāṁ dilā
tahuṁ śateguṇa kari mantrī samasta nirbhākalā 155 |
dīrgha chāri kośa ye prati chāri kośa
chāmuṇḍiā goṭāẏe saja kalā mantrī birūpākṣa | 157 |
debe dulabha ye ẏemanta sthāna kalā
sabong bahiāṇī ṭhika kalā se bahana | 162 |
tohore se ẏe kathāmāna hoilā boile | 165 |
tebe se āmbhara manuṁ phiṭiba sandeśa | 168 |
rājāra binoẏī bhība śuṇi bolanti narahari
baḷaramaṁku boile śrīkr̥ṣṇa chāla ho yibā caḷi | 172 |
nārade boile uṭha uṭha ho haḷadhara
biḷamba na sahe bibhā houcchi uchura | 173 |
āgyāṁ hoile kumara kumārī yibe bega hoi | 174 |
maṅgaḷa bidhānamāna tumbhe bege kari yāa | 175 |
pache thāṭha gheni rāmakr̥ṣṇa bāhāra hoile | 176 |
pandara kṣauṇī baḷa gheni ugrasena rāẏe
sāta kṣauṇī saini gheni paṇḍura tanaẏe | 177 |
ḍhola damā dāuṇḍi ādi bājai mārdaḷa | 179 |
saina baḷa gheni ye āpaṇe bhābagrāhī
rathī hāthī pādānti ye nohilā kaḷanā
sanamāna pāiṇa ye yāhā āstāne basile | 184 |
surekhā haraṇa carita ẏehi śuṇa dibya rīti | 185 |
dhanya dhanya kr̥taśekhara rājā boliṇa bolanti | 186 |
ẏe nabara dekhi ye debatāẏe toṣa hebe
ẏekā dibasake ẏemāna nirbhā kalā hāde | 187 |
nicinta hoiṇa ye rahile kr̥taśekhara bhmabane | 188 |
sanamāna pāi kari ye yāhā sthāne basile | 189 |
yujheṣṭhi bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba sahite
ugrasena ādi kari bhmañjile toṣa citte | 191 |
āstana upae basile rāmakr̥ṣṇa beni bhāi
ẏethu anantare rājā śuṇa dibya rasa
sāta ahia nārī aile bahana hoi
sāta gharu paśi pāṇi toḷiṇa āṇile
subarṇṇa thāḷīre paduna bhañji ye basilā | 206 |
maṅgaḷa paṇi gheni srāhāna karāile beni | 207 |
haḷadī kuṁkuma lagāi surekhāku beśa beśana karāile | 209 |
arjuna hātha dhari sabhāru uṭhi yāi | 217 |
kumaraku koḷe gheni bibhā maṅgala bichāra | 222 |
subarṇṇa pīḍhāẏeka rājā bege āṇi dile
pūbong mukha hoi ye basile basudeba
pacchima mukha hoi basilā kr̥taśekhara rājadeba | 225 |
beśa hoi bara āsu boliṇa boile | 229 |
barabeśa hoi yahuṁ basilā ka mara
surekhā hāthare labaṇa cauṁrī chāuḷa soriṣa miśāiṇa dile | 234 |
bedī upare bara uparaku phiṅgidia boliṇa boile
samastaṁka bole kumārī bedī uparaku phiṅgidile | 235 |
bara pāda dhoideba rājā tumbhara nandana | 237 |
rājā boile ho ḍagare bege caḷa
bipre boile pāṇi gheni āsa subarṇṇa jharira | 240 |
subarṇṇa jharire yāiṁ nīra pūroi āṇilā | 241 |
bedī taḷe pāda dhoila ka mara padmana | 242 |
pūbong mukha hoi kari basilā kumara
surekhā kanyāku beśa beśana karāi āṇile
maṁgaḷa mahurī ye bājai ghana ghana

div.note: bādya niśāna śabada śubhai garu ṭāṇa | (kha, ṭha)

lg.l: pubong mukha hoi kari kumara basilā
beda dhuni kari hātha kuśare bānddhale
ye yāhara nāma gotra nāma uccārile | 250 |
śaṅkhare pāṇi lāi rājāra hāthe dile
pāṇi toḷi diai se kumarara hātha | 254 |
yautuka debaku śakya kāhiṁ ye mohora | 261 |
jhiagoti dei muṁ ye śaraṇa paśili
kr̥tārtha kale ẏe ya mohora jībana | 263 |
jana parajāṁka kaṣṭa galā ẏete ye kāḷare | 264 |
jhia bibhā dei rājā paśilā śaraṇa
kr̥takr̥tya hoi rājā kahai kara yoḍi
ahio nārī āsi kuśa bandhana pheḍilā | 269 |
subarṇṇara kauḍi tāhāra hāthare ye dile
thāṭha saini yāka tāhā bilohiṇa dile | 282 |
bhojana ṭhābare yāi sabonge bije kale | 284 |
bibhā ta baḍhilā ho chāla ẏebe yibā
kisa arthe āu ẏeṭhāre āmbhe rahithibā | 292 |
barakanyā saja kari āṇa bege yāi | 293 |
dvarikāku yibā sabong bege saja hua
biḷamba na sahi se yibe ẏehikṣaṇa | 296 |
nārada maharṣi me ta rāiṇa kahile
mantrīṁki chāhiṇa rājā āgyāṁ se dianti

div.note: niyoga = kauṇasi biṣaẏare niyukti, nibeṇa, kauṇasi bhārārpaṇa, chākiri |

lg.l: barakanyānta hāndoḷāre basāi gheni āsa begi | 301 |
bhitara puraku nei bāratā bege dilā | 302 |
śaṅkha mahurī ye bājai ghana ghane | 304 |
āstāna uparaku tahuṁ bije kale nr̥pabara | 306 |
jaṇe jaṇe āpaṇe debā ho śrībacchi | 308 |
ye yāhāra mate saja hoiṇa bāhārile | 313 |
āgiāṇi thāṭha caḷāi sehu ye caḷiyāẏe | 314 |
āga pacha hoiṇa ye sanyabaḷa gale | 315 |
jhiara saṅge yāa boliṇa āgyāṁ dilā | 316 |
mantrīki boilā tuhi yāa ho āge bege
jhiaku neiṇa tumbhe chāḍi āsa subāge | 317 |
āgyāṁ māgiṇa tahuṁ ye caḷai mantrībara | 318 |
sāta kṣauṇībaḷa gheni gale bāhara ye hoi | 321 |
rathe rathe caḍhi yānti kr̥ṣṇaṁka saṅgate | 322 |
bīṇā bādya bāiṇa ye nārada mahāmuni
raha raha boliṇa ye bolanti śrībacche | 324 |
dohitā goṭika nātha muhiṁ samarpili tote
sabong śubhe rājya tmbhe karuthāa bhale | 329 |
rāṇī mahādeī ye bahuta trodha kale
jhia nāma dhariṇa ye bāuni kandile | 332 |
muhiṁ ye arakṣita aṭai sāroḷā dāsa
ẏe bhaba nadīru pāra karibā pītabāsa | 335 | 7910 |
lg.head: {@kuṭhārāsura badha@}

lg.l: purāṇa pothi phei kaha he brahmabettā | 3 |
thāṭha saini gheniṇa ye bāhāra hoigale
lakṣeka śaṅkha ye bājai ghana ghana
bādyaghāte cchiḍiṇa paḍiba ki ākāśa bhmabana | 9 |
daiba bhabiṣa kathā śuṇa ho rājana
deba dānaba mānabe se kahāku na gaṇai | 12 |
mr̥ga hariṇa se bahuta jība māriacchi
phuṭiṇa gacha taḷe basilā kodāḷa asura bacchi | 14 |
saini baḷa saṅge tāra achanti apāra
baḍāi sambhare basiacchi se asura bīra
chāri digaku mukha kariṇa chāhaṁi dhīra dhīra | 18 |

div.note: phutiṇa = kḷānta hebā, śrānta hebā, thakiyibā |

lg.l: yeuṁ āḍaku chāhaṁi sahasre oḷaga paḍai
śaṅkha mahurī ye bājai ati kutūhoḷe
mahī ṭaḷa ṭaḷa ye uchuḷai pādabhare | 21 |
śaṅkha mahurī śabade ye kuruma uchuḷi | 22 |
thāṭha caḷāiṇa se yāuchanti dhīre dhīre
śaṅkha mahurī abikṣaṇe ghana ghana phuruacchi | 28 |
chālachāla śabada ye paḍu acchi ḍāka | 29 |
mantrī boilā śuṇa ho asura kuḷasāiṁ
tohora sebaka muhiṁ aṭai janme janme
tāhāra nandana ye aṭai padmana kumara
rūpe paṭāntara se kamadebaku ye gacchi | 34 |
se kumara bibhā hoi kanyā gheniṇa yāucchi
boila thāṭha sajakara yibā tahiṁ yāẏe
tāhānta dekhile āmbhara kisa kāryya hoiba
mohora bola gheni na yāa asurakuḷa deba | 40 |
koṭhāra asura bilā ẏeṭhāre ki birodha acchi
kāhiṁra nr̥pati se rājya tāra kāhiṁ
keuṇa prakāre se kāhā jhia niẏe bibhā hoi | 42 |
thāṭha saini tāra kete achai saṅge
ẏethiba carita mote kaha he subāge | 43 |
rājāra nāma aṭai kr̥ta ye śekhara
baḷe kanyāku āṇante jāṇīlā kr̥taśekhara nr̥pabara | 48 |
dhari nei tāku bandī kari rakhithilā
ẏeteke upāẏa ye nārada muni kalā | 50 |
kanyāẏe gheni āsuthilā se rātra kāḷare | 52 |
sāta bongśa yādaba gheni bāhāra hoile
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa chanti tāhāṁka saṅgatara | 55 |
bāiśi kṣauṇī baḷa gheni basudeba bāḷa | 56 |
apramita baḷa ye kaḷaṇā na yāi | 57 |
khaṇḍe dūruṁ āsi se kalāka daini | 58 |

div.note: nārade śrīkr̥ṣṇanta bāratā kahileka āsi<lb/>padana nahiṁ boli samaste bhāḷuchanti basi | (kah, ja, cha)

lg.l: tāhāra nagraku bje kale rāma banamāḷī | 59 |
bāiśi kṣauṇībaḷaku bhmari bhojana se dilā
aneka sambhabonge jhiaku se bibhā karāilā | 60 |
bahuta binoẏī hoi kahilā rāmakr̥ṣṇaṁkara pāẏe | 61 |
barakanyā gheniṇa se ye sambhabonge yāuacchi
tāhāra saṅge khadiāḷi nuha tu kodāḷa asura bacchi | 62 |
yuddha karibā chāla ho tāhāṁka saṅgara | 63 |
nirbhaẏe yāuacchi tāhā muṁ kemante sahibaiṁ | 64 |
mantrīra bola rāja kebeheṁ na kalā
thāṭha sajakara boli ye mantrīki āgyāṁ dilā | 65 |
mantrī boilā ho śuṇa koṭhāra asura bīra
sāṁgrāma kale tu yaśa na pāibu
na kahile kathā mote kahibuti pache bācchi | 68 |
pitr̥ pitāmaha bairi hele tāhāṁkara tule
raṇa kale yaśa na pāile sehu bhale | 69 |
keuṇa prakārare se mohora pitr̥ bairi hoi | 70 |
kāhiṁra rājā se ye kāhiṁ āsithilā
mantrī boila kopa tu na kara asurakuḷa nātha
tahiṁra kathā muhiṁ ye kahai tadanta | 73 |
daiba baśe se rājā mr̥gaẏāku āsithilā
tāhāṁkara saṅge pitā tumbhara bheṭa ye paḍilā | 75 |
duheṁ uñchabāca hoi kari kaḷi kale
duheṁ mahākṣatrī ye nohanti kehi kahākaiṁ occha
atihiṁ sāṁgrāma ye sedinara nohai gocara
sāṁgrāme kuṇḍaḷī asuraku māilā nakuḷa mahābīra | 78 |
sāṁgrāmeṇa māri se ye bāhuḍiṇa gale
thora pitā kodāḷeśvara rājā ye hoilā | 80 |
mote dine pachārilā hāde tohora pitā
caudina helā mr̥gaẏāku gale naile mora pitā | 81 |
muhiṁ boili pitā tora sāṁgrāme paḍilā
śuṇiṇa pitā tora bahu kopa kale
ẏete boli dine ye mr̥gaẏāku galā
daibara baśe pāṇḍabanta bheṭā ye pāilā | 84 |
tohora pitā tāhāra saṅgate sāṁgrāma kalā mahāghora | 86 |
aneka sāṁgrāma ye dui chatrī kale
tohora pitā yemante mariba se bheda diśilā | 88 |
ẏe rūpe pitā bairi aṭai tohora
ẏehā śuṇi asura ye bahuta kopa kalā
mantrī ḍaka diai raha kinā kṣaṇe
ẏeḍe trodha kimpe karuacha ho āpaṇe | 94 |
mantrī boilā ho thāṭha saini sāji yibā
rājā boilā mohora sāja ho saina
thāṭha caḷāiṇa ye asure tatakṣaṇe gale
madhya thāṭhare se ye karanti paẏāna | 100 |
śaṅkha mahurī badya śubhai dūruṁ dūra | 103 |
tāhāṁkara pache sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni
mahā sambhabong hoiṇa ye āsuchanti thāṭha
chāla chāla dhāma dhāma mukharāba cahaṭa | 105 |
raha re pāṇḍabā boli ḍāke kopabhare | 106 |
mukhara cahaḷe na śuṇanti ye pāṇḍabe
kiẏe se ḍakucchi boli pachaku tale kale | 108 |
yāuachanti se ye na chāhānti pachare | 111 |
sahadeba boile tu kāhiṁra aṭu bīra
bināśa kāraṇe dvanda araju mohora saṅgara | 113 |
kaha ho mantrībara pitā śatr̥ aṭai ki ẏehi | 114 |
mantri boilā to pitāku ẏehiṭi māilā
koṭhāra asura boilā śuṇa re pāṇḍabā
putr̥ pitā bairi to mukha na chāhiṁbā | 116 |
tīkṣa śare praṇa tora ghenimi abaśya | 117 |
tohora bāpa ajā yebe mora hāthe marai | 118 |
ẏebe tohora maraṇa mohori hāthare achai
yuddha kale na kale tu pāibu ki yaśa
kahuṁ kahuṁ duheṁ ye hoi marāmari
konta gadā śakati ye benikare dhari | 121 |
ratha saja kari āṇi mantrībara dilā
dhanu dhari yujhai se sahadeba chāmure | 123 |
dhanuru na phiṭu tāhā sahadeba cchedai
ẏekā nārājake paḍile dui sahasra asure | 130 |
muṇḍa cchiḍiṇa ye paḍile samaste bhūmira
boilā mānabā re ẏemanta śahasra kalu
dui sahasra saini mora chedi pakāilu | 132 |
khaḷa khaḷa hoiṇa aṅgu bahai rodhira | 134 |
dhanu dhari asura śahasra karai cchedana | 136 |
puṇa mantraṇa chāḷiśa nārāja sahadeba bindhai
asura aṅgaru rodhira khaḷa khaḷa bahai | 137 |
kopeṇa asura ye koḍiẏe śara māri
khaṇḍa dūruṁ sahadeba tāhā chedi pakāilā | 139 |
ẏeṇe asura saini ye bindhuchanti śara
dui sahasre asura tā chedi pakāilā | 141 |
kadaḷī bana yehne bāta ghātare paḍanti
agni jaḷī uṭhai ye prajjvaḷita hoi | 144 |
beḷuṁ beḷa samara ye aneka hoilā
dui prahara paryyante se saini saṅgare yujhai
kṣaṇeheṁ biśrāma tā hātha ye nohai | 148 |
muṇḍā br̥kṣa prāẏe asuranta chedi pakāilā
ẏekā jaṇake pādilā se kṣatrī mahābīra | 151 |
aṅge na paḍuṇu ye tā sahadeba chedai
beḷuṁ beḷa samara ye hoila agocara
rakate jara jara ye duhiṁka śarīra | 154 |
kehi kāhakaiṁ samare ocha ye nohanti
tini prahara paryanta samara ghora kale
kehi kāhākaiṁ sāṁgrāme jiṇi ta nuārile | 156 |
hāthaku chāhiṁle yaku tini brahmāṇḍa diśai
ẏehāra koṭhāra gheni hāṇile cchiḍiba ẏehāra śire | 159 |
ẏeka mukha hoi ye karanti samara | 161 |
bāuṁśa gheni piṭāpiṭi hvanti ye yāhāre | 162 |
dhanu huḷa chāḍi ye sahadeba mahābaḷī
koṭhāra dui goṭa mantrī ye āṇīlā uchuḍi | 163 |
thambhībhūta hoi datya chāhaṁi jaḷa jaḷa
mantrī boilā muṁ ye kahiacchi tote
pāṇḍabaṁka saṅge tu na kara anarthe | 166 |

lg.note: tāhāku abā keuṁ kathā ubāra achai | (kha)
kampāiṇa yuddha ye karai apāra | (ṇa, ja, cha)
beḷuṁ beḷa ghora ye hoilā samara | (ja)

lg.l: ẏehāra baḍa bhāi hāthare prāṇa dilā | 168 |
ẏe kathā kahile tu kebeheṁ na bujhilu
mr̥tu puruṣa tote ye āṇicchi kaḍhāi | 170 |
paḷāi yibāku tote keṇe bāṭā nāhiṁ
paḷāile abā tuhi rahibu kāhiṁ yāiṁ | 171 |
tote rakhibāku kehi nāhiṁ tini pura
nisata nuha tu ẏebe kara hoi samara | 172 |
māla bindhāṇa kariṇa dhāiṁlā kodāḷa asura nandana | 173 |
māḍi basiba boli ye se hāmpoḍi dhāiṁlā | 174 |
yahuṁ deha samara ye kalāka asura
beka cchiḍi muṇḍa tāra bhumire paḍai | 176 |
tharahara hoi ye paḍilā piṇḍa khaṇḍa
mantrīki boilā se śuṇa mohora sampāda | 178 |
rājāku gheniṇa thora ye ailu parighāi
tohora bichāre ye mote kisa kari hoi | 179 |
mohora saṅgate āsi ẏete yuddha kala | 180 |
tote āji rakhi nuāranti gandhabong debatāẏe | 181 |
tote rakhibāra na yogāi re boilā | 182 |
ẏete boli mantrīki bāḷi dhariṇa se āṇilā
muṇḍa cchiḍi asura mantrī paḍila bhumira
prāṇa chāḍi kari galā se asura śarīra | 184 |
duhiṁkara bāḷa ye dhailā ẏekayoga kari
pabanā śareka bīra nija kare dhari | 186 |
uḍāiṇa dilā se paḍilā nija rājyeṇa
nagraloka dekhi ye bichāranti mane mana | 187 |
āmbha rajāra mantrīra ke kāṭakāka śira
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni yujheṣṭhi rāẏe gale
sahadeba saṅge asura yujhibāra kehi na jāṇile | 190 |
rāmakr̥ṣṇa ugrasena sahite gale āga hoi
sahadebaku asura beḍhilā na jāṇanti kehi | 191 |
śaṅkha muhurī bherī ye bājai kutūhoḷa | 193 |
ucchaba ānanda ye kahile na sarai
ahia nārīmāne bara kanyānta aile bandāi | 194 |
debakī debī bije kari aile turite | 195 |
subarṇṇara dīpabaḷī gheni bandānti sabong bāḷī | 196 |
ucchaba ānanda dvārābatī purayāka ye hoilā
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni yujheṣṭhi rahile | 199 |
kr̥ṣṇara utramāne ye yāhā nabaraku gale | 201 |
bāṭe ogāḷilā āsi kodāḷa asura nandana | 205 |
bahuta yuddha se mora saṅgatae kalā
mohora hāthare se prāṇe nāśa galā | 206 |
chāṇḍāḷa asura mote bahuta kaṣṭa dei | 207 |
pāñcha paṇḍabanta gheni sātadina ye rahile | 208 |
surekhā kanyāku padmana aneka bhoga kala | 209 |
śuṇilu ki āho bilaṁka deśa rāẏe
surekhā bibhā śuṇi pāpa kara kṣaẏe | 210 |
paḍhile śuṇīle chāḍi yiba ẏe ye pañchu bhūta mahā duṣukr̥ta | 211 |
madhu kaiṭabha māri nāma śrī madhusūdana | 212 |
śrī bimba adharaku prabhma paṭāntara nāhiṁ
bhr̥tyara dukha dekhi na saha gosāiṁ | 216 |
muhiṁ ye arakṣita na jāṇai kicchi
ẏe māẏā saṁsāra ye bhaba jaḷadhi aṭai
ẏethuṁ uddhari baikuṇṭha dia mote bhābagrāhī | 218 |
sāroḷā dāsa kabi śrī jagannāthamka caraṇe śaraṇa
ẏe bhaba jaḷadhiru mote kara uddhāraṇa | 219 |

lg.note: “surekhā bibhāśuṇī pāpa kara kṣaẏe” pādānta pare ‘ṭha’ pothire adhika pāṭha :–
mohora dukha haribe kamaḷāra pati | (ja, ṇa)
lg.head: {@kalpāsura badha@}
lg.l: baibasuta manu ye bilaṁka deśa rājā
agasi muniṁka caraṇe kale dibya pūjā | 1 |
bho muni paṇḍita mote kahila purāṇa
śuṇa ho mahārājā kuhai ye sata
garuda piṭhire thāi praḷamba kale deba hari | 9 |
māhendra pabongte yāiṁ basile beni jana | 10 |
svarga ādi kari ye jiṇilā surarāja | 13 |
kāhuṁ āsi tumbhe duheṁ ẏeṭhāre acha basi | 15 |
tumbhanta dekhi muṁ bichāra karai citte | 17 |
āja bhakṣi sustha karibaiṁ mora kāẏe
re re dhuniẏe se kalāka huṁkāri
raḍi chāḍi gadā dhari datya bīramaṇi
hariharaṁka upare gadā prahāra kalāka āṇi | 20 |
br̥ṣabha piṭhire bege bijaẏe kale deba hara
asra śasra gheniṇa ārambha kale sehu raṇa | 24 |
dekhi nārāẏaṇa ye tāra pratiasra kale
dekhiṇa dānabā ye pabongtā asra māri
bajra śara māri tāhā chedile deba hari
baraṣaṇa prāẏe kari bindhu acchi śara | 30 |
ghora dhuni śabade dhanu guṇa ṭaṁkāri
daita kaḷapā ye binddhalā lakṣe śara
garuḍa ḍeṇā bāji hoilā sabong cūra | 33 |
dānaba dr̥ṣṭi karithilā nārāja gabana karu
dui asra madhye ye hoileka bheṭa

lg.note: udeghāṭa = udghaṭa{??}, tharibā, kampibā, ulaṭa pālaṭa |
lg.l: brahmā kubera baruṇa candra sūryya biśvadebā
indra boile tebe āmbhara saja hua
āho debatāmāne tumbhe samaste bāhāna āroha | 42 |
ye yāhāra bāhāne āsa āẏudha bege gheni
gandhabong pagaḍaṁku trilocana nāma dhari rāi
indraṁka āgyāṁ pāi dhāiṁle sabong saina
saja hoi aile ye yāhāra caḍhiṇa bāhāna | 46 |
yāhāra yeuṁ asra gheni bege dhaiṁ
indra boile guru he na kaha ẏemanta
yāhāra tule yuddha karuchanti deba jagannātha | 52 |
kalpa dānabara āu rahiba kahiṁ prāṇa | 53 |
deba saini tule ye prabeśa sureśvara | 55 |
daitaku re māra boli śubhilā garudhuni
sakaḷa debatāẏe miḷiṇa binddhale tahiṁ śara
pabongta upare soriṣa buṇile yebaṇa mata hoi
tesaneka nārāja daita aṅge paḍi uchuḍai | 58 |
deba saini ḍāka hāka śubhe kutūhoḷi | 59 |
gadā bhāla chela ye śakati timbura
ghora bāna prasara bāṇa agni bāṇa bhairoba bāṇa
ajarā candrakaḷā śatrā tapanā bharaṇā sūryyātapa nibāraṇa | 63 |
kāḷa kalpa kāti tiraṇa ye bajra jībahāra | 64 |
indraśara bāruṇā śara kāḷikā meghā candra cintā
brahmāṇḍa antaka biśvaharā biśvatrāsa ciukunta śatrajitā | 65 |
prajaba tanturāja ghaṭa nakṣatra bijuḷi ghaḍaghaḍi | 66 |
dirāgaja taraḷa kaṇṭā samara jaṅgama bīrabhara
karañja arddhacandra ye karaṣaṇā ikṣu śara | 67 |
dekhiṇa deba saini ye banare bhaẏa kari
lakṣa lakṣa kari ye binddhale bandha paḍi | 71 |
ẏekā daita bīra saini nāhiṁṭi sākhā
bahuta gaja dekhi yehne keśarī niśaṁkā | 76 |
nārade yantra bīṇā gheni yuddha dekhi
re re kara śabade nācanti mana sukhī | 77 |
lg.note: lakṣa lakṣa kari ye binddhale beḍha pāri | (jha, ṭa)
lakṣa lakṣa binddhale ye kare śasra dhari | (kha_
re re kāra śabade nācanti manamukhī | (gha, cha)

lg.l: lāgu lāgu kaḷi boli nārade hasile
kali dhokaḍiru kāḍhi dhūḷi muṭhāẏe pakāile | 79 |
daita raṇa dekhiṇa bimukha kr̥ṣṇa hara
yahuṁ tāhāra dehe na phuṭilā śara
kara sudri śrṇa catra kope deba dhari | 83 |
ṭaha ṭaha hoiṇa ye hasila kalpāsura
dekhiṇa baḍa byathā ye hoilā kalpāsura
dekhiṇa baḍa byathā ye hoilā debaṁkara | 86 |
samara karanti ye manare kopa bahi | 87 |

div.note: dekhanti ānande ye brahmāṁka nandana | (ṇa, cha)

lg.l: śuṇa ho rudragaṇe pramāda ẏeka bāṇī
madhya bāṭe hoilā beni janaṁkara meḷi | 93 |
pāra yebe tumbhe ābora yāiṁ raṇa
ye yāhāra āẏudha dhari dhāiṁle ati bege
takṣaṇe miḷile yāiṁ kaḷapa yuddha lage | 101 |
re re kāra kariṇa dile bhiroba raḍi
meru mandara giri kibā paḍilāka jhaḍi | 102 |
danabaku māile ye pābongtī jyeṣṭha nāna | 113 |
diga dahana khaḍaga māile mahākāḷa bīra | 114 |
dānaba aṅge bāji ẏeḍe ẏeḍe śaramāna
na bhedilā daita aṅge śahasra helā cūrṇṇa | 119 |
bho deba birañchi bare ñcha daita amara
nicaẏe deba ẏe daita nāśilā tinipura | 121 |
ẏesaneka debe ye bhāḷanti hari meḷe
paḷāile debe ye prāṇaku kari bhīti | 124 |
br̥ṣabha garuḍa ye chāḍi deba harihara
boile caḷa tumbhe ye yāhāra pura | 126 |
ẏeteka kahi beni deba kaleka gamana
kope daita rāẏe pache achai goḍāi | 128 |
kāhiṁki yibare boli goḍāi pache ḍāka dei
daita na chāḍai goḍāẏe ghana ghana

div.note: kāhiṁki yibare boli ucce diẏe raḍi
paḷānti ye harihara bana giri māḍi | (kha)

lg.l: na dekhi daita bīra bichārai citta
keṇe gale boli se hoilā caḷita | 133 |
kare gheni beni śasra kodaḷa ye śakati | 135 |
ḍākai daita keṇe gala re beni bīre
śuṇi na śuṇilā pari hoiachanti harahari
kūṭa kari daitaku māribā boli kari | 137 |
ẏemantara samaẏe śuṇa ho baibasuta manu
kare dhanu dhari khojai gaṇṭā jība
ḍākilā rākṣasa śuṇa re kirāta tuhi
beni bīre yāuchanti dekhilu kire bhāi | 141 |
karṇṇa boilā āho dekhilā ta nāhiṁ
paḷāilā śatr̥ku ye goḍāi kāhiṁ pāiṁ | 142 |
dharma śāsra bidhi kicchi nāhuṁ kire jāṇi śuṇi
sakaḷa dharma kalā kr̥tya yete tāra
samasta nāśa yāi ye paḍai narka ghora | 144 |
ẏe kathā na yogāi śuṇilu kire bīra
boilā kirāta re bāḷuta aṭu tuhi
mohora śutr̥ dekhi chāḍilu kisa pāiṁ | 147 |
dekhi kāḷāntaka śara karṇṇa binddhalā kopa kari | 151 |
dhanya ẏe dānaba kāhāra bongśa ẏe | 153 |
dhanya ẏe āẏudha bahai ẏehāra kare
mantra paḍhi māilā se kaśyapara nāti | 155 |
dehe na bhedi nāāja paḍilā bhūmire
muna moḍi hoiṇa sehu bhūmire paḍilā | 158 |
troṇaru bāhāra hoante sapata muna hoithilā
guṇare basānte se sahasre muna hoilā | 161 |
kakadḍā māse yehne droṇa megha baraṣai | 164 |
rākṣasa upare ye paḍilā sabong śara
tiḷa br̥ṣṭi hoẏe yehne pabongta upara | 165 |
dānaba aṅge bāji tesaneka helā bāṇa
dhanya re daita boli boile bīra karṇṇa | 166 |
tuṇḍa bistāra kari tāhā giḷilā asura | 167 |
bajra asra gheni tāhā chedilā mahāchatrī | 169 |
katurī bāṇa pesi tāhā karnṇa chedilā satvara | 170 |
br̥kṣa chedi puṇa se pabongtā bāṇa māri
muna moḍi hoiṇa ye paḍilāka jhaḍi
garjanā nārāja ye binddhalā kare dhari | 173 |
ṭaha ṭaha hasilā se daita rāṇa | 174 |
boilā mānabā re pūrilā tora āṣya
dekhi bāre kirāta diśai kemanta mūrati | 178 |
ẏeteka bichāri rākṣasa chāmure tāra yāiṁ miḷi
dānaba boilā re dhanya tora pitā
dhanya re kirāta tohora garbhadhārī mātā | 180 |
dhanya tora guru dhanya ẏe bidyāẏe
mora tule yuddha kalu ẏetebeḷa yāẏe | 182 |
dhanya re kirāta mora hāthe helu nāśa
srāhāna karibi ẏebe paśi nadī jaḷa | 184 |
dhanu śasra chaḍāi ye nilā se ātreṣi | 185 |
se pabongta taḷe ye bāruṇā nāme nai
se nadīki srāhāna karibāku se gamai | 186 |

div.note: se pabongta taḷe ye bāruṇā nāme nadī<lb/>se nadīre srāna kale sabong kāryya siddhi | (jha)

lg.l: jaẏa tu anādi go brahmāra kumārī
anādi nāẏaka ye mohita hele śuṇi | 190 |
yāra pāde sebā se kari thanti nirantara | 191 |
tu ẏebe sudaẏā go kara bākyeśvarī
chāmure ubhā hoi ye kahanti māheśvarī
timiri bidāraṇa nathi kimarthe cintā kari | 195 |
kaṇṭhe basi daitaṭhāru kara yā rakṣaṇa | 197 |
nija putra kathā ye paḍilā hr̥daẏe | 199 |
sneha mane bichārai yibi āji nija pura
kāli āsi māẏeṁsa ye bhakṣibi ẏehāra | 200 |
nija pure prabeśa se hoilā taḍiti | 201 |
se amr̥ta dhara paśe karṇṇara mukhara | 204 |
śira cchedana na kari prāṇarakṣā kaẏe | 207 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
bijaẏe kale āsi yeuṁṇa ṭhāre karṇṇa | 209 |
karṇṇa kahai he bipre ẏe banaku aila kāhiṁ pāiṁ
kalpā nāme dānaba ẏe banare acchi rahi | 211 |
mohora tule se yuddha kalā apramaẏe
mote māri dhanu śasra nelāka daitarāẏe | 212 |
mohora māṁsa bhakṣaṇe acchi tāra mana
saja māẏeṁsa yebeṭi pāiba se yugate
bāsi mr̥tu māẏeṁsaku bhakṣiba kisa arthe | 214 |
tu ye mahābīra kṣatriẏa kuḷe jāta
karṇṇa boilā ye mora nāhiṁ dhanubongāṇa
dhanu troṇa nelā mora daita maharāṇa | 218 |
ki gheni yuddhaku muṁ yibaiṁ ye puṇa
kisa gheni kari rakṣā karibi chatrīpaṇa | 219 |
yuddha kari pāribuṭi ki rākṣasara tule | 220 |
karṇṇa boilā āmbhe na jāṇu āna bidyā
se bidyā uttama se guru guṇa tattu | 222 |
bairi māri pache rakhiba guru dharma
tumbhe bipra dhanuśasra kāhuṁ deba mote | 224 |
tebe se daitara chāḍiba nija prāṇa
re re kāra kariṇa ye ḍākilā rākṣasa
khaṇḍe dūra antare ye hara pītabāsa
pathara br̥ṣti se kalā karṇṇara hr̥daẏe | 232 |
dekhi kari karṇṇabīra dhanu dhari kare
mantra sumari bāṇa binddhalā yatna kari | 234 |
hr̥daẏa nābhiki ye binddhalā beni asra | 235 |
asra saṅge bāhāra hoilā datyara nija prāṇa | 236 |
nadīre snāna sāri nārāje paśile tūṇara bhitara | 237 |

div.note: kalpā tule yuddha kara na kara ho heḷā |
nirbhare srāhāna sāri śara paśile tr̥ṇara bhitare | (gha, jha)

lg.l: dhanya dhanya boli ḍākile sabong sure
kaḷapā yete kaṣṭa debanta thilā dei
āditya nandana sakāśuṁ samase sustha hoi | 239 |
baitasuta manu boile bho muni kaha mote
nirañjana cinti se śūnyaku kalā dhyāna
boile kaḷapā re māgi ghena bara
gaṇa gandhabong nāga ye paśāca kinnara | 247 |
brahmā biṣṇu agni bāẏu nairuta nāgendra | 248 |
baruṇa kubera ye tetiśa koṭi deba

div.note: “dhanya dhanya boli ḍākile sabong sure” pūbongr̥ ‘ṭa’ pothire :–
dīrgha prati dui yūṇa datya māḍiṇa paḍilā
tāhāra ghora tapa dekhi miḷile bikarttana | (ga)

lg.l: ẏe samasta śahasra mora na bhediba kāẏe
astu hou boliṇa ye boile chāẏeāpati
dānaba aṅge lepaan kaleka bajra ye bibhūti | 252 |
hr̥daẏa nābhi ye dui sthāna gabhīra
bibhūti na lāgila ye hoilā antara | 253 |
bara pāi dānaba ye galā nija sthāna | 254 |
birañchir abare se jagata sādhya kalā
aṅguḷi chedi bāṇa kale hara pītabāsa | 256 |
nārāẏaṇa tarjanī aṅguḷi cchedana yeuṁ bāṇa
mahādebaṁka kaniṣṭha aṅguḷi hoilā yeuṁ śara
bābu debaṁkara śutr̥ nāśilu ho karṇṇa | 259 |
bara māga debā boli bolanti debarāẏe
karṇṇa boilā gosāiṁ kiẏe tumbhe duheṁ | 260 |
kahanti rudra biṣṇu āmbhe aṭu benijana
śūnīna pāẏe paḍi śoila bīra karṇṇa | 261 |
tumbhanta na cihni muṁ boili mandabāṇī
mama doṣa kṣamā karasi hara catrapāṇi | 262 |
yebe baa deba dia ẏe beni śara

div.note: arka bidāraṇa = arka daityaku nāśa karithile |

lg.l: tu ye mahādānī aṭu ho rādheẏa
brāhmaṇa rūpa hoi āsibe deba dānaba nicaẏa | 264 |
ẏe bāṇe kṣaẏa hoibe brahmā harihara śatra | 266 |
ẏe kathā bichāra ye kara tora mana
śuṇi kari śire kara dila bīra karṇṇa | 267 |
gosāiṁ gupata kari ye thoibi ẏehu śara
yebe āgyāṁ hoiba mote biśuddha cittara | 268 |
karṇṇara bacane bolanti ye biṣṇu hara
āmbhe yāhā kahuchuṁ ho śuṇa mahābīra | 269 |
ẏehu asra gheni kāhāku tu na māribu
ẏe asra mahimāṁ kehi na jāṇe re bābu | 270 |
tebe se ẏe śasra gheni māribu mahāchatrī | 271 |
asra thoile karṇṇa dui jānu ciri | 272 |
harihara karṇṇa ye jāṇanti jana tini
sahadeba mantrī sabonggyaṁ se ye jāṇai
ẏehi pāñchajaṇa bhinna na jāṇanti kehi | 274 |
bara dei gale tahuṁ beni debatāẏe

div.note: “yebe āgyāṁ hoiba mote biśuddha citara” ẏehā pare<lb/>‘ṭa’ pothire –

lg.l: bho rājā kalpāsura maraṇe sabong sure
cintā chāḍile ye banitā putra gheni
duṣta nibāraṇe ye sakaḷa cintā chāḍi
sukha sindhu madhyare saburi citta buḍi | 278 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu madhyapabong rīti
subarṇna chorī karai ye surāpāne sagha | 280 |
ẏe pātekamāna nāśa yāi ẏehā śuṇi
ẏe bhāratha śuṇi dakṣiṇā dia praṇī | 281 |
bhāratha śuṇi yehu dakṣiṇā na dianti
śate janma yāẏe sehu karṇṇare badhira huanti | 282 |
āhe prāṇīmāne ye dakṣiṇā yāci deba
bhagata jana dukha nāśana śatr̥ antakārī | 286 |
dukhī dukha dekhiṇa kṣaṇeheṁ na sahanti

div.note: ye yāhāra mandire rahile subichāre | (gha, ṇa)

lg.l: teṇu kari mana mora se pāde gamaiṁ
tumbha binu muṁ ye na jāṇaiṁ ānaku
jibhvā āśre karai ye tumbhara nāmaku | 290 |
se padma patrākṣa pāde rahu mora sebā
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsaku abhaẏe bara debā | 293 | || 9287 ||

div.head: {@kumbhaka daitya badha@}

lg.l: laḍu guḍa amr̥ta kari tu bhojana
nr̥tya gīta binode toṣilu śiba mana | 2 |
matta ye mattāṅga nātha gajara mauḷi | 7 |

div.note: ahiśaẏa = ahi śaẏana, sarpa upare śaẏana |

lg.l: pahile bandai muṁ ye gaurī nandana
ananta basuki tora beni bhmajare bandhana | 10 |
ayoni sambhūte tote durgā kale jāta
agrapūjā ghenu tu sarba debatāṁka meḷe
kūṭeṇa amr̥ta laḍu tu bhakṣilu kutūhoḷe | 13 |
praśu phāśi aṁkuśa to maṇi candra ye kiraṇa
se maṇi mukuṭa tora lalāṭe ābharaṇa | 14 |
ẏe tohora caraṇe luḷu mora mātha
aneka puṇya karma kalā kṣatrī dharma rahilā | 17 |
ẏehu kebaṇa kr̥tya kale kahibā munideba | 18 |
kumbheka badha kala ye pabana tanaẏe | 19 |

div.note: ẏe mahābhārata purāṇa mote debāka biśvanātha | (ṇa, ñja)

lg.l: manuẏe boile ẏeta baḍa sandeśa prastāba
kumbhaka badha mote kahibā muni deba | 20 |
kāhāra putra se ye keuṇ kuḷe jāta
tu yāhā pachārilu bahuta kāḷara ẏe kathā | 22 |
amara bibāde tāku nāśa kale puruhūta | 24 |
teṇu se indra nāma aṭai jambhobhedī | 25 |
bhāsakara nandana ye aṭai arka nāme asura | 27 |
sabongdā ābori thāi sehu arka name tīrtha
kaṇaẏabindu bibāde tāku nāśa kale āditya | 28 |
arka daita nandana ye udapā asura boli
ẏehāku badha kale ye kārttika ṣaḍaśira | 32 |
harihara bibāde tāku karṇṇa kale hata | 33 |
toṣe nirañjana nātha tāku deithile bara | 35 |
deba dānabe ye nohibaiṁ muhiṁ badha
astu hou boliṇa ye boile bibudha | 36 |
manuṣyanta chāra boli na kalā se bhīti
ratha gaja aśva thāṭha saini nāhiṁ tule
brahmā sura indra rudra jiṇai se ẏekasare yuddha kale | 38 |
se kumbheka kdaita diai ākāśaku dhāḍi
kubera bhaṇḍāra ye āṇai jūra kari | 39 |
yama agni nairuta ye āura grahagaṇa | 41 |
ẏemāne samaste ye samara ghora kale
taitiḷa nāme karaṇa śubha nāme yoge
rohiṇī ghare se dina br̥ṣa candra bhoga | 44 |
aneka sānanda se ye deba maghabānā | 45 |
basanta utsaba se ye yātrara bidhāna
nandana bana ye ākāśa gaṅgā kūḷe
maha sambhabongeṇa ye sabonge gīta nr̥tya kari | 48 |
sā, ri, ga, ma, pa, dha, ni, sā sapata svara bīṇā
keśi medhā sumedhā bibhāṣī śānti sundarī | 51 |
ẏemanta samaẏe bāhilā ye kumbheka asura | 59 |
saṅge lakṣeka gandhabong ye tāhāra sārikṣā | 62 |
karanti yātrā se ye ākāśa gaṅgā tīra | 63 |
dhāiṁle bidyādhare ye re re kāra kari
dekhiṇa sānanda se ye kumbhaka daita kari
keśa dhari bulāi se sabunti diai phiṅgi
na dekhi dānaba ye bhramai ātreṣi | 71 |
dekhiṇa pūjā kale tāṁku deba sunāśīra | 72 |
indra boile ho tumbhe brahmāṁka kumara
kisa sampāde āsicha kaha tumbhe mohora āgara | 73 |
amarābatī nāśa kalā tora aśḷeṣāra nāti | 74 |
āmbhe yāuachuṁ ho ye yāhā bhmabanaku | 77 |
indra boile tumbhe ẏemanta na kaha
ratha gaja aśva bahuta saina sāja
upare thoile nei chela catra bhūṣaṇḍī | 82 |

div.note: tahiṁki āboriṇa kaṇṭeka tīkṣa kāti<lb/>batiśa āẏudha kaṣuacchi mahā rīti | (gha, cha)

lg.l: upareṇa śobhā śukaḷa pāṭa acchi khañji
kumbhasthaḷa maṇḍaṇi ye bibidha ratna khañji
mukutāra tule ye hīrā nīḷā puñji puñji | 88 |
sehnāra upare ye māṇīkya keṇḍā keṇḍā
tahiṁra pākhare ye tribidha ratna khañjaṇī
bāgalāṭa ghora ye mastake acchi śohi
kirīṭī mukuṭa śire pārija taka māḷa
hāthīra upare ye batiśa āẏudha rakhanti
chela catra gadā ye bhūṣaṇḍī muṣaḷī
ẏe bidhi batiśa āẏudha kaṣicchi mahābaḷī | 95 |
re re dānaba boli ugāḷīle yāiṁ | 96 |
samaste dhāiṁṇa ye piṭile kopa mane | 97 |

div.note: upare śohe māṇikya maṇi karā kerā<lb/>caukatire lambai aṣṭa ratna jharā | (ṭa, cha)
bāgalāṭa ghore ye abheda bajra rahi | (ṇa)
hāthīra upare batiśa āẏudha khañji |<lb/>konta khaḍaga lāṁkiā dhanuśara sāji | (jha, ṇa)

lg.l: śahasra paḍante asure na karanti bhaẏe
se tāhā maṇḍanti ye picikā jaḷa praẏe | 98 |
āpaṇe deba indra ye aneka samara kalā
deba śasramāna tāra śarīre cūra galā | 99 |
bajra śakati bulāi bāsaba kope piṭi
kandara cūra hoẏe yebaṇa bajra paḍi
daita muṇḍe paḍi se galāka upuḍi | 101 |
kopeṇa kampai se duṣṭa ye danuja | 102 |
kopeṇa danaba ye re re kāra kari
dhaiṁṇa pitāi ye mudugara kare dhari | 103 |
aneka se jūra kalā deba bhaṇḍāramāna
mahāmattā bīra se āsai khara kari
amara bhagna dekhi se aḷakāra pati
pure pure paśi se na pāilā kicchi
na paiṇa dānaba bāhuḍai ati begi | 118 |
kāḷa bikāḷa citragupata yamaku āsibaiṁ gheni | 121 |
amara pada libhāibi pocchibi yamarājā pāñji | 122 |

div.note: “aḷakā pure yāi hoilā parabeśa” pare (ṭha) pothire –
sainiṁku bole paḷāi yibā āmbhe āsa |
naba sāgara ye dakṣa rājāra saini
kumbhaka asurara rupa barṇṇanā, adhikā ‘ṭa’ pothire acchi |

lg.l: udaẏagiri bhedi svāmī bije kamaḷa biḷāsa | 123 |
bhīmasene hakāri āgyāṁ dile dharmara tanaẏe | 124 |
bābu dibasā pitr̥ śrāddha re hoiba paridina
banastaru gaṇḍā goṭiẏe māri āṇa re bhīmasena | 125 |
nirjhara jhara aṭābī giri kandara latā
rajanī prabhāte puṇa hoilā bege saja | 128 |
kicchihiṁ na pāiṇa tahuṁ kumbheka asura
bhāñjiṇa jūra kalā se sañjībanī pura | 134 |
meḍha maṇḍopa jagatī aṭā{??}ḷī ādi kari
debatā mānanta se sādhya kalā yuddhe | 136 |
ruṣi bipra tapodhane ye na rahanti kehi
ẏekā dibasake bhrami pārara saptadīpā mahī | 137 |
kumbhakara bhaẏe muṁ rahi na parai svarge | 140 |
debatāṁka kaṣṭa dekhi abanī kalāka guhāri
biṣṇunāthe janama hoile mānaba deha dhari | 143 |
se jāta hoiachanti asura badha arthe | 144 |
svarge debatānti ye na pāiṇa loḍi
kapiḷāsa kandaraku se dānaba dilā dhāḍi | 146 |
lg.note: debatāṁka samare se nohai apahāra | [cha, kha, ṭha, ṭa]
“paridina teradaṇḍa madhye mariba asura” pare ‘jha’ pothire –
gadabara bulai se dhāmaiṁ ati bege
lg.l: gadābara bulāi se dhāmaiṁ ati baḷe
gadā mudugara ye konta khaḍaga yāṭhi
chela bhāla lāṁkiā ye śakati śūḷa sabeḷi
amoha parigha ye ābara bajra muṣaḷī | 152 |
ajaṅga pinākī ye akṣaẏe troṇa dhari
hemabanta pabongta jāṇi diśai tāhāra gātra | 154 |
gad mudugara ye śakati konta yāṭhi
re re kāra śabade sabonge goḍāiṇa piṭi | 156 |
akāṭa aphuṭa ye asura śarīra goṭi
goḍāi pahija kalā se pāñcha sāta yojanae | 160 |
lg.note: goḍāi paẏeḍa kālā pāñchaśata yojane | [ṭa, cha]

lg.l: koṭiẏe sahasra baḷa śrīkare pināka nāme dhanu
akṣaẏe troṇa śara kandhe śobhita pañchamanu | 162 |
hr̥deṇa basuki ye pannaga kaṇṭhe hāra
soma sūryya bahani ye naẏana prakhara | 163 |
śibagaṇanta chāḍi se asura bege yāiṁ
asura boilā tu śuṇa deba hara
mohora ajāku badhilā to pua kārttikeśvara | 166 |
īśvare boile se ugra bara pāi
aḷape nāśagalā se debe dvāndī hoi | 167 |
dāneba boilā tu sabukuhiṁ deu bara
mote bara na deu tu keuṇa bichāra | 168 |
abhagate bara ki se huai parāpata | 169 |
dānaba boilā tu na dile bhale bara
tote māri gheniyibi ẏe kapiḷāsa kandara | 170 |
ẏete boli se dānaba bīra bege dhāiṁ
andhaka tripura yehu badha kalā ẏekā
dānaba mūrtti dekhi mane kalā śaṁkā | 172 |
aneka śahasr svāmī piṣile deba hara
asura dehe tā paḍi hoigalā cūra | 173 |
re re kāra śabade asura bīra uṭhi
samare ghuñchi se āḍe hoigale debasvāmī
kumbheka bichārai se kapiḷāsa pura nemi | 177 |
goḍāi īśvare śūḷ apacheṇa nei piṭi | 179 |
na jāṇi dānaba ye paḷāi kharatara | 180 |
mathāru pabongta ye dhailā bāma kare
ḍāhāṇa kare gadā dhari leuṭilā kopabhare | 182 |
re re kāra śabade dhāmaiṁ daita rāge
na rahanti īśvare paḷābanti ati bege | 184 |
mr̥gaẏā binode se bhramai ghora bana | 185 |
se pabongta uparaku uṭhai māruti mahabaḷī | 186 |
īśānya bhārāre se sāhere yāiṁ phuṭi | 187 |
lg.note: se pabongta uparaku uṭhai māruti gaṇḍājība māri | [ṭa, ṭha]
lg.l: karañja banastaku se pabongta īśvānya koṇe
tahiṁki hara udyāna bana biśāśate yojane | 188 |
se pabongta upare bhīmasena uṭhai begi
mr̥ga śaambara ye barehā gaṇḍājība jagi | 189 |
bhāḷai maruti ye muṁ karibaiṁ āja kisa
kaṭāḷī goḍaiṇa acchi dānaba bīra yodhī
ārata hoiṇa se deba pañchu mukha
āho pābani tu śaraṇa mote rakha | 193 |
īśvaraṁka tahuṁ ye kaṣṭhora bacana śuṇi
pabongtuṁ ḍeiṁ paḍile se kāḷadaṇḍa pāṇi | 194 |
bhīmasena boilā ho raha raha dānaba
bhīmasena bacana ye śubhilā dānaba karṇṇaku
pabongta uparaku se uṭhante ati bege
bhīmasena mūrtti dekhi se asura bege rahi
asura boilā re mānaba mātra hoi
ẏeḍe baḍa darpa bahuachu kisa pāiṁ | 200 |
brahmā rudra candra indra yāhāku sāṁgrāme nuhantiṭi sari
tu mānaba mātraka re rakhu mohor abairi | 201 |
śaraṇa boile re upekhi ta nuārai | 202 |
yatane yāha loḍai se āpaṇe parāpata
bhīmasena kopilā ye asura mūrtti dekhi
yadyapi svarga mañcha pātāḷa tu jiṇilu asura
āja tora pāñji re pocchilā nāśakara | 207 |
kapiḷāsa kandara rakhibi āja tote māri
ākāśara kaṣṭa re ājahuṁ galā pāri | 208 |
śabade giri kandara paḍilā ki bhāji | 210 |
āre āre mānabā boli dānaba bīra | 212 |
lohāra beni gadā śate śate bhāra garu
digapāḷe kampile se gadā prahāra karu karu | 213 |
puṇa āreka gadā ye bulāi asura
sambhāḷa sambhāḷa boli asura bīra gadā piṭi
satara lakṣa yojane thāi tāhā jāṇile padmayoni | 218 |
kandare kampile se bhīmasena gadābara bātaghāẏe | 219 |
bhīmasena gadā ye asura aṅge paḍi
sahasre khaṇḍa hoi ye bhāji hoilā cūri | 222 |
dekhiṇa paḍiṇa se ye datyara gadābara
sahasre khaṇḍa hoiṇa se gadā galā cūra | 225 |
gadābara bibhaṅga dekhi asura bīra rāge
pabongte upaḍi se dhāiṁlā ati bege | 226 |
antabīkṣa mārgaṇa se ye bulāi pabongta
bhīmasena upare se neiṇa piṭilā daita | 227 |
dhūḷi hoi uḍila se gagana andhakāra | 228 |
ākaśe śubhilā sādhu sādhu re pābeni
ẏeteka kale bābu sustha hoiba ākāśa | 231 |
maharṇṇaba praẏe hoi bahani jaḷi uṭhi | 233 |
brikodara mūrati dekhi asura kalā bhaẏe | 234 |
bhmaje bhmaja bhiḍābhiḍi pāde pāda chandāchandi
śire śira paḍitāḷa hr̥de hr̥da bānddha | 237 |
beni bīre samare ye aṭanti mahābaḷī
digapaḷamāne impile ye śuṇi duhiṁka mukharaḍi
āre āre mānaba tu yibu nice yamapura | 242 |
lg.note: śiḷā br̥kṣamāne sabu houchanti dhūḷi | (ṇa, ṭa)

lg.l: tu mānabā hoi re mote nirodha kari | 243 |
sādhu sādhu mahimā tora garbhadhārī jananī
tote ye jāta kalā tora dhani | 244 |
bīrapaṇe sari tote nāhiṁ re rabi taḷe
mohora tule paḍitāḷa tu dilu ẏetebeḷe | 245 |
tote prāṇe māri nemaiṁ īśvaranta āja dhari
sumara re mānabā tohora pitā mātā
sumara mānabā re tohora iṣṭa ye debatā | 247 |
asura pratagyāṁ ye ugra bacana śuṇi
brikodara murati se dhailā bīra bhīma | 250 |
taḷeṇa asura ye upareṇa bīa bhīma
jantu bināśane yehne diśai dutī yama | 253 |
bhīmasena boilā re ẏete māna bharasu
jaḷantā anaḷe dekhu dekhu tuhi jhāsu | 254 |
āja se tohora pāñji pocchilā jantu airi
hoilu nirekha āja tote kehu rakṣā kari pāri | 256 |
yesaneka meru phuṭi gaṅgā yamunā sarasvatī tini dhāra
toṭi māḍibasilā se tāhāra bāma karagate
ḍāhāṇa bhmaje bīra ye mailā bajramuthe | 262 |
puṇa puṇa bīra mārai karasthaḷa toḷi
bhāṅgiṇa muṇḍa tāhāra kalāka se dhūḷi | 263 |
piṇḍaru prāṇa tāra hāde galāka chāḍi
asura badha kari ubhā bhīra brikodara
dekhai sanidhe ye nāhānti deba hara | 265 |
asuraku badha kala beḷa daṇḍa tera | 266 |
ākāśuṁ śubhilā ye sādhu sādhu bāṇī
bhīmasena mathāre puṣpa br̥ṣṭi kael deba catrapāṇi | 267 |
sādhu sādhu pābani tu kāḷebara ṣaṇ{??}ā
asura baḷa niśodhana teṇu tu bīrabara pracaṇḍā | 268 |
īśvare boile tu ho śuṇa brikodara
yesaneka bāñcchā tora māgi ghena bara | 270 |
bhīmasena boilā yebe anagr̥ha mote kala hāde
ẏete kahi kapiḷāsa gale deba hara
nija sthāne basāile nei kapiḷāsa kandara | 273 |
bhikhi banare gaṇḍā dui goṭi māilā | 274 |
prabeśa māruti beḷa prahara ye tini | 275 |
digāṅga basaan nātha aṅge śohe ahi | 277 |
ḍibi ḍibi ḍambaru ye bādya ghana ḍāki
soma sūryya bahani birājita tini ḍoḷā | 279 |
kāñchi kaḷāñchi ye beni asuranta badhī | 282 |
beda bidyā bāde ye pitāra muṇḍa moḍi
mahayoga sādhi se hatyaku pāra kari | 283 |
anaṅga sundara nātha pannaga hr̥de hāra
jvaḷita bahani ye gaḷita amiẏa rasa
sebaka jananta nātha dhana ratna sukhāsana
parakaiṁ sampada dei āpaṇe deba śūnya | 286 |
para dukhe kātara nātha draśane pāpa hari
andha kuṣṭha daridra nātha yāhāre hoi pāri | 287 |
kiñchita bhagate nātha bahuta bara dātā
bhābaku bhābanā nātha saṁsāra bhāba cintā | 288 |
kaḷikāḷa saṁsāre nātha paḍi hoili muṁ bhāsi
ẏethu taribāku mote mukati gati desi | 289 |
śrī rudra debatā ye yogadhyāne santate
citra utpaḷā nadī īśānī bhaga kūḷe | 292 |
tahiṁra sannidhye ye sāroḷā boli grāma
rudhira draśane ye sabongdā mana rañji | 295 |
batsā carānteṇa gopa kumaraṁka saṅge hari
karma bhoga bujhilu go caḷa ẏethu mẏe
kanakābatī pāṭaṇāre bije kara go samaẏe | 298 |
candrabhāgā arka tīrtha īśāna koṇa āḍe | 299 |
kaḷikāḷa dhvaṁsane mā go siddha saroḷā caṇḍī mūrtti | 300 |
se mote prasanne ye kahile siddhagranthe
muhiṁ tāhā bañchāili saṁsāra jana hite | 301 |
āhe br̥ddha janamāne mora na ghenimā doṣa
janme janme mūrkha muhiṁ buddhi mora kisa | 302 |
śrīcaṇḍī prasnne mora nāma sāroḷa dāsa | 303 | 9590 |
lg.head: {@dharma yajñara prastāba@}
lg.l: ẏethu anantare ye bilaṁka deśa rājā
ṣaḍa arghya dei pūjā kale ghaṭaruṣi tanujā | 1 |
daẏā kari kahucha mote śrībiṣṇu purāṇa
teṇu kari kr̥tārtha hoilā mohora pañchupraāṇa | 3 |
na pachārile ta kr̥tārtha nohiba mora dehī
teṇu kari prārthanā ye karucchi gosāiṁ | 5 |
thoke ta kahila mote apūbong kathāmāna

lg.note: dharma yajñara prastāba–ci:dra: –kha, gha, cha, ka, ṭha, ṇa, ẏe pothimānagkaru lekhā hoicchi |

lg.l: tebe se mana mohora hoibāka sthira | 7 |
asambhaba kathā ta pachārilu ho rājana | 8 |
ẏemanta boli muni purāṇa pothi phei
boile śuṇa tu ho bilaṁka deśa narasāiṁ | 9 |
nārada bije kale āsi mañcha maṇḍaḷara | 10 |
daṇḍa kamaṇḍaḷu dhoti chatā piḍhā kaṣā basana
kaḷi dhokaḍi muṇi ye kākhare yākiṇa | 11 |
kuru sāgara saini ye achanti caupaśe
aṭhara kṣauṇī baḷa ye achanti pāruśe | 13 |
ābara achanti bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya śakuni sahite
dhuśāsana mūḷe śate bhāi achanti agrate | 14 |
yujheṣṭhi bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba mūḷe
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni achanti āstāna upare | 15 |
kuru pāṇḍaba beni abheda ātmā hoi
ẏemantara samaẏe nārada miḷile tahiṁ yāiṁ
āstāna uparaku se ye gale bega hoi | 17 |
nārada muniṁki dekhi ye uṭhile samaste
bhīṣma droṇa sahite ye namaskāra kale
svasti svasti kalyāṇa ye nārade bāñcchi le | 19 |
pādārghya deiṇa boile basa ho muniẏe | 20 |
āja mohora kr̥tārtha ye hoilā jībana
daẏā kari śaṅkhoḷi mote aila brahmāṁka nandana | 21 |
ẏete boli rājā śutilā caraṇa dui dhari
nārade boile uṭha uṭha ho daṇḍadhārī | 22 |
tohora ṭhābare āmbhara ye bahuta biśvāsa
teṇu kari śaṅkhoḷi ailu ho dhr̥tirāṣṭa śiṣa | 23 |
āẏuṣa barddhuta hou dhana dhānya hou parāpata
ẏemantara beḷe tahiṁ ye āstāna mauḷilā
boilā gosāiṁ he tumbhe kāhiṁki ye yiba
daẏāthile ājaka ye mo pure rahiba | 26 |
daṇḍeheṁ keuṇa ṭhāre āmbhe na rahu sthira hoi | 27 |
thae śaṅkhoḷi āsibu āmbhe nāga debatāṁku | 28 |
sāta kṣauṇī baḷa gheni paṇḍura kumare
ṣāṭhiẏesahasra ruṣinta tu ho nitye deu anna
satyabadī puruṣa tu aṭu paṇḍura nandana | 33 |
anna dei oṣuchanti mote dhr̥tirāṣṭaṁka kumara | 35 |
āmbhara kathā tu yebe yujheṣṭhi karibu | 36 |
yāha boliba tāhā karibi śakya thile muni he nicaẏe | 37 |
muni boile tumbhe yāga goṭiẏe ye kara
yujheṣṭhi boile mora ẏeḍe bhāgya kāhiṁ
anna basa dei mote poṣuchanti kurusāiṁ | 39 |
nārade boile tu na bichāra kicchi
tote kicchi apūbong nohai ho dhana
ẏethaku kicchi na kara ho dharmara nandana | 41 |
naradaṁka sampāda bābu ye śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁku kahi
gheniāsa bābu nārade ẏethe thāntu rahi | 44 |
tu ye pachārilu mote nakuḷa kontamune pr̥thirī dhāraṇa prastāba
ẏekamane śuṇa bābu muṁ kahai tahiṁra ye bhāba | 47 |
namaskāra kari bāhāra hoiā indraṁkara śiṣi | 48 |
boile āmbha puraku succhi arjuna bije kari | 52 |
ẏemantara samaẏe śīkr̥ṣṇa nagara dvāre arjuna miḷile
sapata dvāra jiṇiṇa ye bhitare paśile | 53 |
āsa āsa pārtha tu ye mohora pañchuprāṇa
tohoṛhāre abhinna mora kebeheṁ nāhiṁ puṇa | 59 |
uṭha uṭha boliṇa ye boile bāsudeba
āja mohora dvārikā pura śobhābana diśiba | 61 |
lg.note: āja mora parama bhāgya diśiba | (gha, cha, kha, ṭha)

lg.l: śatr̥ māriṇa huasi pañchu kaṭake rājana
tinipura madhye pātha tumbhe pāa pūjā
bhranti tumbhara nāhiṁ ho kointāṁkara tanaẏe | 65 |
ẏethu anantare manu rājā ye pachāri
ẏekamane śaṇa tu ho blaṁka cūḍāmaṇi | 68 |
pāda pakhāḷa ho tumbhe paṇḍura dulāḷa | 70 |
pāda pakhāḷi kari tahiṁ bīra arajuna
paẏara pochanti ye gheni sujhīna basana | 72 |

lg.note: boile lakṣmī toṭhare hoile sadaẏā | (gha, na, cha, ṭha)

lg.l: āmbhanta saṅkhoḷibā nimante aila ki bibatsi | 76 |
ṭhākuraṁkara āgyāṁ ki tohora kāryya arthe
ẏe kthā tote ye pachārai bīra pāthe | 77 |
āmbhara pure bije kale nārada munibara | 78 |
āpaṇā kāryya arthe dharmayāga goṭiẏe bhiāiba | 79 |
yāga karibāku mora kisa śakya ye boile | 80 |
ẏethaku kisa cintā tumbhara ye mana | 81 |
bega kari randhana kara go śatrājitara śiṣi | 85 |
ṭhākuraṁka āgyāṁ pāi debī bege caḷigale
pakhāḷa kariā gheni arjuna mathā pocchile
aṅge gandha candana ye catusama lepile | 89 |
nāna barṇṇe puṣpa śira gabāhre khañjile | 90 |
nānā aḷaṁkāra ye arjuna aṅge khañji
bicitra āsana se ye sajāḍichanti bhale | 92 |
subarṇṇara pīḍha se ye basibāku dei
nānabarṇṇe piṭhā ye tahiṁ paraśanti āṇi
nārade kisa carita tahiṁ achanti bhiāi | 107 |
nārade achantiṭi ki mote bāṭa chāhiṁ
āmbhe gale svargaku se yibeka munisāiṁ | 108 |
arjunaku gheniṇa bainetra piṭhire bijaẏe bhabagrāhī | 109 |
caitana kahanti tumbhe śuṇa ho manurāẏe
maha bhāratha carita ẏe amr̥ta rasamaẏe | 110 |
caturddhā mūrati ratna siṁghāsane bijaẏe śrīpati | 112 |
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni tahiṁ bijaẏe śrībacchi | 114 |
se rūpa cintibāku kāhāra śakya acchi
mūrkha apaṇḍita muhiṁ na jāṇai kicchi | 116 |
tuḷusāra ballabha caraṇu mora āna nāhiṁ
mūrkha sāroḷa dāsaku rakha he bhābagrāhī | 117 |
ẏethu anantare ye śuṇa bilaṁka rājana
ẏe madhyapabong carita ye bicitra kathana | 118 |
uṭha uṭha boliṇa yujheṣṭhi āgyām dile | 123 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇara chāmure se yāiṁṇa ubhā hoẏe | 124 |
kalyāṇa bāñcchā se ye karanti āpaṇa | 126 |
uṭha uṭha ho brikodara bolanti debasvāmī | 127 |
ye yāhāra mānyadharma sakaḷa ye sāri
muniṁki dekhi hari arjuna namaskāra kale
āstāne basa boli śrīmukhe āgyāṁ dile | 132 |
kaḷahapriẏa muni kisa acha he bhiāi | 134 |
dharmayāga boli acchi yāga ye goṭiẏe
bhiāṇa karichu tāhā śuṇa ho debarāẏe | 136 |
dhana dhānya lakṣmī ye hoiba parāpata
svargapure basibe ye sapta puruṣa loke ta | 137 |
ghr̥ta yaba tiḷa samidha agnire deuthibe | 139 |
ghr̥ta deuthibe se ye kṣaṇe na biśoiṁ | 141 |
nirāśa na kariba dukhī daridra janamāna | 142 |
hasiṇa bolu chanti ye deba catrapāṇi | 143 |
ẏete sampadaku dhana kāhiṁ acchi yujheṣṭhi debaṁkara
ẏe kathā kimpāi tumbhe kahila munibara | 144 |
mohora manaku ẏe sarbathā na āsai
tumbha parā muni ẏehā prabarttāile kisa pāiṁ | 145 |
rājā baraṇaku ẏehāṁkara śakya acchi kāhiṁ
duṣṭa rājāmāne ye mahīre chanti rahi | 146 |
rājāẏe na aile ta yāga dharma na paibā
gobindaṁka mukharu narada ẏesana niṣṭhura bacana śuṇi
puṇi bacana se kahanti nārada mahāmuni | 148 |
ẏe kathā yujheṣṭhiṁku ye na kaha kebeheṁ
khāṇḍaba bana dahane agniku upakāra kariṇa achanti arjuna | 150 |
ludubudu byādhi hoi se tini yuga yāẏe thile
mandāagni hoiṇa se āhāra na bhakṣile
arjunaku prasanna hoiṇa se boile bacana
ghr̥ta bhojana mote debuṭi paṇḍura nandana | 153 |
yāga kariṇa tuhi mote ghr̥ta tiḷa debu
tebe se kṣudhā mora nibāra karibu | 154 |
ẏeteka bacana yahuṁ agni debatā kahile
heu boliṇa ye arjuna kariacchi satya
kemanta kari arjuna agniku na debaṭi ghr̥ta | 156 |
arjuna boile muṁ satya kariacchi pūbonge
ẏebe kemante nāsti muṁ karibi bāsudebe | 158 |
ẏehā śuṇi hasile ye deba catradhārī
boile agni debatāẏe aṭanti baḍa upugārī | 159 |
toṣe tote deiachanti śuṇa ho gāṇḍima pāṇi | 160 |
tumbhe yāga karibā ta aṭai bihita
ẏethaku kisa bichāra karibā bīra pātha | 161 |
lakṣe rājā baraṇaku ta kāḷa samaẏa nāhiṁ
nārade boile tume yujheṣṭhiṁki ye pachāra
kahibāra kathā sina āmbhe jāṇu ho dāmodara | 165 |
kisa bichāra karibā āgyāṁ hou ye boile | 166 |
yujheṣṭhi boile ye kisa mohora śakya
anna dei poṣucchi ta mote ambikāra baccha | 167
mohore ẏe kathā ye kebeheṁ nohai
ẏete kahi yujheṣṭhi ye hoile maruna
tahuṁ hr̥dagate cintā karanti deba bhagabāna | 169 |
bahuta dharma udita hoiba dhana dhānya | 171
tmbhara āgyāṁẏe yāga karibe yujheṣṭhi nr̥pamaṇi | 173 |
bīṇāyantra bāi nārade gale toṣa hoi | 174 |
nāradaṁka caraṇe śaraṇa kabi sāroḷā dāsa | 175 | 9765 |
lg.head: {@dharmayajñara āẏojana@}
lg.l: ẏethu anantare tahuṁ manu pucchā kari
kisa carita hoilā mote kaha tapachārī | 1 |
santoṣa citte śuṇa ho bilaṁka nr̥pabara | 2 |
chāri bhāinta gheni yujheṣṭhi bije kalā | 3 |
āpaṇe bije kale yāiṁ kointāṁka nabare | 4 |
aneka kalyāṇa ye kale kointā deī
putra pautrī mora bratī achanti kṣameṇa | 7 |
śuṇiṇa kointā debī mane ānanda hoi
bega kariṇa pākasañchā karāa go āī
chaḍarasa prakāre byañjana randhāra tega hoi | 10 |
ẏe bacana śuṇiṇa bhitara puraku kointā debī caḷigale
yāhā se bhojana karibe deba janārddna | 13 |
kointā bile tumbhe uṭha ho catradhara
biḷamba na kara beḷa helaṇi uchura | 15 |
dibya uriāre se ye bāsaghia lāi
nāna barṇṇe tiuṇa paraśanti kointā deī | 18 |
khiri khirisā se ye paraśile āṇi
gaṅgāpāṇi gheni se ye kaleka āñchobana | 22 |
karpūra biḍiā ye pāna āṇi dile
śuṇa ho manu puruṣa badaẏanti agasti
pañcha bhāinta sehu ye ẏekāntare rāi | 25 |
yāga karibāku kicchi bichāra na kara
rājusi yāga āgaku rājā karibā nimanta | 27 |
lakṣe rājā baraṇaku samaẏa mora nāhi
kisa kisa karibā boli bhāḷanti bhābagrāhī | 28 |
nārāẏaṇa sumarante kaḷahapriẏa muni tā jāṇile | 29 |
lakṣe rājā baraṇaku samaẏā na pāibā
nārade boile ye buddhiẏe mora acchi
ẏethaku cintā kicchi na kara śirībacchi | 34 |
lakṣe rājānta ẏethe baraṇa na kari
chāridigu chāri rājā āṇmā śreṣṭha kari | 35 |
ẏerūpe chaḍajaṇa rājā gheni yāga karibā āropaṇa
ẏethaku cintā tumbhe na kara nārāẏaṇa | 37 |
nārada boile gaṅgākūḷe yāgaśāḷa karibā niribāṇa
jaḷa sulabha tahiṁ ye pāibā nārāẏaṇa | 40 |
nārada kahanti tumbhe śuṇa deba dāmodara
chāridiga madhyare ye hastinā nagara goṭi
pannagānarẏaṇa ẏehāra hātha pāde padma ukuṭai | 44 |
ẏehā ta āpaṇe tumbhe jāṇicha parimāṇi | 45 |
ẏekathā tora manaku ailā ki bhābagrāhī | 47 |
jagannāthe boile muhiṁ jāṇili ẏe dui rājā
āu dui rājāṁka carita kaha brahmāṁka tanujā | 48 |
nārada boile āhuri rājā ẏeka acchi
tote ḍariṇa tāhā muṁ na kahai śirībacchi | 49 |
gobinde boile mane na kara kicchi bhrānti
saṁśaẏa pheḍiṇa ẏehā mote kahiba mahāyati | 50 |
se rājā aile sabu kathā heba bhala
lakṣe rājā samāne ẏe hoibāka tula | 52 |
ẏehā śuṇi hasile ye deba catradhara
nārade boile ho na kara kicchi cintā
āmbhe tāṁku āṇibu na kara mane byathā | 54 |
gobinde boile āmbhanta dekhile se kaḷi ārambhiba
dvanda kaḷi hoile ye yāga hoibāka naṣṭa
ẏethira carita mote kaha brahmāṁkara chāṭa | 56 |
dvanda kaḷi nohiba āmbhe tāṁku tiāribu bhale | 57 |
ẏethaku saṁśaẏe tumbhe na kara janārddana
ẏehāre deba kāryya hoiba baḍa jāṇa | 58 |
ẏe kathā śuṇi tūnī hoile nārāṇa
āmbhara kahanteṇa se tūnī hoiṇa rahibe | 61 |
ẏe kathāku tumbhe thāa he parimāṇi | 62 |
āu ẏethu uttāre keuṁ rājā kuha mahāmunya | 63 |
rājāẏe acchi ye puṇa meru mekhaḷeṇa | 64 |
thāṭha saina nāhiṁ ẏekā karai rājyabhāra | 65 |
kemante āsiba se ẏeḍe duṣṭa jana | 68 |
nārade boile hari nohai se dūra
meru mandara boli nama se pabongtara | 69 |
meru mekhaḷaku se sīmā ye lāgai
tāhāra nāma kisa kahibā muni dehī | 71 |
śrī kr̥ṣṇaṁkara bāṇī śuṇi nārade kahanti
pañchu ātmā tāhāṁkara kāma jaḷare buḍlā | 77 |
aneka prakāre se ye surati bhoga kale
surati rasare sehu bindu ye ṭāḷile | 79 |
se amoha reta rahilā mr̥guṇī garbheṇa | 80 |
putra prasabi mr̥guṇī galā svarga āḷe
kṣīra na pāiṇa putra robai bikaḷe | 82 |
śūnye rahiṇa sehu ye byāsaṁku kahile | 83 |
tumbhara bīryye sehu ye janama labhicchi | 84 |
dharma debatāra mukhuṁ ẏesaneka bākya śuṇi
se putraku āṇiṇa ye paḷile munimaṇi | 86 |
śahasra śāhāsra bidyā tāku aneka śikhāile
bahuta kalyāṇa kariṇa se bara dile | 87 |
cira āiṣa hoi raha ẏehu pr̥thibongre
pr̥thīra rājāẏe tote jiṇi nuārantu samare | 88 |
ẏe kaḷe yuddha tuhi karibu kumara
ẏekā dhanuẏe ẏekā nārāja dharithibu kara | 89 |
nāma goṭi tāhāra ye dile mr̥gasena
meru mandara pabongte dile tāku sthāna | 90 |
baḍa saṁśaẏa mote ye lāgilā gosāiṁ
yāhā pachāribi mote pheḍi kahibāka tahiṁ | 93 |
śāpa pāi mr̥ga ghare janama labhilā | 96 |
ẏehā śuṇi bilaṁka deśa rājā pachārilā puṇi
agasti kahanti tu ho manurāẏe śuṇa
indrara putra ye sura gandharba ẏekajaṇa | 99 |
menakāra jhia ye kuntaḷā tā nāma | 100 |
sundara paṇe tāku ye paṭāntara nāhiṁ

rukmiṇī satyabhāmā mūḷe aṣṭapāṭabongśī draśana āsi kale | 134 |
ẏe sabu bhiāṇa āpaṇe sina karicha boile | 136 |
ẏehā biśeṣiṇa mote kaha kumbharuṣi śiṣa | 139 |
agasti kahanti tu ho śuna manurāṇa
kaha muni mote toṣa citta hoi
dudha dei ghr̥ta mote acha ho luchāi | 141 |
namaste bimaḷā mā go namo narāẏaṇī
saṁsāra jane mā go to nāma bakhāṇi | 142 |
durgati khaṇḍanī mā go kamaḷa āsanī
nityeheṁ tora nāma yehu karai sumaraṇa
sudaẏā citte mā go daẏākara mote
sāroḷā dāsaku go rakha jagatara māte | 145 |
jaẏa jaẏa sabongmaṅgaḷa go saṁkaṭa tāriṇī
rājāghare tote ye bhoga khañjā nāhiṁ
saṁksāra janaku go moho khāu tuhi | 148 |
asura bināśinī mā go nāma to yighnasenī
mūhiṁ ye araṣita aṭai sāroḷa caṇḍī dāsa
janme janme tohora caraṇaku mora āsa | 151 |
tāhāku bibhā helu nātha sambhare meḷa mati | 153 |
śūdramuni sāroḷā dāsa tā caraṇe śaraṇa | 155 |
jaẏa tu nāraẏaṇī go anādi śakati
dhanu dhariṇa tu caṇḍa yuddhara kāḷe māẏe
dhanu dhailu tu go cauda manu yāẏe | 158 |
yahuṁ rakatabīryya tu kalu debī dhvaṁsa
tāhāra rakata janmilā se upumjila bongśa | 159 |
māri cintā kalu na malā se yahuṁ
cauda marbhmata caṇḍī jāta kalu tahuṁ | 160 |
teṇu kari rakata nāśenī boli tote
dānaba kuḷa dhvaṁsinī go daẏā kar amote | 162 |
tu debī sudaẏā kale pāibi kāraṇa
mūrkha apaṇḍita ye muṁ na jāṇaiṁ kicchi
sāroḷā rūpe tu mote kahilu go grantha
teṇu kari jagate mote bolanit paṇḍita | 166 |
tuhi ye sadaẏā kalusi go māẏe
teṇu kari sujana mote bolanti sabhiẏe | 169 |
ẏeṇu go nārāẏaṇī muhiṁ āśre kali tote
tohora sudaẏā mā go yāhātahiṁ nāhiṁ
tohora yāhāṭhāre mā go sudaẏā achai
jaḷa theḷe analḷe mahābhaẏa kicchi nāhiṁ | 4 |
muhiṁ mā go arakṣita mote daẏā kalu
ẏeṇīki pada ye pada mote nohucchi go dr̥śya
bilaṁka deśara rājā ye aṭai manurāẏe
ābara putramāne puṇa kebaṇa kr̥tya kale | 13 |
kaṣā kaupunī se ye dibyabeśa hoi
padma patre nīra yehne diśai ḍhaḷahāḷa | 28 |
bhrami bhrami āsi sehu dvārikāre hoile
baḷarāmaṁka nabare yāiṁ prabeśa ye hele | 36 |
kahiṁ thila tumbhe mote kaha tapaśīḷa | 39 |
ẏehā śuṇi nārada ye bolanti bacana
yahiṁ thili tāhā tu ho śuṇa baḷarāma | 40 |
tumbhanta ye saṅge nebā nimante ẏeṭhāku ailu | 41 |
tahiṁ se yāiṇa prabeśa hoile tapachārī | 43 |
nāradaṁku dekhi tahuṁ deba śrīkr̥ṣṇa uṭhile
naamskāra kariṇa se ubhā hoiṇa rahile | 44 |
mote saṅkhoḷi tumbhe ki aila brahmamunya | 47 |
yāuachu kṣaṇe na rahu ho bābā
nārade boile hari na jāṇa ki āmbhara carita
ẏekā ṭhābakare muhiṁ na base kadācita | 50 |
tini bhmabanare yahiṁ yete kathā paḍai | 51 |
teṇu kari kahanti mote kaḷahapriẏa muni | 52 |
dekhile se purare jaṇeheṁ kehi nāhiṁ | 56 |
boile āmbhara pure bije kale munibara | 57 |
putra pautrī tora ye huantu barddhamāna | 61 |
ẏeteka kalyāṇa yahuṁ nārada muni kale
nārada gauroba pāi basile se ṭhābare
candrābatī hāthaku se phula baḍhāiṇa dile
ẏehi puṣyagoṭi māẏe gheni go boile | 64 |
ẏe puṣyagoṭi kāhuṁ āṇila brahmāṁka tanaẏi | 66 |
nandana bane thāi ẏe phula na thāi ānaṭhāre
āmbhe ye ailu sehi toṭāra bāṭare | 67 |
śaradhā yugate āmbhe tohora hāthe dilu | 68 |
nārade boile ẏe puṣyara mahiṁmā tumbhe śuṇa
īśvaraṁka bhāriyā gaurīṁki dei pūjiba yeuṁdina | 69 |
svāmīre saubhāgī hoiṇa sehu dina sāri | 70 |
ẏehi puṣyare pūjibi ki āu acchi bidhāna | 73 |
nārade boile acchi ye aṣṭa parakāra
kahibā tohora āge śuṇa ẏethira bichāra | 74 |
kamaḷā paṇasaru ye āṭha āṭha hoẏe | 78 |
yeuṁ stirī ẏehā pūjite karai icchā
ẏekabarṇṇa gāīra kṣīra ẏekabarṇṇa dhanara taṇḍuḷa
taraṇa kari tāhā kṣepiba garbhara bhitara | 85 |
āra dina srāhāna kari karibāka pūjā
prasanna hoiṇa bara debe ye girijā | 86 |
candrābatī bole ẏehu oṣā pūjā hoiba keuṁ māsa keuṁ dina
nārade boile baraṣa madhye ye caita māsa śukḷapakṣa
se pūjā karāa mote anugraha bahi | 90 |
āpaṇa thāiṁ tumbhe ẏe oṣā pūjāiba
tumbhara yebe mote sudaẏā bhāba thiba
āpaṇe thāiṁ se oṣā nirbhā karāiba | 92 |
nārade boile tote samasta padārtha miḷiba
svaragara puṣya aṭai se debatānta bhogya
abaśya se puṣya toho bhāgyare miḷiba
ẏethaku cintā tu go na kara sadibhāba | 95 |
se kanaka campa acchi nandana banara
śāmba kumar abhiāi āṇiba ẏehu puṣya | 97 |
ẏete kahi nārade tahuṁ antarddhāne gale
dine śāmba kumaraku chāhiṁ candrābatī bolai
ḍhāḷe pāsorila yāhā muni gale kahi | 100 |
śāmba kumar aboilā mo manare na thilā
bhalā cetuāi tumbhe dila go abaḷā | 101 |
caitra māsa ta āsi hoilā parabeśa
kanakara campa go āmbhe kemante āṇimā | 103 |
indra rūpilā toṭā aṭāi nandana bana
se toṭā jagiẏā gandhabong sahasra gaṇa | 104 |
niti prati indra debatā toṭā buliṇa dekhai | 105 |
ẏehā śuṇiṇa bolai tahiṁ candrābatī kumārī
kemante pūjiṇa manāibi muṁ śaṁkara gaurī | 106 |
kumara boilā muhiṁ yibi nandana bana te ṭāyāẏe
ẏemanta bichāra tahiṁ se kariṇa kumara
dibya beśa goṭiẏe se hoiṇa kumara
dibya ratha goṭiẏe tu saja kari āṇa
diga bije kari yāiṁ āsibā bahana | 111 |
ratha saja kariṇa se chāmure miḷilā | 112 |
dhanu kamāẏeṇa se ye gheniṇa kumara
dvārikaru dakṣiṇamukha hoi bāhāra hoi gale
ratha ruhāiṇa tahuṁ gale khara hoi
nandana bana toṭāre bīra paśileka yāiṁ | 115 |
daibara kr̥tya puṇa ke kariba āna
abibhāi hoi se pitā ghare acchi
tāhāra samaneṇa bara ye nohilā se bibhā nohicchi | 121 |
ẏeke yubākāla se ye gandhabong duhitā
yaubana bhārare chāli nuārai se banitā | 122 |
āḷāśa gaṅgākaiṁ se srana kari ailā | 123 |
tathi upare candana bindu ẏeka dilā | 126 |
ratiki samāna tāhāra rūpa ye diśai
siṁghara majhā prāẏe tāhāra kaṭigoṭi diśai
dhīre dhīre āsai se sakhīṁka saṅgata | 130 |
daibara bhabiṣya ke kariba ye āna
ẏe kisa toṭā goṭi go diśṇa achai | 132 |
sakhīmāne kadvile se aṭai nandana bana

lg.note: “br̥kṣara śikhara go diśai sundara” pare ‘kha’ pothire bhinna pāṭha–
bhramiṇa āsibā chāla ẏe nandana bana |
kebaṇa kebaṇa br̥kṣa achai bā tahiṁ
tāhā śuṇaṇi sumedha sakhī taku kahi |
lg.l: toṭā dekhite tāra hoilā śaradhā mana
abaśya toṭā go dekhibā nandana bana | 135 |
ki ki padārtha achai dekhibā bhramiṇa | 136 |
sakhīgaṇa kahanti tu śuṇa go sundarī
se toṭāku samāna ye nāhiṁ tinipurī | 137 |
na thibāra hoiṇa ye padārtheka nahiṁ | 138 |
amara mauṣadhi thambhana mohana baśa uccāṭana guṭikā añjana sahite
yāhā tu loḍibu tāhā go miḷiba saṁghāte | 139 |
se toṭā dekhile tu mohamāna hoibu
gharaku yibāra kathā go manare na dharibu | 140 |
se toṭāre paśile kṣudhā tr̥ṣā na lāgai
maḷaẏa pabana go tahiṁ sadhīre bahuthāi | 141 |
sabongdā basanta tahiṁ thāẏe āgo sakhī
pika ādi tahiṁ thānit nānā barṇṇe pachī | 142 |
āmba paṇasa ākhu kadaḷī guā naṭīkāḷa
nemāku śakya ye tahiṁ achai kāhāra | 146 |
indrara toṭā se tahiṁ ke paśi nuārai
itara jana tahiṁ paśite nohe kṣama
indra se paśibāku tahiṁ aṭai bhārajana | 148 |
āṭha dine ẏe toṭā se dekhiṇa āsai
gaṅgāra jaḷa āṇi br̥kṣa mūlaku biḷānti
khata kari kasturī guṇḍāku br̥kṣa mūḷare dianti | 150 |
ābara kathāẏe tu śuṇa go saṁghāta
pachī jantumāne maḷamūtra tahiṁ na karanti kadācita | 151 |
śukhilā patra yete taḷare jhaḍiṇa paḍai
mattagaja gabanī se dhīre dhīre chālai
sate ki yaubana bhāre bhāñjiṇa paḍai | 154 |
tiḷa puṣya jāṇi tāra nāsikā diśanti | 155 |
mr̥ṇāḷara nāḍa prāẏe diśai bhmaḷa śobhābana
tāhāra ye rūpa guna kiẏe bāuni kahiba

lg.note: gaṅgājaḷa āṇi br̥kṣa mūḷare dianti<lb/>kasturīa guṇḍāku se khata ye karanti | (kha)
peṭara śobhābana ye padmapatra kānti<lb/>rakata kumuda prāẏe pādataḷi jyoti | (kha)

lg.l: toṭāra bhitare se ye paśileka yāiṁ | 161 |
ẏe puṣyaru uḍiyāi se puṣya cumbanti | 166 |
balabha gheni ẏe rūpe trīḍā karuthānti | 168 |
nānā kautuke muhiṁ haranti ye dina
ẏe chāra jantumāne ye ballabhanta gheniṇa
ḍāḷimba banare śārī śuā rāba dyanti | 172 |
āmba phaḷamāna br̥kṣe lenti lenti lenti hoi
pāciṇa se suraṅga diśanti puṇa tahiṁ | 173 |
rambhā br̥kṣamāne ye panti panti hoi
campābr̥kṣa taḷe yāiṁṇa se bismaẏe basilā | 175 |
jāī puṣyaru se ye guḍāẏe ghenilā
śuṇa ho manurāẏe ẏethi uttāru carita
ratha gheni śāmba tahiṁ miḷilā turita | 178 |
nānā phaḷa phulamāna se toḷai bahana
sundarīra naẏana ye paḍilā khaṇḍe dūru | 182 |
sate kibā pañchubāṇa āsi paḍilā aṅgeṇa | 183 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇara nandana se ye jāmbubarīta baḷā
janma labhiacchi sehu gheni kr̥ṣṇa kaḷā | 184 |
sate ki madana mana bāndhai tāhāre | 186 |
dekha go anaṅga puruṣa toṭāre bulai | 189 |
chāhiṁbāra chaṭake yubā stirīṁkara garaba gañjanti | 190 |
ẏehāṁka rūpa dekhi muhiṁ madane baśa gali
tāhāku dekhi kiṁke madane hou dukhī | 194 |
ẏemantara samaẏe tahiṁ ye kr̥ṣṇara kumara
puṣya phaḷa toḷiṇa ye bichārai manara | 199 |
gandhabonge na jāṇantu ẏethuṁ yibā bega hoi
dekhile goḷa anartha ẏethire hoiba apāra
kehu na jāṇantu ẏethuṁ yibā tatapara | 201 |
rathara rathara uparu sehu ohlāi paḍilā
daiba ghaṭāiṇa ye dilā nei tāhā | 205 |
indrara nandana bana ẏetheṁ paśila kesane | 208 |
gandhabong jāṇile niceṁ kopa ye karibe
ẏekamana hoi śuṇa kahai muṁ tahuṁ | 210 |
dvārābatī pure ye aṭai āmbha ghara
āmbhara mātāṁkara nāma jāmbabatī ye aṭai
ki nema boli ẏetheṁ prabeśa hoila | 213 |
ẏe puṣyaku kimpe ho baḷicchi tumbha mana | 215 |
śāmba kumar aye tahuṁ boilāka hasi
ẏekadine āmbha pure gale narada maharuṣi | 216 |
candrābatī boli ye aṭai tāra nāma
rati saṅgare sehu aṭai ye sama | 219 |
ẏe puṣya deiṇa pūja gaurī śaṁkara | 220 |
teṇu kari śaradhā ye hoilā tāhāri
teṇu puṣya nemāku re āsicchi sundarī | 221 |
ẏe kanyāra nāma kisa kaha kinā muku | 222 |
kumārīẏe boile ẏehāra nāma aṭe śobhābatī
ẏehāra samane bara na miḷilā kāhiṁ | 224 |
toṭā dekhibāku tāra mana ye baḷilā | 225 |
toṭā dekhiluni ẏebe yibuṁ nija pura
tumbhe ẏe ṭhābaru bege yāa ho kumara | 226 |
kumara boilā muṁ kāhāku na ḍarai
sahasreka indra hoileṇa mohora kisa hoi | 227 |
tinipure muhiṁ ye kāhaku na ḍaraiṁ
mohora pitā puṇa aṭanti prabhma bhābagrāhi | 228 |
ḍae kimpe muhiṁ go hoibi bāhāra
puṣya gheniṇa ẏethuṁ muhiṁ yibi dhīra dhīra | 229 |
kumara mukharuṁ ẏesaneka gāḍha bākya śuṇi
niceṁ baḍa kuḷare ẏehu ye hoiacchi jāta
teṇu kari kathā ẏehu kahai sāmaratha | 231 |
ẏe bara tora manaku ki rucilā sundarī | 232 |
ẏehi thilā kāhiṁ go āmbhe thilāiṁ ta kāhiṁ
kemanta prakāre muṁ go ẏehāku baribi
ẏehāṁkara mana muṁ ye kemante jāṇibi | 235 |
khaṇḍe dūre thāiṇa tā kumara jāṇilā
kumārī mana ye mohora ṭhābare baḷilā | 236 |
icchā thile mote ye baraṇa karu bāḷī
tebe se hoiba mora manara hiāḷi | 238 |
jāī phlara māḷā ye goṭiẏeka ghenithilā
beni janaṁkara mana yahuṁ hoilā ẏekatva
hātha dhari neiṇa ye basāilā ratha | 241 |
koḷāgrata kari mukhare cumbana ye dilā
yeṇe yiba teṇe tāku saṅge gheniyāi | 245 |
hātha dhari neiṇa ye rathare basailā | 246 |
ratha bāha chāla yibā dvārābatī purī | 247 |
ratha bāha kinā ho yiba bega hoi | 248 |
taḍabege ratha ye tahuṁ dāruka bāhilā
saṅga sakhīmānanta śobhābatī melāṇi ye dilā | 249 |
kumārīki gheniṇa tahuṁ ye kumara caḷigale
boile ẏeka puruṣeka ratha caḍhi āsi
ẏemanta samaẏe āmbhe sehu puruṣaku dekhiluṁ | 253 |
tāhākaiṁ paṭāntara nāhiṁ ẏe tini bhmabana | 254 |
kanaka campā puṣya toḷuṇa se thilā

div.note: “se toṭa ra gandhabongnta kahile maṇāi” pare ‘ja’<lb/>pothire pāṭha:–
surasena nabare ya iṁ hoile parabeśa

lg.l: hātha dhari kumara tāku rathare basāilā
ābara birūpā kanyāku ye saṅge ghenigalā | 257 |
pachārilāku boilā ambhaa ghara dvārābati pura
āmbhara piara ye aṭanti prabhma catradhara | 258 |
bahuta dūra se yai nāhiṁ bege
śuṇiṇa gandhabonge ye yāhā śahasra dhaile
māra māra boliṇa ye śabadāi ḍaka dile | 262 |
dhara dhara boli se ucce ḍaka dei
ruha ruha boliṇa ye ḍākale niṭhiāi
bāẏu bege ratha se ye yāuacchi bāhi | 265 |
gandhabong baḷa beḍhile ẏebe pramāda paḍilā | 266 |
kumar aboile śate indura yebe hoi
mañjārī dāḍharu se yibe ki bañchāi | 267 |
muhiṁ mattabrāgha go se samastehiṁ cheḷi
ẏethaku cintā tu go na karasi bāḷī | 269 |
sahasre gandhabong ye beḍhileka tāku yāiṁ
beḷuṁ beḷa samara ye hoilā agocara
bhāla śakati konta ye māranti mudugara | 273 |
śahasraku śahasra bājiṇa uṭhai ye jui
daśa biṁśa pañchiśa paḍanti ẏeku ẏeku | 275 |
śāmbakumara nārāje aneka gandhabonge ye male
thokāẏe gandhabong ye tahuṁ paḷāiṇa gale | 276 |
thokāẏe gandhabonge ye kumaraku goḍai yujhanti
cauṣaṭhi koṭi ye tahiṁ achanti gandhabong | 280 |
debasabhā taḷare ye pāẏe paḍi śoi | 285 |
āmbhe na jāṇuṁ se keuṁbāṭe toṭāre paśilā | 287 |
toṭāi bhitareṇa se thilā ubhā bhoi | 288 |
gaṅgā srāhānaku yāithilā kanyāmāna saṅge gheni | 289 |
srāhāna sāriṇa āsi toṭā madhye buluthilā
hātha dhari nei tāku rathare basāilā

div.note: “āstāna kari basiachanti sabhāra” pare ‘kha’ pothire pāṭha–

lg.l: sehi kanyāmāne āsi āmbhanta bāratā kahile | 293 |
aneka nārāja ye binddhalu roṣa bahi | 294 |
tāhāra nārāje ye aneka gandhabong nāśagalā | 295 |
ẏekā jaṇake se ye ẏeḍeka sāmaratha
kete gandhabong māilā na yāi tadanta | 296 |
boile bege tuhi yāa re tanaẏe | 299 |
bege gheniāsa tāku prāṇare na māri | 300 |
kuḷa gotra pucchi pache karibā prāṇanāśa
tehne praẏe kumaraku ghoṭilā kahu kahu | 304 |
ki buddhi karibā ẏebe anartha hoilā | 305 |
kehu ẏemānanta yāiṁ bāratā nei dilā | 306 |
kumar aboilā ẏemanta tu na bhāḷa go sakhī
kahuṁ kahuṁ gandhabonge ye kumaraku beḍhi
dhanya re mānabā tora mātā pitā dhanya | 311 |
mānaba hoi tu debatāṁka saṅge yujhu
itara loka prāẏe ki āmbhanta tu bujhu | 312 |
bhaẏa na kariṇa kanyā neuachu dhari
kahuṁ kahuṁ aneka se nīrāja binddhalā
tīkṣa bhāla konta ye mārai roṣa bhari | 315 |
baḍa bāā bahile yehne meru na ṭaḷai | 316 |
kopeṇa kumara ye binddhalā tīkṣa śare
ẏekā jaṇaku ye sahasre jaṇa beḍhile
deba dānabare kahite śakhya nāhiṁ kāhāra | 320 |
baḷe baḷīẏāra se ye citrasena gandhabong | 321 |
kumarara nārājaku bhaẏe se na kalā | 322 |
yubākanyā mote kimpe bibhā ye na kala | 327 |
mohora icchẏe muṁ ye barilaiṁ bara
golai jagatara nātha tmbhe aṭa he murāri | 330 |
muhiṁ aṭe arakṣita stirī mātra sinā
ẏe ghora ātaṅgaru kara mote trāhi
ẏe mahābhaẏaru mote uddhari dhara puṇi | 334 |
aneka bikaḷa hoi hoi kanyā ye kāndai
puiṁsūtāru ki mukutā jhaḍi paḍai taḷe
tehne hoi lotaka naẏanaru paḍai mahīre | 336 |
kumarara mukha chāhiṁ bichārai citrasena gandhabong
ẏete bichāriṇa sudharmā sabhāku boli nelā
sabhāra taḷare nei kumaraku parabeśa kalā | 339 |
sabhāra madhye nārada thile ubhā hoi
mote kimpāiṁ ẏehu gupate na kahilā | 343 |
kicchi na kahiṇa muni tūnī hoi rahile
sudharmā sabhāru se ye begeṇa khasile | 344 |
pāda arghya deiṇa ye muniṁki pūjile
ki ki upādhi bāratā āṇicha kaha muni bujhāi | 349 |
nārade boile upādhi bāratā śuṇa sābadhāne
tāhāku hari āṇuthilā tora kumara mahāchatrī | 351 |
gandharbe jāṇi tāhā aneka yuddha kale
śāmbakumara hāthe aneka gandharbe kṣaẏe gale | 352 |
indra bāratā pāi citrasene peṣi dilā
se āsi ghora sāṁgrāma kumara saṅge kalā | 353 |
baḷe dhari kumaraku bānddhaṇa sehu nele
tāha dekhi āmbhe baḍa bikaḷa hoiluṁ
tāhā śuṇi kopa kale ye kamaḷāi sāiṁ | 356 |
bile icnrara tule tumbhe nuāra samara kari
tote kimpāiṁ se ho ḍariba bajradhārī | 359 |
daibara base ye surasena gandharbara jhia
baḷe gheni āsuthi tāku āmbha pua | 363 |
aneka māḍa māri dharinei tāku bānddha rakhichanti
ẏethaku ki āgyāṁ heba he haḷapati | 365 |
anyāẏe kalā ye bābu tohora nandana | 366 |
parara jhiaku se kimpe āṇilā chorāi
bātaghāte kadaḷī patra prāẏe śvarīra kampāile | 368 |
svarge debagaṇe āja na rakhibi kāhiṁ
saunanda mūṣaḷa se ye hāthare dhaile
dvanda kaḷi ẏethe ye aneka hoiba
thāṭha sajakara tumbhe yibā bega hoi
kumaraku yāiṁ āmbhe āṇimā bahana chaḍāi | 376 |
ugrasenaku kaha thāṭha sajakaru bete bhale | 377 |
indra debatā saṅge āja hoiba samara | 380 |
sedina indrara natuṇī se śobhābatī kanyā
māḷā goṭiẏeka bāḷī hāthare thilā gheni

div.note: “sābadhāna hoi śuṇimā mathurā rājana” pare ‘kha’ pothire:–
bho deba tahiṁki bijekara bega kari |
hā hā śuṇī caḷigale ugrasena bīra |

lg.l: kumara kumārī tahiṁ ẏeka saṁyoga hoi
kumārī hātha dhari kumar arathare basāi | 385 |
saṅgara kumārī yāiṁ jaṇāile indrara chāmure | 386 |
bandī prakāreṇa se ye dharāi rakhilā | 387 |
ẏeṇu śrīkr̥ṣṇa haḷī ye aneka kopa kale | 388 |
bole indra saṅge āja karibe samara
mote rāiṇa ye āgyāṁ dileka nārāẏaṇa
rājāṁka chāmure yāiṁ kaha tu ẏesana bidhāna | 390 |
ẏehā śuṇi ugrasena rāja bahuta kopakale
ye yāhāra ahasra yānabāhāna ghena hāde | 392 |
ye yāhāra śahasra yāna gheni saṅgateṇa
dāṇḍare yāiṁṇa sehu bege ghoṣaṇa diāile
se rathare ugrasena rājā bije yāi kalā
śaṅkha mahurī tūrī ye bājai ucce dhīre dhīre | 399 |
māra māra śabada ye phukāranti tuṇḍare | 401 |
ẏe se mahabhāratha amr̥ta rasa mati | 402 |
hari baḷarāma duheṁ puṇa teṇe sajahoi
rathe rathe caḍhi dāṇḍe ubhā hoileka yāi | 403 |
baḷarama dui putra bege sajahoi aile | 404 |
āpaṇe dibya saja hoi aile śrīpati | 405 |
dvārābatī pure se ye miḷileka āsi
gobindaṁku dekhiṇa ye śire kara nibeśi | 408 |
boile indra debatāra guṇa śuṇa ho khagarāṇa | 409 |
mohora kumar aboli nārade kahile upalecchi | 410 |
ẏehā śuṇi khagabara ye kahai karayoḍi
hari tohora sañchilā sinā aṭai svarga purī | 411 |
sañchilā dāsaku ye ẏeḍe kopa karu
āpaṇā mahimā tu āpaṇe na bichāru | 412 |
nārāẏaṇa boile se baḍa gariṣṭha hoilā
āja tāhāra sampada ye karibaiṁ nāśa
śaṅkha catra gadā śāraṅga kare dhari
pracaṇḍa hoiṇa bādya bājai ghana gore | 418 |
thāṭha sanya gheniṇa samaste caḷāiṇa gale
sātabongśa yādabe tahuṁ gale bāhāra hoi
kaḷi kutūhoḷa dekhile peṭa pūriba āmbhara | 423 |
yatane yāhā muhiṁ manare loḍu thāi
lāgu lāgu boliṇa puṇa buṇiṇa se dile
lāgu lāgu boliṇa puṇa gīta ye gīile | 427 |
indra debatā boile kāhiṁ thilā muni
āmbhe yāithilu āji mañcha ye bhmabane | 430 |
tahiṁ puṇa apūbong ye kathāẏe dekhilu | 431 |
se bāratā pāiṇa ye hari baḷarāma
thāṭha gheni āsuchanti toha saṅge karibe sāṁgrāma | 433 |
bahuta kopa ye kale deba haḷadhara
gaṇa gandhabong debatānta āja pakāibi bināśi | 435 |
thāṭha sanya gheni āpaṇe hoile bāhāra | 436 |
sehu baḍa gāḍhe ye kahile bacana | 437 |
ugrasena rājā pratagyāṁ kahile na sarai
sātabongśa yādabanta gheniṇa se āsanti dhuāiṁ | 438 |
saṅge sanya tāra ye achai aneka
aneka goḷa ye ẏethi karibe dāmodara
ẏehā dekhi āmbhe ho ailu naẏanara | 441 |
boilā bho muni tumbhe kaha tathya kari
sate ki gauḍe āsuchanti samara ārambha kari | 443 |
mañcha rājā prāẏe ki se maṇichanti mote
tehne prāẏe kari ki se maṇichanti mote
āja yebe samara se karibe mora tule
gauḍa bāuḍa hāuḍa tini jāti nāma
gāḍhe pratagyāṁ yāhā kahuchanti na jāṇimā paṇa | 447 |
svarge paśi kanyāku baḷe neuacchi hari
ẏekathā bichāra kimpe na kara kuśadhāri | 449 |
brahmāẏe boile tu ho śuṇa surarāṇa
kathāẏe pratagyāṁ ho na kara tu gāḍhe
ẏethaku cintā tu ho na kara sahasrākṣa | 453 |
bege saja tumbhe hua ho debatāẏe | 454 |
indra āgyāṁ pāi gaṇa gandhabong debatā
sanya saja hoile ye tahiṁ apramitā | 455 |
ẏekuṁ āreka tahiṁ ye bahu pratagyāṁ karanti | 458 |
bāẏu baruṇa ye candra sūryya meḷe
thāṭha sanya gheni sehi āsi hoẏe | 460 |
sehi āsi miḷile amara sabhā ṭhāba | 464 |
ābara tetiśi koṭi debatā gaṇa gandhabong meḷe
saja hoi ubhā hoile āstānara taḷe | 465 |
śuṇi kopa kariṇa āsanti haḷī hari | 471 |
yuddha karibāku āsanti se mohora saṅgate | 472 |
tāhā śuṇi bolanti ye deba śūḷapāṇi
ẏehimate āmbha saṅge yujheli na jāṇi | 473 |
āmbhe putra kārttikaku barithilā tāhāra ye mātā |
āmbhar ana jāṇu kanyāku harinelā baḷabantā | 474 |
brahmāẏe thāiṇa se ye yāhā bichārile
teḍe baḍa kaḷi goṭā kṣaṇake nirbhāile | 476 |
kete anartha hoilā tahiṁ kahi ta nohai | 477 |
sarga śubhe thāāntu ẏekā nārada mahāmuni | 478 |
khaṇḍe dūre thāi tāhā nārade śuṇile | 479 |
boile āmbhatna ninda kala ho biśvanātha
dekhilāra kathā āmbhe kahilu sinā āsi
ẏethaku nindā tumbhe kala ho biśvabāsī | 481 |
kathāra tadanta bujhibā nā lābha hāni | 484 |
nārade boile indra yujhiba tora tule
īśvaraṁka kathā śuṇi āmbhe khaṅga ye pāilu
īśvaraṁkara āja ho āmbhe jāṇimā baḍapaṇa
kete gāḍhare āja karibe se raṇa | 489 |
atrū raku chāhiṁ kahanti gupata bacana | 490 |
gupateṇa ẏe kathā arjunaku kahibu bujhāi | 492 |

div.note: se kathā āmbha āge kahani parimāṇi | (ja)

lg.l: yujheṣṭhi deba boile raha raha bīra
parama bhāgya ho āja diśilā āmbhara | 497 |
ẏehi kathā kahi mote paṭhiāile dāmodara | 500 |
yujheṣṭhi boile indra gobindara kimarthe ye kaḷi
ẏehā mote sañchapi ho kahibā mahābaḷī | 501 |
se kanyā baḷe kumaraku ye barilā
rūpa guṇa dekhi se madane baśagalā | 505 |
kanyā gheni kumara ye ailāka tahuṁ | 506 |
se bāratā pāiṇa kopa kale bhābagrāhī | 508 |
aneka sanya gheni ugrasena āge ye dhāiṁḷe | 509 |
hari baḷarāma tahiṁ tāṁka putramānanta gheni |
mote rāi āgyāṁ dile deba nārāẏaṇa
sātakṣauṇī baḷa gheni āsantu bega hoi
ẏegāra kṣauṇī baḷa gheni bega hoi āsa | 517 |
ṭamaka niśāṇa ye bāje bīra tūra
śaṅkha mahurī bherī ye bājai dhīra dhīra | 522 |
jadyaratha śakuni saja hoile samaste turite | 523 |
māra māra dhunire ye kuruma uchuḷilā
bīra tūra bajāi se bāhāra ye hoi | 526 |
ye yāhāramate ye sarba saini dhāiṁle | 528 |
karapatra yoḍiṇa se ubhā hoi rahile
yujheṣṭhi boile ho kisa ẏe carita
baḷarāme kahanti tu śuṇa ho kurusāiṁ | 534 |
indrara carit tumbhe śuṇilaṭi ki sarba
āja bongśa tāra muṁ ye na thoibi kāhiṁ
deba dānabare tāre rakhantā ke nāhiṁ | 536 |
ye yāhāra śasra kare gheni kari dhāiṁ | 539 |
ye yāhāra śasra gheni hele marāmari
aṅge na bājuṁ ye tāhā āgahuṁ nibāri | 541 |
tīkṣa bhāla śakati konta ye niṭhāi māranti
deba mānabe ye tahiṁ ẏekamukha hoi
bāu bege ratha ye caḷāi dhāiṁlā | 546 |
kuḍha kuḍha hoiṇa debe paḍileka śoi | 550 |
dui mahāchatrī kehi kāhākai jiṇantā nohile | 553 |
kopeṇa tīkṣa bhāla ye peṣilā ugrasena
kopeṇa nārāja peṣi hehu binddhale bahana | 556 |
tāhā dekhi ugrasena baḍa kopa karai | 559 |
trodhabhare mukha se ye kale tamatama | 573 |
haḷa laṅgaḷa sehu ye bulāi bāmakare
duheṁ mahāchatrī samare nohanti nā ucha
aṅga rapannaṅga paḍibā dekhi āu gandhabongmāne
maḍā upare madā kuḍha kuḍha hoi
caudiguṁ kete paḍile kaḷaṇā na yāi | 584 |
baḷarāme yahuṁ tahiṁ ghora yuddha kale
rathara upare baḷarāme haḷa mūṣaḷa thoile | 589 |
nārāja bāẏubege yāiṁ baḷaramaṁka aṅgeṇa paḍilā
meru yehne gaṅgā bahai tehne rudhira bahilā | 593 |
haṇḍe dūruṁ dekhile tā kr̥ṣṇaṁka kumara | 594 |
ye yāhāra bāhāna se caḍhiṇa dhāiṁle
ẏemante aneka ghora sāṁgrāma ye kale

div.note: pañchabana na rāja se guṇare basāi | (ja, ṭha)

lg.l: kuḍha kuḍha hoiṇa se paḍile bhūmira
deba mānabe ẏe kathā kahite agocara | 605 |
boilā mānabā tu re andharāẏera suta
mañchara mānabā tu re yujhu āmbha tule
bajra māri āja śira chedibaiṁ bhale | 611 |
ẏete boli airābrataku se camakāi dilā
ye yāhāra śasra gheni indraku beḍhileka yāi | 614 |
aneśvata śara yāiṁ paḍilā indrara upare | 616 |
mohare paḍile se ye bhūmireṇa śoẏe | 618 |
moha yāiṇa sehu ye paḍilā taḍati | 622 |
ābara yama baruṇa kubera kopabhara hoi | 623 |
ẏekamane śuṇa tu ho madhyaparba rīti | 625 |
ye yāhāra śahasra dhari marāmari hoile | 626 |
gandhabongṁka upare kaumodakī gadā prahārile nei | 627 |
tāhā dekhiṇa tahuṁ yama baruṇa dhāiṁle | 628 |
konta sahi baḷarāme puṇa ye dhāiṁle
khaṇḍa dūre thāiṁ tāhā īśvare dekhiḷā | 634 |
īśvare boile tu śuṇa re gauḍa
beḷa beḷake tumbhe re aṭa ratichora | 637 |
lāja saṁkoca re tumbhanta na māḍai
baḷe baḷe kanyāmāna tumbhe nia re chorāi | 638 |
mañcharājā jhia prāẏe ki maṇila ẏeṭhāra
ẏe śobhābatī kanyāre tumbhara sariba bebhāra | 639 |
āja prāṇa gheni re na yiba benibhāi
āja samare sabukuhiṁ muṁ bināśa karibaiṁ | 640 |
nīḷendī haraṇa kathā pāsorila ki biśvanāthe | 642 |
beḷe beḷe āmbhara saṅge tumbhe kara khaḍiāḷī
indrara nimante tumbhe āsiacha pahija ye kari | 644 |
āja jāṇimā indraku pāriba yebe rakhi
tebe se jāṇimā tumbhara gārimā upalekhi | 645 |
dudha bhāramāna bahiṇa ye karuthāa ṭāṇa | 648 |
gopapure thāiṁ tumbhe yete yete kr̥tya kala
beṇu svane tumbhe re mohila gopastirī
baḷe yāi bhīṣmeka rājā dohitīki bibhā hela | 651 |
beḷe beḷe anyāẏa tu karu debarāja | 652 |
putra tora padmana kr̥takeśī rājyaku galā
tahiṁ yete śāsti paicha na jāṇaki haḷadhārī | 654 |
beḷe beḷe tumbhe ra anyāẏa puṇa kara
ẏebe tumbhe mote nindā kala ho haḷadhara | 655 |
ẏeteka kathā tumbhe pāsorila ki puṇi | 656 |
aneka prakāre ye īśvare gāḷi dile
bolanti jaṭaā āre kahuṁ tohora āge
brahmahatyā kalu tu tāhā ki pāsorilu
nātā haraṇa tu ho kariachu hāde
āpaṇāra aṅgare ye arjilā pāpa thāiṁ
para akīrtti guṇa bācchite na yogāi | 661 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ duheṁ ye hele kopabhara
kehi kāhāku ye tahiṁ samare na ghuñchile | 664 |
ẏekamane śuna tu ho śobhābatī haraṇara bīti | 666 |
nārāẏaṇa catrare aneka śibagaṇa ye paḍile
kebaṇa śahasra diśilā jhaṭaka bijuḷī parāẏe | 669 |
bāratā pāiṇa indra tāhākaiṁ dharāi āṇilā | 673 |
se bāratā pāiṇa ye rāmakr̥ṣṇe aile
aṭharakṣauṇī baḷa gheni kuñjagaḷa deśa rāẏe
ghora sāṁgrāma deba kṣaṇeheṁ na rahi
aneka goḷa houcchi deba kahile na sarai | 678 |
boile ẏeḍe goḷa kimpe arajile puruhūta | 679 |
baḷe yebe kr̥ṣṇaṁka putra neuthilā kimpe kaleka anarthe | 680 |
ki buddhi karibā boli bichāranti mane
hariharaṁka samara tahiṁ sahi nuhai ye kṣaṇe | 681 |
ẏethu anantare tu ho śuṇa dibyarasa
