hara balarāme tahiṁ aneka yuddha kale
aneka śahasra sehu ye hoile marāmari
rudhira bahante śaraghāte deha ye heucchi prajvaḷi | 685 |
aneka śibagaṇa se catrare na śile | 686 |
pañchupaṇḍaba ye tahiṁ khaṇḍiẏe dūre thile
sūryya kiraṇa lāgile yehne kumudinī bana
pachaghuñchā dile ye ẏehānta na māribi
gaṇḍā māribāra kāḷe muhiṁ yāhā kali
prāṇara bikaḷe mote se yāci dile bara | 698 |
beḷe beḷe moṭhāre se pāānti apacaẏe
na jāṇanti ki kr̥ṣṇara bhr̥tya pāṇḍaba pāñcheheṁ | 699 |
haḷī hara benijane yahiṁ samara karuthile
tāhāṁkara sannidhyare arjuna ratha nei kale | 701 |
kopabhare para āpaṇā ye na gaṇanti | 702 |
br̥ṣabha upare caḍhi hara yujhu thile
arjuna ra mukhaku se sadhīre chāhiṁdile | 703 |
āpaṇe śānti hoile gadā ye saṁhari | 706 |
yuddhara carita se ye samasta kahile | 708 |
trodha śāntikara tumbhe na kara samara
khaṇḍe dūre īśvare ye thile ubhāi
bhumigata hoiṇa se ubhā hoiṇa rahile | 714 |
karayoḍi arjuna ye ubhā hoiṇa rahilā | 716 |
cirakāḷa brata tu ho paṇḍura santati | 717 |
sābadhāne śuṇa tumbhe yāhā kahai ye muhiṁ | 718 |
śāmba kumar ata ẏethuṁ kanyā harinelā
hari baḷarāmaṁkara tumbhara kimpe ẏeḍe anartha hoilā | 719 |
āpaṇe thāiṁ kimpe ẏethira bhalamanda na bujhila | 721 |
anartha kari ta deba kebeheṁ na yogāi
kṣaṇe tūnī hoi puṇa bacana bhāṣile | 723 |
bolanti arjuna tu ho śuṇa manadei
indrara pāiṁ kr̥ṣṇara saṅge bipakṣa ye hoi | 725 |
tote dekhiṇa sāṁgrāma chāḍilu āmbhe ẏebe
tu yebe ailu bhala hoilāṇi sarbe | 726 |
sāṁgrāma chāḍi ye yahiṁre rahile samaste | 727 |
brahmānta dekhi arjuna pāẏe paḍi śoile
śrī baḷarāme ye tahuṁ khaṇḍe dūre thile
brahmāẏe boile akāraṇe kimpe karuacha goḷa | 732 |
āgyāṁ dile nandī tuhi ẏehikṣaṇi yibu
brahmā āgyāṁ dile ye yiba nandanabana yāẏe
ẏehā śuṇi bege tahuṁ uṭhile bhagabāna
gobinde boile ho muṁ kicchi na jāṇaiṁ
kaḷi dvanda yahuṁ tahiṁ nibartta hoile
brahmānta dekhiṇa sehu śire kara dei | 748 |
śire kara dei sabonge namaskāra kale | 749 |
tāhānta pachāra se kahibe samasta bujhāi | 750 |
arjuna boile se ta sāṁgrāme paḍichanti
gaṇa gandhabong debatā aneka prāṇe kṣati | 751 |
kāhiṁpāiṁ tumbhe ho ẏeḍe dvanda kala
ki nimante tumbhe ẏeḍe kaḷi ārambhila | 760 |
indrarāẏe kahanti ye brahmāṁka mukha chāhiṁ
kr̥ṣṇara kumara tāku baḷātkāre galā gheti | 762 |
amare paśi ye kanyāku chorāi neuthilā
ugāḷi dharante sehu aneka yuddha kalā | 763 |
aneka sanya mora se heḷe nāśa kari
ẏebe ẏe amara maṇḍaḷaku dhāḍi dilā
pariyatna kari muṁ tāku bānddhaṇa rakhithili | 767 |
śuṇiṇa rāmakr̥ṣṇa tahuṁ parighāi se aile | 768 |
ābara aṭarakṣauṇi baḷa gheniṇa kuñjagaḷa deśasāiṁ | 789 |
ẏe samasta gheni hari baḷarāme dhāiṁle
yete dvanda anartha amare pure kale | 771 |
gobnde bolanti tumbhe śuna ho bedapati | 772 |
se kumārī śāmbaku tā icchāẏe barilā
ẏe sabu kāraṇa jāṇiṇa kāhāra duṣṭapaṇa
bichāriṇa ẏehā tumbhe bujha ta āpaṇa | 774 |
tāhānta pachāri āmbhe jāṇibā ẏethira sandeśa | 776 |
brahmāẏe boile yujheṣṭhi yāhā se kahile
īśvare boile tahuṁ indraṁka mukha chāhiṁ
kemanta caritra ẏehā kaha he kr̥ṣṇara tanaẏi | 782 |
kāhāra doṣa ẏehā bichāri bujha ho bedabara | 783 |
ẏethira caritra āmbhaṁku mā go kahani bujhāi | 784 |
daibara baśe se kumar aẏethaku āsithilā
ẏeke yubānārī aṭe mora aḷapa baẏasa
ẏehānta dekhi mo mana bikhaṇḍa hoilā
abibhāita kanyā muṁ pitā bibhā ta na kale
ẏete bichāriṇa muhiṁ śāradhā mana kali
ẏethiru durllabha bara loḍiṇa na pāi
ẏeṇu kari māḷa dei ẏehānta barilaiṁ muhiṁ | 795 |
ẏehā śuṇi brahmāẏe boile yujheṣṭhiṁka mukha chāhiṁ
ẏethire kāhāra ye hoṣa bichāri kaha kuñjagaḷa deśasāiṁ | 798 |
tumbhara tuṇḍare ta na āsiba micha
yujheṣṭhi boile bāsabongku ẏehā na yogāi
kanyāku na pachāri kimpe yuddha ārambhai | 800 |
mathā potiṇa se ye sabhāre basile | 801 |
hari baḷarāmaṁka mukha padma prāẏe bikāśai
īśvare mukha ṭekiṇa sabhāku na chāhiṁ | 802 |
kehi kāhākaiṁ tahiṁ samāsyā na dele | 803 |
kṣaṇaka uttāre tahiṁ brahmā ye bolanti
kimpāi mauna hoi tu basilu ho surapati | 804 |
duijaṇa kaḷi kale jaṇe se hāranti
ẏethakaiṁ cintā tu ho na kara surapati | 805 |
āmbhe yāhā kahuṁ tumbhe ẏekamane heja | 806 |
abibhāita kari yubākanyā ghare ta na rakhi
ẏehi kanya ghare yebe yubā hoi na thāntā
sapata puruṣa pitr̥ śroṇita pibanti bhale | 809 |
sapatama baraṣu dohitā yebe bibhā kariba
sehi loka kathāre yaśa ye labhiba | 811 |
sehi nyāyuru sapata baraṣe bibhā ye yogāi | 812 |
yubā hoilā kanyā ghare ẏe rakhile
puruṣa hoi ki yubā stirī rūpa lechai | 814 |
puruṣa ye bhramara prāẏeka bhoḷa hoi
nabatana puṣya pāile ki na cumbai | 815 |
ẏehi baraku ta ẏehi kanyā bibhā debā
samaste basiṇa ẏetheṁ āmbhe bibhā karāibā | 818 |
śubha lagne ye bibhā beḷara bebhāra | 819 |
hou boli bāsaba ye sanamata kala | 820 |
śrī mahābhāratha ẏe ye śuṇa śuddhamati | 821 |
yeteka anartha kale pāka ye śāsana | 823 |
brahmāẏe pachārile tumbhara manaku ẏekathāṭi ki yogāi | 824 |
kumāre boile yāhā bihi karicchi ghaṭaṇa
āmbhar aboile kebeheṁ nohai se āna | 815 |
br̥haspati guruṁku se kahi hakāri āṇilā | 827 |
keteheṁ anartha hoilā tu kicchi na pachāru | 829 |
kete kete dvanda hoilā śobhābatīki gheni
bibhāra anakūḷa se khojiṇa ṭhāba kale | 831 |
tārabāra sehu puṇa gaṇikari ṭhāba kale
brahmāẏe boile ho achai kete dina
ẏehi dina bibhā hou boli sanamata kale | 836 |
samasta bhiāṇa tumbhe kra ho bahana | 838 |
dāna yautuka ādi ẏethire yetiki lāgai
sakaḷa sampādiṇa tumbhe rakha ho bege yāiṁ | 839 |
samasta bhiāṇa kale amare ki abā na miḷaii | 841 |
gobinde garuda piṭhi re bije kale
āu chāri pāṇḍabe ye yāhāmate saja hoi | 845 |
chāẏā mantopare ugrasena driyodhana bije kale | 849 |
samaste bijaẏe kale amara sabhāra samīpe | 851 |
śacīṁki dekhi arajuna pāẏe paḍi śoilā
śire kara deiṇa se binoẏī hoilā | 854 |
śacī boile bābu ho śuṇa bīra pātha
tohora thāuṁ kimpe hoilā ẏeḍeka anartha | 855 |
arajuna boile ẏehā muhiṁ na jāṇai kicchi
ẏe bāratā pāiṇa muṁ bhana aili
indra kr̥ṣṇaṁkar aye baḍa pīrati hoilā
kāli bibhā hebāra ye prasaṅga paḍilā | 858 |
arjuna mukhuṁ ẏehā śuṇi śacī mahāsatī | 859 |
ānanda hoiṇa tahuṁ debī bhitaraku gale
maṅgaḷa bidhi bhiāṇa kaleka se tahuṁ | 861 |
śaṅkha mahurī ye bājai ghana ghana

div.head: {@śobhābatīra bibāha@}

lg.l: ẏethu anantare rājā tu śuṇa dibyarasa
śobhābatī kanyāku bahana kariṇa dibya beśa | 1 |
satyabākya karma sāri bara pāda dhoi
kanyāra bhāi puṇa bara pada pakhāḷilā | 5 |
pūbong mukha hoiṇa se basile kumāra
mantra paḍhiṇa kuśa bandhana ye kari
ki ki yautuka tumbhe deba ho śacīnātha
śaṅkhe pāṇi toḷiṇa dia he turita | 12 |
thāḷī ābara ye gaḍuā ginā yāẏe
subarṇṇara kama samasta nibongāṇa ye hoiẏe | 14 |
lakṣeka subarṇṇa sabu nei āpane āgare kuḍhāi
āu padārthamāna kete dile gaṇanā nohile | 16 |
yautuka dei rāẏe ānanda ye hoi
ẏe ante br̥haspati kuśagaṇṭhi dile phei | 17 |
ahio stirīmānanta gheni śacīdebī ye aile
śāmba kumaraku lakṣe subarṇna deiṇa bandāile | 18 |
samaste tahiṁ uttāru kale amr̥ta ye pāna | 20 |
indraṁka mukha chāhiṁ śrīhari āgyāṁ dile | 21 |
yibu dvārikāku bege tumbhe uchura na kara | 22 |
indra boile ājaka mohora pure thiba
thāṭha saina gheniṇa samaste se dina rahile | 24 |
pañchāmr̥ta rase se sabonge karanti bhojana
yāhā yāhāku rucai kale amr̥ta ye pāna | 25 |
śaṅga mahurī ye bājai ghana ghana
bara kanyānta se ye bandāpanā kale
ābara brahmā indra br̥haspati ye basile
śacīṁki namaskāra kari tahiṁ bīra pātha
brahmāẏe boile tumbhe śuṇa ho brahmarāśi | 33 |
nārāẏaṇa boile tumbhe thāa ho bedabara
mana cañchaḷa hoilā yibā ẏebe dvārābatī pura | 35 |
akṣata bidhi kari aneka basra dile | 36 |
yeteka thāṭha saina śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka saṅge āsithile
jaṇe jaṇe kari indra aneka basra dile | 38 |
śaṅkha mahuri ṭamaka ke kariba kaḷaṇā | 41 |
dūbongākṣata saru taṇḍu ḷare bandāpanā kari
sātabongśa yādabe ye yāhā pure gale
daiba puruṣa lekhana ta anyastā nohilā | 61 |
ẏemante pāṇḍabe tahiṁ rahile dinā sāta
aila bahuta dina helāni yāa bāruṇābante
śuṇa manu puruṣa ye agasti kahile
śobhābatīki gheni śāmba aneka bhoga kale | 70 |
tu ye pachārilu śobhābatī haraṇa carita
śuddha citta hoi śuṇiluṭi ki naranātha | 72 |
kāhāra chāri kāhāra pāñcha śuṇa ho mahārājā | 73 |
ẏehirūpe ḷiḷākari rahile dvārikāre kāmapāḷa hari
karuṣṇara saṁpada bacane ke kahita pāri | 74 |
nāti paṇanāti ye aneka suta hele | 75 |
amr̥ta pāne yehne ātmā hoẏe toṣa | 76 |
arakṣita loka bandhu dukhī lokaṁkara dhana
bhagata janaṁkara se ye aṭanti pañchuprāṇa | 79 |
sudaẏā kale mote sāroḷā caṇḍī debī
teṇu kari muhiṁ tāṁka śrīcaraṇe sebi | 82 |
se debī yahuṁ mora kaṇṭhare bijekale
teṇu kari pada mora hr̥daru sphurile | 83 |
kathāra chaṭake amr̥ta laḍu chaḍāiṇa nelu | 2 |
maṅgaḷa utsaba kāḷe tora nāma karanti bandanā
yātrā utsaba kāḷe tora nāma karanti gaṇanā | 3 |
bākyadebī sebi sabong bidyā sādhyā kalu
bākya na phurai āgyāṁ dia haraśiṣya | 5 |
kabi sāroḷa dāsaku rakha he harabatsi | 6 |
śrī mahābhāratha madhyapabng kahucha muni mote
tahiṁ pare kisa helā kaha toṣa citte | 8 |
ẏekamana hoiṇa tu śuna ho nr̥pati | 9 |
rūḍhāsura boli asure rājya kalāka tahiṁre | 10 |
kāḷe sehu asura anyāẏaṇa tahiṁ kalā
deba dānabare se kāhāku na ḍarilā | 11 |
ẏemante aneka kāḷa sehu rajya kari
aḷambuṣā boli sehu nagrara nāma dilā | 15 |
atihiṁ adharma paṇare sehu dina nelā
debatā brāhmaṇanta se bahuta dukha dilā | 18 |
ẏemanteṇa rājya se ye karai asurādhi
svarga mañcha pātāḷa tini puraku jiṇilā | 22 |
chaḍamukha pachāranti tu ki nimante ailu
pr̥thī yāke ta ẏekāṅga catrabratī hoilu | 25 |
bābu rūḍhāsura pitā tora thilā mahābaḷī
anyāẏa kale bābu bahuta kāḷa ye na thāi
dharmare thile pr̥thī kāḷe kāḷe bhoga hoi | 28 |
tohora pitā ye kebheṁ dharma na thāpilā
svarga mañcha pātāḷe kāhākaiṁ na ḍarilā | 29 |
sehi puṇi kāḷe rahi nuārilā mahī
akīrtti kathā ẏebe tāhāra acchi rahi | 30 |
dharma kathāẏe tāhāra mana na baḷai
tumbhara chāmuku mukhiṁ ailai yahiṁ pāi | 35 |
tumbhara daẏā yebe mote achai hr̥dagate | 36 |
tebe kīrati tumbhara rahiba chāri ye yugara | 37 |
nānādi śahasramāna aṅgare paḍi mora hoibāka bhasma | 38 |
nikucha jana hāthe muṁ na debai prāṇa | 39 |
ẏe tinipura madhye muhiṁ hoibi baraṇi
bara pāile ki rakhiba svarga mañcha pātāḷa | 42 |
ẏehu bra pāile pr̥thi kebeheṁ na rakhai | 43 |
kebeheṁ bara ẏehāku muhiṁ ye na debi
amara baraṭi tuhi māgilu yebe mote
amara hoi jaṇe kehi rahi nāhi ẏethe | 46 |
amara bara bābu nohai kicchi bhala
deba dānabare tote na sahibe keha | 48 |
dharma kathā kale bābu sabudine thāi
adharma kathāku gale pr̥thī na rahai | 49 |
tuhi ye amara bara māguachu mote
āmbhara daẏā acchi na debu kemante | 50 |
ẏe mañcha maṇḍaḷare ho yeteka rājā chanti
pitā tohora tāhānta ta jiṇicchi sāṁrāme
pātāḷapuraku ho na kara tu mana
ābara kathāẏe tote kahibā śuṇa manadei
tāhāra saṅge sāṁgrāma kale jiṇita nuāri | 56 |
āmbhara āgyāṁre tuhi tāhāku na jiṇimuṁ
tāhā tule khaḍiāḷi tuhi ye nohibu | 57 |
tāhāṁkara tule tu nohibu khaḍiāḷi ye aprīta | 58 |
candra sūryya yoge śasya phaḷa hoẏe bābu
ẏehi yoge tāṁka saṅge yuddha na karibu | 62 |
sabu kathāre tote bujhāi kahili re bābu | 63 |
yāhā tu kahilu prabhma se kathā karibi
indrara bajre tu abaśya hoibu prāṇe nāśa
tahuṁ proḍhāsura śīghra caḷiṇa ye galā
kārttikeśvara mote dile ye ẏehi bara | 73 |
tinipura jiṇa boli ẏemanta āgyāṁ dile
deba dānabare mora bhaẏa bege sajakara
ẏebeho bho mantrī tu mora bolakara
mahā mahā baḷī rājā achanti mr̥tupure
ẏeku ẏeka rāẏe ye achanti baḷīẏāre | 78 |
mantrīra mukharu ye ẏesaneka bākya śuṇi
keuṁ keuṁ deśare se karichanti grama | 80 |
tebe se saṁprate ye hoiba manara | 81 |
kr̥pāḷu manrī bolai śuṇa ho sābadhāne
tāra māmuṁ śakuni ye aṭe mantrībara | 83 |
ābara bhīṣma droṇa kr̥pa ye śailye
hātha pādare śaṅkhanidhi padmanidhi ye achai | 85 |
lakṣaṇabanta puruṣa lakṣmī kṣaṇeheṁ na chāḍai
mahābaḷī karṇṇa ye pākhare tāra thāi | 86 |
mantrī mukharu sehu ẏesaneka bāṇī śuṇi
boilā thāṭha sanya tuhi mora bege sajakara
abaśya yibaiṁ muhiṁ hastinā nagra pura | 88 |
mantrī boilā rāẏe kopa tu na kara
yujehṣṭhi bhīma arjuna nakuḷa sahadeba hoiẏe | 90 |
arjuna boli kari paṇḍura yebaṇa tanaẏe
śrīkr̥ṣṇara sādurśye ye tāhāra prāṇa hoẏe | 92 |
akṣaẏa troṇa ye paśupatra nelā māgi
koṭi īśvara hoile na jiṇantu bābu tote
jārāsandha duhitā aṭai heti ye paraheti
tāhānta bibhā hoilā kaṁsa ye nr̥pati | 100 |
ghenāi ailā taguṁ ye kaṁsa nr̥panātha | 105 |
dekhilā mātrake kaṁsa hoilā prāṇe nāśa
trodheṇa sehu dhāḍi dilā aṭhara ye beḷa
āu rājāmānaṁkara nāma tu kaha jaṇe jaṇe | 111 |
goṭi goṭi kari rājāmānaṁka kathā kahai bakhāṇi | 112 |
mantrīki boilā tu sabu kathā chāḍa
mohora kathāku tu ho mane kara dr̥ḍha | 114 |
śaṅkha ye mahurī ādi bāju ghana ghana | 116 |
ẏehā śuṇi kr̥pāḷu mantrī begeṇa caḷigalā

lg.note: kr̥pāḷu mantrī ye kahai dibyabāṇī | (kha, ṭha)

lg.l: saja hoi ubhā dāṇḍe huantu samaste | 119 |
śaṅkha mahurī ye kāhāḷī bāju puṇi | 120 |
ẏeka mane śuṇa tu ho madhyepabong rīti | 1 |
tu ye pachārilu mote proḍhāsura badha
ẏeka mane śuṇa tumbhe citta kari śuddha | 2 |
ye yāhāra mate saja hoiṇa aile | 3 |
hāthī ratha aśva caḍhi hoile bāhāra
pādānti baḷamane ye aile saja hoi
tera lakṣa rathī tahiṁ hoile bāhāra
cauda lakṣa hāthī ye atihiṁ agocara | 6 |
bāiśi lakṣa ye pādānti baḷa saja
saja hoi aile tohora thāṭha sanya | 12 |
dibya ratheka saja kari achai rakhāi | 13 |
āpaṇe beśa beśana hoi tahiṁ bijekara
yahiṁki mana tahiṁki yāa ho nr̥pabara | 14 |
āpaṇe saja hoi ailā daitakuḷa maṇi | 15 |
karṇṇare kuṇḍaḷa ye kaṇṭhe kaṇṭhimāḷa lāi | 16 |
bīrabara nāme tiḷaka ghenai lalāṭare puṇi | 17 |
anakūḷa kari yāiṁ basilā rathara upara | 18 |
doṣa kṣamā kale chāmure jaṇāibi muhiṁ | 22 |
rājā boile muṁ doṣa kali kṣamā
ẏekamana hoi tu ho śuṇa nr̥pabare | 24 |
kapiḷāsa kandare tote kehu dilā bara
ẏethira tadanta kathā kaha mo āgara | 25 |
se mote prasanne abhaẏe bara deiṇa achanti
deba dānabare mote jiṇantā nāhiṁ pr̥thī | 27 |
mantri boilā muṁ kahai tohora chāmure
mohora kathā ẏebe śuṇa ho nr̥pabare | 28 |
akṣaẏe troṇa pāśupatra deichanti pābongtī īśvare | 31 |
āge ta toha chāmure kahiacchi muhiṁ
mohora bola na kari tu yebe yibu nr̥parāẏe
kāryya kicchi nohiba tu noibu ajaẏe | 34 |
kuñjagaḷa deśaku na yibā mohora manara | 35 |
lg.note: “mohora bacanaku tu pāsoru nr̥pasāiṁ” | pare ‘kha’ pothire pāṭha :–
se sinā santoṣa tote deichanti bara
tāhāra pitā mātā ye iśvara pābongtī

lg.l: mantrīra bolaṭi yebe na karibi muhiṁ
kemante muṁ rājya sukheṇa bhoga karibaiṁ | 37 |
ẏethira upāẏa mantrī kaha mote puṇi | 39 |
yeuṁ rājā āmbhanta sandhāna dei bheṭibāka
tāhāra saṅge āmbhe ho na karibā hāka | 41 |
tāhāra saṅge āmbhe ye karibā dvandagoḷa | 42 |
thāṭha caḷāiṇa rājā bāhāra bege hoi | 43 |
diga bijekari kahiṁ bāhi yāucchi asura | 47 |
na puṇa svarga bhmabanaku dhāḍi dei
tumbhe yāiṁ tadanta bujha ho mana dei | 48 |
boilā gosāiṁ he kāhiṁ thila tumbhe
nārada boile tu ho āmbhe kalyāṇare
ārogya śarīra tu ho baha kāḷe kāḷe | 52 |
kalyāṇa kariṇa tāku pachāranti ye muni
āmbheheṁ thāiṁ kinā tohora ye saṅge | 55 |
ẏete kahi rājā ye rathare basilā
tāhāra saṅgate āmbhe dvanda na karibā | 63 |
yuddha kale baḷe ye nuāribā āmbhe
dhana sandhāna dei bodha karibāka hāde | 64 |
binaẏa bhagati se ye aneka hoilā | 67 |
birāḷa deśare ye prabeśa helā yāiṁ | 69 |
bāratā pāiṇa ye bīra kedāra rāṇa
ki buddhi karibi boli bichārai citta | 72 |
ki buddhi karibaiṁ ẏebe kaha ho bichāri
muṁ yāhā kahibi tu ho anyasthā na kara | 75 |
thāṭha saini gheni rājā bāhāra ye hoi
ẏeḍe kopa mote kimpe karu mahārāṇa | 79 |
proḍhāsura rājā ye mane mane guṇi | 81 |
ẏe yebe bhagati ho āsi hoilāka mote
ẏehāku kopa muṁ ta na kare kadācite | 82 |
ẏemante jiṇilā caurāśi sahasra ye rājā
keuṁṇasi rājā mukhe na pāilā parijā | 87 |
āu rājāmāne ke ke boli kopa kaẏe | 88 |
āu kete rājā chantikaha mo gocara | 89 |
mantrī bole āu chanti bārasasra rāẏe

lg.note: samādhāna gheni ẏebe bāhuḍiṇa yāa | (kha, ja)

lg.l: tohora kathā ye mote nohilā gocara | 91 |
tu ye kr̥pāḷu mantrī mora aṭu guṇabanta
tohora kathā muṁ na laghai kadācita | 93 |
sābadhāna hoi tu ho śuṇimā daṇḍadhārī | 94 |
ẏeka ẏeka kari kahai tumbhara aprate | 95 |
laṁkā nāme tahiṁ achai ẏeka ye nagarī | 96 |
tāhāra bhaẏe debe svarge na rahanti
chapana gaṇḍā yugaku āiṣya achai tāhāra
biṣṇura chāmure debe guhāri ye kale | 100 |
tāhānta śrīrāma ye laṁkāre rājā kari
ẏeke ẏeke tinipura sādhi se paranti | 109 |
kumbhakarṇṇa nāme thilā tāra ẏeka bhāi
cauda bhmabane bira tā samāne nāhiṁ | 110 |
meghare luci karai se bīra samara | 111 |
boile tu yuge yuge thibu ẏehimati | 113 |
105|2 “r̥kṣa kapibaḷamāna tahiṁ ruṇḍa kale” ehi pāṭhānta pare<lb/>‘kha’ o ‘pa’ pothire adhikā ika pada :–

div.note: amara pada dei tāku rakhile raghubīra | (aneka pothi)

lg.l: tretaẏā dvapara dui yuga ẏebe hoilā
se rājāku tuhi ta jiṇi nuāribu baḷe
āu rājāṁkara nāma kaha ho boilā | 117 |
kr̥pāḷu mantrī ye kahai toṣa citte
kiṣkindhyā rājya boli achai ẏeka nagre
tāhāra jyeṣṭha bhāi bāḷi nāme mahārāṇa
ẏemante ye tretaẏā yuga galā bahi
śrīrāmara bare tāra kāhāku nāhiṁ bhaẏe
tāhāra tule sāṁgrāma kale tote nāhiṁ jaẏe | 123 |
mantrīra bacane rājā mana hetu kalā
āu keuṁdige achai ye keuṁ keuṁ rājā
tebe se mora manu upekṣibi parijā | 125 |
āge ta śuṇichu dui rājāṁka carita
sapata samudre rājā baruṇa ye hoi
mr̥gasena carita tu kaha mo āge pratakhye | 134 |
mantrī boilā ho sehu baḍa baḷīẏāra
thāṭha sanya nāhiṁ tāra ẏekā karai samara | 135 |
ẏekā dhanu ẏekā nārāja ye dharithāi
para thāṭha paḍile se ẏekāẏe yujhai | 136 |
mr̥gasena boliṇa se kimpe nāma bolāilā | 137 |
kr̥pāḷu mantrī se ye kahai bacana
manuṣya yonire se ye jāta hoināhiṁ
byāṣaruṣi āpaṇe ye thāi nāma deigalā | 141 |
byāsaruṣi parasāde se kahāku na ḍarai
mantrī mukha chāhiṁṇa ye āpaṇe pachārilā | 143 |
daṇḍa saina gheni chāla tāhā saṅge yujhibā | 144 |
ruṣi aṁśe jāta hoiacchi mr̥gasena nr̥pabara | 145 |
ẏemanta samaẏe miḷile yāiṁ narada tapaśīḷa | 146 |
aneka rājā muṁ ye jiṇiṇa aili
kāhāri tule yuddha muhiṁ na pāili | 149 |
samasta rājaẏe samādhāna dei bhagati hoile
abaśya tāhāra tule dvanda goṭiẏe karibaiṁ | 151 |
tebe se tora āge kahibi kathāẏe | 153 |
ruṣi aṁśa gheni sehu hoiacchi jāta
ẏekā brāhmaṇa se ye abadhya aṭai
duje kṣatrīpaṇa kari dhanu śahasra dharai | 155 |
ẏekā hoiṇa sehu ye karai samara
tāhāra saṅge samara karibā āmbhara nohai bichāra | 156 |
prīti bandhu paṇa ye kāḷe kāḷe thiba
heu boliṇa sehu ye sanamata kalā | 159 |
kimarthe muni he taba ẏethaku āgamana
nārade boile āmbhe ailu yahiṁ paiṁ
tahiṁra carita ho tu śuṇa maandei | 163 |
teṇu kari tote kahilu ho byāsabacchi | 166 |
muni boile ho sehu achai bahudūre
ki bichāra karibā kaha ho nr̥pamaṇi | 169 |
mr̥gasena boilā muṁ tāhāra saina baḷa nāśibi
kete baḷa tāhāra achai ẏebe āsu
abaśya śarīra tāhāra karibi dhūḷi pāṁśu | 171 |
tu ẏebe kathāẏe ho kara nr̥pabara
duṣṭara saṁgate kimpe karibā dvanda kaḷi
bināśa kāraṇe ho nohu ẏete dvandagoḷa
muniṁka bacana mora meṇṭaṇa na galā | 178 |
ẏemante proḍhāsura ye daṇḍa sanya caḷāi
ṭamaka niśāṇa bājai ye garu ṭāṇa
nārade boile kopa na kara tu rāẏe
ki bichāra tahiṁre kala kaha ho munibara | 183 |

div.note: muniṁka bacana se meṇṭaṇa na kalā | (ja, kha)

lg.l: nārade boile tāhā kahibā tora āge
dvandare ārambha na kariba tora saṅge | 184 |
sabong śubha kathā śuṇilu ye śubha bhāgye
prīti kathāmāna kahilā se mora āge | 185 |
muniẏe boile duheṁ maitra ye hua
yuge yuge kathā puṇa ruhāiṇa thāa | 187 |
ẏete kahi muni ye bahana uṭhile
mr̥gasena rājā pāśe sehu yāiṁṇ amiḷile | 188 |
kaḷi dvanda nohu sehu yāu apramāde | 189 |
hou boliṇa se ye bacana bhāṣilā | 190 |
dui rājāṁku se bheṭa karāile puṇi | 191 |
tahuṁ thāṭha gheniṇa se caḷai bahana
se deśara rājā ye kāmeśvara rāẏe
ki buddhi karibā ẏebe ho kaha mantrībara
kibā samādhāna dei tāku bāhuḍāi debā | 196 |
tu ye mantrībara ho bichāriṇa kaha
proḍhāsura asura ye aṭai baḍa duṣṭa
yuddha kale tāhāku āmbhe nuāribā jiṇi
yuddha na karibā ho śuṇa nr̥paśiṣi | 200 |
tohora bacana muṁ kebeheṁ na karai āna | 202 |
dhāiṁ āsiṇa ḍagara ye bāratā kahilā | 203 |
śire kara deiṇa se binoẏī hoilā
kopa śānti kalā ye hoilā parama sukhī | 212 |
se nagrara nāma ye sujāṇa aṭai
se rajāra nāma ye aṭai surabīra
dhanabanta paṇe tāku kubera saṅge lekhi | 217 |
se surabīra rājā aṭai baḍa bigyāṁbanta
kāhāri saṅgare sehu na karai anartha | 218 |
āpaṇā sukhe se tāra rājya karuthāi
kāhari saṅge se ye khadiāḷi nohai | 219 |
śatr̥ boli rājā kicchihiṁ na jāṇai
ẏe bāratā yāiṁ tāku ḍagarā jaṇāilā | 222 |
tohora rājyaku prodhāsura samadaṇḍa ye caḷāi | 223 |
jagatara nātha tumbhe kara mote trādi
tohora caraṇa binu muṁ anyagati na jāṇaiṁ | 225 |
se prabhma mote sabongdā daẏā karithāiṁ
ghora bipattiru se mote uddhari dharai | 227 |
ẏebe āsi mote prabha paḍilā bipatti
ẏemante aneka stuti kalā yahuṁ rājā
dekhā daraśani dhana sajakara ho boilā | 232 |
puṇihiṁ rājā chāmure yāiṁ se miḷilā | 234 |
surabīra rājā bolai ẏehi anakūḷe yibā
samādhāna dei tāhā saṅge pīrati hoibā | 236 |
ratheka caḍhi rājā bāhāra ye hoi
samādhāna nei surabīra rājā āsai caḷāi | 238 |
tāhāra saṅge āmbhe dvanda bāda na karibā kicchi | 239 |
śire kara deiṇa ye kahai bacana
daẏā kala mohora rājyare paḍilā caraṇa | 241 |
samasta daṇḍa sanya gheniṇa caḷai āpaṇa
ẏehirūpe aneka rajya bhramaṇi se kalā
kehuṇasi rajāṭhāre se dvanda na pāilā | 245 |
apaṇḍita paṇḍita hoẏe ẏehā śuṇile śrabaṇe | 247 |
puṇa puṇa namaskāra karai kṣaṇe kṣaṇe | 248 |
ẏebe proḍhāsura ki kalā mote kahibā bujhāi | 249 |
surabīra rajāku se melāṇi ye dilā
samadaṇḍa gheniṇa ye sehu tahuṁ bāhuḍilā | 250 |
ẏehā mote bujhāi kaha ho puṇyadehī | 251 |
mantrī mukha chāhiṁṇa se bhāṣai bacana
ẏebe chāla ho nuja rājyaku mora yibā
nicinta hoiṇa ye āmbhe rājya karuthibā | 256 |
mantrī boilā ho ye tohora āgyāṁ
kandhe bīṇāyantra ye kare daṇḍa lāi
bibhūti aṅge boḷi kāibasra pariharaṇa hoi | 259 |
ẏemante kaḷi dhokaḍi muṇi kākhare yākichanti
hari dhūni kariṇa se śunyare gamanti | 260 |
kaḷi dvanda na pāile mana tāṁka huai ākuḷi | 261 |
pūbongra śāpa taṁkara kebeheṁ meṇṭana na yāi
thira hoiṇa muni kṣaṇeheṁ na rahai | 262 |
śūnya mārgare se ye āsuthile jāṇa
ratha upare thāiṇa ye dekhilā asura
uthiṇa nāradaṁak chāmure kalāka daraśani namaskāra | 265 |
āja mora baḍa bhāgya dekhili munimaṇi
baḍa daẏākari mote śaṅkhoḷi aila ta puṇi | 266 |
pr̥thīyāka buliṇa muṁ samasta sādhya kali
aneka rajya muhiṁ bhrami bhrami phuṭili | 269 |
ẏebe leuṭiṇa muṁ yibi nija rājya | 270 |
kaḷi na pāina muni ye bhramanti deśe deśe
hasiṇa bolanti tu ho śuṇa mahārāẏe
agamya latā tahiṁ panti panti gahaḷa | 276 |
sāta tāḷa gabhīra tahiṁ thaḷa kūḷa nāhiṁ
dhāna mātra na upujai bahuta tahiṁra | 280 |
pañcha sahasra rathī ye gaja ẏekalakṣa
se rājāku bābu tuhi pāribu ki jiṇi | 282 |
tāhāra rājyaku ta yibāku bāṭa nāhiṁ
daṇḍa sāja bege yibā kr̥takeśīra bhmabana | 285 |
nāradaṁka kathā śuṇi mora na sahai dehī
tāhāra tule muṁ ye abaśya dvanda karibaiṁ | 286 |
tebe se manaru mora bhrānti ye phiṭai | 288 |
agasti boile tu ho śuṇa manu puruṣa
dineka nārada muni tāra rājyku aile
basibā ṭhābare muniṁki ye namaskāra kalā | 291 |
mane mane khaṅga sehu pāile apāra | 292 |
kichu na boliṇa muni hr̥dagatare bhābile
basi kari ẏehu mote kalā namaskāra
mohora āge gabong kathā kahai apāra | 294 |
kr̥takeśī pachārilā thila he muni kahiṁ
muni boile muṁ ākāśu āsucchi caḷāi | 295 |
nārade boile aneke chanti baḷī mahārathā
nārade yahuṁ se kahile āga baḍhi
kaḷi na pāiṇa muni bulanti deśe deśa
ẏebe ta dvanda kaḷi loḍucha muni dehī
kaḷi dhokaḍi muṇiki kākhare ye lāi | 303 |
manda prakr̥ti tumbhe kebeheṁ na chāḍa
kaḷi dvanda kathā tumbha manaku se baḍa | 304 |
ẏemanta prākāre ye muniṁki gāḷi dilā
tu ye pachārilu kr̥takeśī rājā kathā
yemante tāhāra rājyaku muṁ karibaiṁ nāśa
tebe se mohora rahiba sinā baḍa yaśa | 310 |
mohora āgare se gabong kathā kahilā
mohora bacana sehu abagyāṁ ye kalā | 311 |
gabongkathāku muṁ ye kebeheṁ na sahai
śāpa dile ta abaśya adharma paibaiṁ | 312 |
para hāthe tāhāku muṁ diāibi daṇḍa
uṭha kr̥takeśī rājyaku yibā ho bahana | 314 |
tu rājā tāhānta yebe jiṇi nuāribu
pr̥thibīyāka bulili kṣama nohilā ẏeka jaṇe | 317 |
samādhāna dei prīti hoilā tora tule | 319 |
pr̥thīre kāhāku se gaṇanā na kaẏe | 320 |
tu keuṁ rājā tote gaṇanā kariba
abaśya tohora tule se yuddha ārambhiba | 321 |
tāhāra rājyaku tu ho nuāribu yāi
abaśya saina muṁ ye nemaiṁ caḷāi | 323 |
kapaṭa kūṭa māẏā muṁ jāṇaiṁ apāra
pr̥thī buli dvanda na pāicchi keuṇa ṭhābara | 325 |
daiba puruṣa mote kaḷi āṇi dilā | 326 |
mohora ṭhāre daẏā tumbhara achai tapobanta | 327 |
muni boile tu ho daṇḍa bege sāja
māra māra śabada ye śubhai gahaḷa | 331 |
bana gahane ye bana jantumāne thile
pr̥thī debīra bhaẏa ta kahile na sarilā
mukha bāṭe bānti ye karai rudhira | 338 |
śūnyare yāuchanti ye pāda na lage bhūmi bhāge | 347 |
āpaṇe garjana ye karucchi daitakuḷa maṇi | 348 |
śūnyare gamante ye parbata dhūḷi hoi
bho nātha ẏe kathāku bujhibā subāge | 354 |
se nārada muni pāiyiba puṇa lāja | 357 |
deba dānabare se kāhāku na gaṇaiṁ | 358 |
proḍhāsura mahiṁmā se na jāṇai kicchi

lg.note: “āmbhara rājyaku bāhilā nr̥pabara” pare ‘ṭha’ pothire bhinna pāṭha :–
pr̥thibī bhamilā tāku nohile ke sama
tohora rājyaku nāśa kariba se kāri |

lg.l: śrī mahābhārtha ẏe amr̥ta rasamaẏe gīta | 360 |
śūdramuni āroḷa dāsaku rakha ho catrapāṇi | 365 |
adr̥śya dr̥śya yemante hoai hara śiṣa | 366 |
śrī biśvanātha mote uddhara deba svamī
bho muni kahibā mote proḍhāsura carita
kemanta prakāre jiṇilā sehu kr̥takeśī naranātha | 2 |
tahiṁra carita mote kaha ho toṣamane
toṣamana hoi tu ho śuṇa narapati | 4 |
mantrī boilā tu ho mandakr̥tya kalu
nāradaṁka tule tu ye bibādī hoilu | 8 |
āmbhara tule samara āja kariba mahāghora | 10 |
ki buddhi karibi boli manare bhāḷilā | 12 |
mantrī bole samādhāna dile kebeheṁ na neba
pr̥thī buli ye kāhiṁ na pāilā raṇa
raṇa raṁkā hoi asura bolai bacana | 15 |
yuddha na kale ta tote bhala gati nāhiṁ
khaṇāra ẏe pākha ye āboriṇa thāa | 20 |
baḷabante yebe asura khaṇā pāra hoi
tebe se asura baḷa hoibāka kṣaẏe
khaṇāra chāripākhe gheri rahile yahuṁ thāṭha
nagrare paśi ta se na pāile bāṭa | 25 |
ki buddhi karibā ẏebe kaha ho munibara | 26 |
ẏe khaṇā keḍe gabhīra tadanta na jāṇili
ẏe kr̥takeśīki muṁ ye jiṇi naārili | 27 |
nārade boile kicchi na bhāḷa ho rāẏe
upāẏa prakāre muṁ haribaiṁ ẏehuṁ jaḷa
ẏe kathāku cintā tu na kara mahīpāḷa | 29 |
śukhilāka jaḷa ye khaṇā hoilāka thaḷa
re re kāra kari jhasāi paśile proḍhāsurara bala | 31 |
nārada muniṁku bahuta praśaṁsā ye kalā | 32 |
bho muni ẏebe muṁ tambhara parasāde
hāthī rathī pādānti saja ye hoile
pāika māhunta aśuāra pādānti baḷa yete thile | 35 |
māra māra śabada ye ucceṇa ḍākadyanti | 38 |
para āpaṇā ke bāri ta nuāri | 42 |
dui baḷa loka ẏekameḷi ye hoile
uñcha pāñcha kaḷi ye yāhāre ārambhile | 43 |
daśa biṁśa pañchiśa paḍanti ẏekā bāṇakare | 47 |
aneka ye pādāghāte hele ghoḍā hāthī daḷi | 48 |
teḍebaḍa saina baḷa goṭā khaḷabaḷa hoile
kṣaṇaka bhitare ye se nārakhāra hoigale | 49 |
kete saina male na jāṇilu bhale | 51 |
kr̥takeśī pachārai khaṇā kemanta pāri hoile
se nyāẏaru thāṭha saina pāri ye hoilā | 56 |
para āpaṇā ye sehu kicchi na jāṇilā | 58 |
boilā mote nāśa kale nārada tapaśīḷa | 59 |
ẏethiki upāẏa kisa tu ho kaha mantrībare | 60 |
mantrī boilā tora āu acchi ki upāẏe
nisata hoibāra ta nohai ho rāẏe | 61 |
pāra napāra dvandva kara tāra tule
akāraṇe saina nāśa na kara nr̥pabae | 62 |
rājā bichārai muṁ mantrī bola na kale
yeuṁṇa rājā na ghenai mantrīra bacana
se rājā na pāiṭi kāḷe yaśa puṇa | 64 |
nāradaṁka bichāre nāśa hoilā rājya mora | 66 |
māra māra śabade ye pr̥thibī kampai
teṇu kari bipāka hoilā karma kaṣṭa | 72 |
kāhāra āge kahibaiṁ karmara ye doṣa
thāṭha saina mora ta samasta nāśa gale
mohora prāṇa rakhibi kimpe āu bhale | 78 |
rājāku dekhiṇa thāṭha saina ye dhāiṁle
māra māra boliṇa se garjiṇa uṭhile | 81 |
prodhāsura saina ye samare paḍanti ghāẏe
māra māra boli sehu ratha caḷāilā
boilā rājā tu re aṭu baḷīẏāra
kahuṁ kahuṁ nārāja bindhai lakṣa lakṣa
kaḷi dhokaḍi muṇiru dhūḷi muṭhāẏe buṇanti puṇi | 86 |
duheṁ mahāchatrī kehi na ghuñchanti paẏe
aneka śahasra marāmari huanti ye duheṁ | 89 |
āreka bāṇa peṣi proḍhāsura chedilā dhanuśara
āmbhara rāṇa tote tu tāku na kara nidhana
doṣaku se daṇḍa pāilāka ẏebe jāṇa | 96 |
ẏehāku ẏeṭhāru ho āmbhe dhari gheniyibā
tāhāṁkara bole sinā kr̥takeśīki jaẏe kalā | 98 |
bāḷa chāḍi dilā sehu nāradaṁka bacane
khaṇā ḍeiṁ tāhāra rājyaru galā bāhāra hoi | 101 |
bināśa kāraṇe yuddhakalā ẏe mohora saṁgara | 102 |
kr̥takeśīki boile āmbhanta na manibā phaḷe
ẏe kr̥takeśī pramāde mora saina nāśagale
ẏehāra prāṇa muṁ ho haribaiṁ bhale | 109 |
ẏethaku cintā tu ho na kara mahārāẏe
āmbhara kalyāṇe ho yaśa tu pāilu | 112 |
tumbhara bacana na karibi ki ẏebe
nārade bolanti śuṇa tu asura sukhī | 115 |
doṣaku ye daṇḍa ẏehu pāilā bahuta
muniṁka bacana kebeheṁ ayathā na kalā
āgyāṁ paramāṇe ye mantrī galā caḷi
bhaṇḍāra ghare paśi aneka dhana ye sajāḍi | 123 |
sahasre ka hāthī sehu bege sajakalā | 124 |
duisahasra aśva sunā rūpā bākhara sahite
dekhiṇa rājā ye mantrīki bahu praśaṁsilā | 127 |
lg.note: “kr̥takeśī rājāra bandhana pheidilā” pare keteka pothire pāṭha :–
teṇu kari ẏete śāsti dii muṁ tote |
na ja ṇi aprādha kali kṣamākara svāmī |

lg.l: aneka samādhāna padārtha āṇi mote dilā | 129 |
nārade boile t santoṣ hoilu ki
ẏe kathā pheḍiṇa mote kaha upalekhi | 130 |
ẏeteka saina mora nāśa ye hoilā | 136 |
boile re rājā mane na bhāḷa tu kicchi
tohora saina jīiṁbāku muṁ upaẏa karuacchi | 138 |
ẏete boli muni pāṇi muṭhāẏe mantrile
māra māra dhara dhara boliṇa phukāranti | 140 |
ẏe rājā āmbhanta ye hoilā bhagate | 141 |
rājāra kahante saini tūnī ye hoile
ye yāhāra mate dhīre dhīre ye rahile | 142 |
puṇi jaḷa dhari mantra paḍhileka muni
tumbhara nirddaẏāre muṁ pāilaiṁ baḍa kaṣṭa
ẏebe sābadhāne tu ho śuṇa ẏekacitte
yemante pātaka tora na rahai gātre | 149 |
thāṭha saina gheniṇa ye caḷāiṇa galā | 150 |
na puṇa āmbhara saṅge yuddha ārambhai | 155 | 10984 |
lg.head: {@proḍhāsura badha@}

lg.l: baḍāi durbhāra se ye aṭai asura
kaha jagatara pitā kisa karibā bichāra | 4 |
āu ki svargapura rahiba tāhāra dhāḍi dile | 6 |
kāhāra hāthare mariba se kaha kuśadhārī | 7 |
khaḍi pakāiṇa se ye manare hasanti | 9 |
indra pachāranti tumbhe hasila guru he
varge rahi pāribā ki asurara bhaẏe | 10 |
asura kathāku na bhāḷa he ākhaṇḍaḷi | 11 |
asura kathāku na bhāḷa ho ākhaṇḍaḷi | 14 |
br̥haspati kahante indra brahmā ye śuṇile
debatāẏe gale tahuṁ ye yāhā mandira | 19 |
ẏebe jiṇima boli āsuacchi amara maṇḍaḷa | 22 |
śacī boile tāku kara prāṇe nāśa
indra boile se thokaẏeka dina acchi
mohora bajrāghāte yiba ki se bañchi | 24 |
svargamañcha pātāḷa ẏe tinipura mora hoiba jāṇa | 29 |
thokāẏeka dina tu thāa ho tohora nabare | 30 |
proḍhāsurara carita kaha mote ye bujhāi | 37 |
ẏe kathā bujhāi mote kaha munibara
yāhā pachārilu tu ho śuṇa manadei | 40 |
thāṭha sanya mora tuho bege ajakara
indra saṅge muhiṁ karibaiṁ ye samara | 42 |
rājā āgyāṁ gheni se mandiraku galā | 44 |
pādānti rathi ye ghoḍā maẏematta gaja | 48 |
tini kṣauṇī ye paika baḷa sanya | 50 |
bīratūra śabade kampai tini ye bhmabana | 54 |
thāṭha saina āgare gale ye bāhāra hoi
asurara saja dekhi tahuṁ bege bāhuḍile | 62 |
sābadhāna hoi dekhai se kaśyapara śiṣye | 64 |
paẏe paḍi śoi se śire kara dile | 65 |
ki buddhi karibā kaha ẏebe surarāṇa
rājā āgyāṁ pāiṇa ye debatāẏe gale
śaṅga mahurī ṭamaka ye bājai kuṭuhoḷa | 76 |
kare bajrasūci dhariṇa se kopamāna kaẏe | 77 |
gaṇa gandhabong debatāẏe saja hoile ye yāhāre | 79 |
saja hoiṇa se ye thokāẏeka dūra gale
māra māra śabada kariṇa ḍākanti asure
ḍāka śuṇi debataẏe dhāiṁle ye khare | 84 |
muna moḍi hoiṇa se bhūmire paḍai
asuraṁka aṅgare ye litāẏe na bhedai | 86 |
ghāẏe pāiṇa ye asura hoiṇa kopamukha
kahuṁ kahuṁ śahasra ye marāmari hoanti
kehi kāhākaiṁ sāṁgrāme ucha ye nohanti | 89 |
teheneka hoi asura baḷa bhūmire loṭai | 91 |
maḍāra upare maḍā kuḍha kuḍha paḍile
rathī hāthī ghoḍā pādānti aneka kṣaẏe gale | 92 |
rakata bahibāre yehne nadīẏe baḍhiṇa uchuḷi | 93 |
gidhra śr̥gāḷe ye māẏeṁsa sukhe bhakṣi | 94 |
kaḷi dhokaḍi muṇiru dhūḷi muṭhāẏe biñchale
lāgu dhuni kari se nāceka nācile | 96 |
hari dhuni kari bīṇānāda ye ghoṣanti
ẏemante rātreka dibaseka ghora samara doilā
asura baḷa ye aneka kṣaẏe galā | 98 |
kāhāra hāthare muṁ ye apacaẏe na pāili | 100 |
kr̥takeśī saṅge muṁ ye kalaiṁ samara
sehi māilā ye mohora aneka saina baḷa | 101 |
apajaẏe kathā pāilaiṁ ẏebe debaṁka hāthare | 102 |
jana jaṇake goṭāẏe lekhāẏe śahasra binddhalā | 104 |
kuḍha kuḍha hoi paḍanti ye debagaṇa | 105 |
boilā asura āre saina kimpe nāśu
āja tote muhiṁ re karibi dhūḷi pāṁśu | 107 |
ẏete boli śatrarāẏe dhanure nārāja pūroi
aṅgare bājante ye nārāja na bhedilā
ṭaha ṭaha hoiṇa ye hasai asura
puṇi sahasre nārāja se bindhai prakhara | 110 |
hāboḍā śare śatrarāẏe tāhā dilāka uḍāi | 111 |
aṅga pātiṇa tāhā ye sahila surasāiṁ | 113 |
khaḷa khaḷa rudhira ye paduacchi bohi | 116
rudhira bahante asura na karai śaṁkā
duheṁ mahāchatrī kehu na ghuñchanti raṇe
beḷuṁ beḷa samara ye aneka hoilā
hāthī rathī pādānti ghoḍā samaste kṣaẏe gale

lg.note: nārāja teje ākaśa dhūmamaẏe hoi<lb/>dibasa ye andhakāra prāẏeka diśai | (ṭha)

lg.l: śahasra bhede aṅga helā rakate jara jara | 125 |
asura baḷa hata dekhi proḍhāsura rāẏe
mane bichāraiṁ muṁ ẏethara hoibaiṁ kṣaẏe | 126 |
gadā bājanteṇa indra aṅga ye pātile
bajra paḍante asura muṇḍa ye pātilā
bibhaṅga nohi se tāha ṭaha hoiṇa hasilā | 130 |
mutheka nei indra rāẏe upare kachāḍai | 131 |
bidhāghāta khāi indra baḍa kopa kale
133|2 “sambhāḷa re proḍhāsura ẏemanta bocale” pare ‘kha’ pothire<lb/>adhikā pāṭha :–

div.note: hr̥da phuṭi piṭhiki se hoilā bāhāra |

lg.l: dekhiṇa nārade ye hari dhuni uṁkāri | 134 |
ẏete boli manare se mahābhaẏa kalā
ẏehāku māile ho hoibāka kisa yaśa
indra boile ho tu āsa mantrībara
sebaka loka bhaẏa na kara manare | 139 |
kṣehikṣaṇi ratha caḍhi rājyaku tora yāiṁ
rājā malā boli rājyare bārtā kaha tuhi | 140 |
manrī bole gosāiṁ tumbha āgyāṁ paramāṇe
sabongdā tāhāra muṁ ye caraṇe khaṭai | 142 |
indra boile kāhāra hāthe sehu malā
mantrī boilā e āpaṇā sukhe nāśagalā | 147 |
indra boile ẏehāra achaiṭi ki putra
mantrī boilā ẏehāra ẏeka achai kumara | 148 |
mantrī kahai tumbhe śuṇa ho surapati | 149 |
tāhāra nāma goṭi ye aṭai moḍhāsura
ẏehā śuṇi sahasrākṣa hasile kara kara | 150 |
mantrīṁki bahu prāśaṁsā karanti sura debe | 153 |
mantrīki boile tu yāa nija deśa
moḍhāsuraku tu yāiṁ kara rājye īśa | 154 |
proḍhāsura nāśi indra rājā tahuṁ bāhuḍile
sabhāmaṇḍopa maṇḍāa boli ye bhr̥tyaku āgyāṁ dile | 158 |
kisa paṭāntara tāku debāiṁ ye bhalā | 159 |

div.note: “sabhāmaṇḍopa maṇḍāa boli bhr̥tyaku āgyāṁ dile” pare<lb/>(kha) pothire adhikā pāṭha

lg.l: īśvara pabana duheṁ ye aile saṅga hoi
tetiśa koṭi debatā ye yāha āstāne basielka yaiṁ | 162 |
vargara ānanda ye kahile na sarai | 165 |
agasti kahanti tu ho manurāẏe śuṇa
pitāra maraṇa śuṇi se kisa bichārilā | 168 |
se rajyara loke tāku pachāranti tahiṁ
tuhita ailu āmbha rājā chanti kāhiṁ | 170 |
baḍāi gariṣṭha se kahāku tiḷe na ḍarilā | 175 |
deba dānabare se kāhāku na ḍarai | 176 |
sañchapi śiṇiluṭiki tu ho manu mahārāṇa
teṇu kari nāma tāṁka aṭe kr̥pāsindhu | 180 |
ẏe bhaba bhaẏa durgatiru rakha nārāẏaṇa | 181 |
bandai kamaḷā mā go biṣṇura pāṭarāṇī

div.note: “mantrī boilā tu trodhakara śānti” pare ‘ṭha’ pothire<lb/>adhikā paṭha :–

lg.l: nitye nitye yeuṁ jana tora caraṇe bandanti
bipuḷa lakṣmī tāku deu go mahāsatī | 185 |
padma puṣyaru janmilu padmanī tora nāma

div.head: {@mūḍhāsurara baralābha o gaṇeśaṅka janma@}

lg.l: mahābhārata kahi kāraṇa kara mora dehī | 2 |
janme janme muhiṁ tumbha dāsaṁkara dāsa
kāhākaiṁ sebi se ẏeḍe gariṣṭha hoilā | 4 |
tebe se mana śānti hoiba mohora | 5 |
ẏeḍe sanddha kathā tote dr̥śyahelā rāẏe
sābadhāne śuna tu kahibā kichu toẏe | 8 |
cita cañchala na kari ẏekamane śuṇa | 9 |
sura asuraṁka saṅge bāda karai nirantara | 13 |
svarga marttya pātāḷa se bhramuthāi niti
nirantare asura nāmare svarge camaka paḍai
upāẏa kari tāku bajradhara ye māile
dine se āsthāna kari basicchi mahābīra
mantrī kurupāḷa boila śuṇa asurakuḷa sāiṁ
indra baḍa gariṣṭha tu kahilu mo chāmura
mantrī bilā tu ho chāḍa mora keśa
svarge indra debatā saṅge yuddha kari
ẏehi kathā pāiṁ muṁ ho tiārai tote
mantrīra mukhuṁ ye rājā ẏemānanta śuṇi
dhīra dhīra kari mantrīki pachārai asura kuḷamaṇi | 30 |
mohora hāthe niceṁ hāriba se prāṇa | 31 |
kr̥pāḷu mantrī ye boilā śuṇa asurakula raẏe
tu mohora ṭhākura muṁ tohora sebaka
tmbhara ye bhalakathā se mohora sulabhakarma
kebeheṁ mohora kathā na karibu bhrama | 34 |
boilā ki buddhi karibā ẏebe kaha ho mantrībara | 36 |
mohora pitāku ta indra prāṇe kalā hata
pitr̥kāryya na kale putrara jībana biartha | 37 |
mantrī boilā śuṇa prabhma kathāra tadante | 38 |
mantrī yāhā kahilā se sarūpa bacana
kemanta prakāre kapiḷāsaku galā asura rājane | 45 |
ẏekamane śuṇa tu ho bilaṁka īśvara | 46 |
tatakṣaṇa sarilā ho kapiḷāsa kandaraku yibā
ẏethu anantare tu ho śuṇa dibyarasa
thāṭha saina nāhiṁ mantrīki gheniṇa bāhāra proḍhāsura śiṣa | 49 |
kapiḷāsa kandara dakṣiṇa dvārare yaiṁṇa miḷilā
boilā kiho mantrī gaṇanātha ẏethi kāhiṁ
mantrī boilā rājā tu śuṇa ẏekamane
br̥ṣabha caṛhiṇa se deba bulanti jagata | 55 |
īśvare boile āmbhe thilu ye svargapurī | 61 |
brahmāẏe boile muṁ chāribeda ye ghoṣai
ruka yaju sāma athabong beda muṁ paḍhai | 63 |
ruka yaju sāma athabong chāribeda ye ghoṣai
brahmāẏe boile muṁ śiśu beda nuāre ki paḍhiṇa
īśvare boile tora āra muṇḍa kāhīṁ puṇa | 67 |
hātha cchiñchāḍante brahma kapāḷa hathuṁ na chāḍilā
boile īśvare mora gale abā kāhiṁ
phulabane dine bijaẏe bjaẏe kaleka pābongtī | 79 |
hastā nakṣatra ye debīṁki aṭe sādhaka tāra | 80 |
ẏekeṇa basanta māsa bahai maḷaẏa pabana
sugandha gheniṇa pabana tahiṁ bahai abicchanna | 84 |
boile īśvaraṁka bīryya yebe paḍanta ẏethire | 87 |
ati baḷabanta hoi sehu putra hoithāntā | 88 |
bichāru bichāru debīṁku hr̥dare kathāẏeka sphurilā
īśvaraṁka bibhūti nei se tahiṁre medilā | 89 |
thanaru kṣīra mukhe dianti thira kari | 93 |
pābongtīṁka thanaru kṣīra khāilā yetebeḷe kumaramaṇi
ki karibi ẏebe tumbhe mote āgyāṁ dia
keuṁṭhāre rahibi muhiṁ mote ẏebe kaha | 96 |
hemabanta nandinī boile śuṇa re kumara
nicinta hoiṇa tuhi ẏehi dvāra rakhithibu
puruṣa nāmāẏe kāhāriku bhitaraku pūrāi na debu | 8 |
ẏete kahiṇa debī ye bhitaraku gale
koṭhāra se dhariṇa achanti dakṣina karare | 101 |
dekhile se dvāre basiacchi ẏekai nandana | 103 |
īśvara boile dvāra chāḍasi re bāḷa
bhitaraku yibu āmbhe na thilu bahuta ye kāḷa | 104 |
īśvara kahanteṇ akumara tiḷe na ghenilā
biśvanātha debantaku se dvāra na chāḍilā | 105 |
muṇḍa cchiṇḍiyāi tāra paḍila ka khaṇḍe dūre
kumarara muṇḍa ye tahiṁ cchiḍi pāḍithilā
ẏethu anantare kathā śuṇa asura nr̥parāṇa | 110 |
ẏete boli debī hele tahuṁ manare uṣata | 112 |
ẏe koṭhāre rakata kimpe lāgicchi gosāiṁ | 114 |
boile śuṇa tu āgo prāṇara saghāṁta | 115 |
āmbha āsanteṇa tahuṁ chāḍiṇa na dilā | 116 |
beka cchiḍi muṇḍa tāra yāiṁ paḍilā bhūmira | 117 |
teṇu kari rakata ye lāgicchi koṭhāre
kumarara hata śuṇi ye debī mahāmāẏī
ẏe kisa carita go kahani āmbhara chāmura | 120 |
se tumbhara kumara ẏebe śuṇa śūḷadhārī | 121 |
īśvare boile sehu kemante āmbhara kumara
sābadhāne śuṇa deba ẏethira ye rīti | 123 |
yeṇu thila tumbhe prabhma haṭakea pure | 124 |
ẏehā mnne bhābi deba hele thambhībhuta | 127 |
ẏemantara samaẏe pābongtī tahiṁ miḷileka yāiṁ
dekhi kari debī ye bikaḷe kāndai | 130 |

div.note: śuṇiṇa bisaẏe ye hoile biśvanātha | (ja, cha, ṇa, da, kha)

lg.l: boile ho biśvanātha ẏeḍe kr̥tya kala
ẏehāra parā putra śira chedi pakāila | 131 |
muṇḍa bhakṣiṇ ye tahuṁ asura paḷāilā
se gajarāja nāma ye aṭai maṇibhadra
tāhāra muṇḍa hāṇi āṇile deba rudra | 133 |
duti īśvara pada tote dilu re bāḷute
śubhe aśubhe āge pūjā karantu nare tote | 138 |
tinire jiṇantā tote kehu nohu re kumara
ẏete boli amr̥ta laḍu dileka īśvara | 139 |
teṇu kari gaṇeśvara nāma se pāile | 142 |
moḍhāsura śuṇi tāhā ati santoṣa hoilā | 143 |
kurupāḷa mantrīki bahuta praśaṁsā ye kala
khaṇḍe dhūru dekhiṇa ye karai namaskāra
mane mane aneka stuti ye bakhāṇilā | 146 |
boile tu ho bara māga proḍhāsura suta | 147 |
svarga mañcha pātāḷa ye aṭai tinipura
dega dānabe mote kehi jiṇantā nohiba
kāhāra hāthare mora śiracheda ye nohiba
ẏemanta kari bara mote amr̥tādhi deba | 151 |
svarga mañcha pātāḷe kāreṇī hoili tinipura | 154 |
janama hoile abaśya mr̥tu ye hoai | 155 |
bhala kathāẏe pachārilu bolina uṣata hoile | 157 |
boile śuṇa tu ho asura kuḷapati | 158 |
yāhā pachārilu kahibā āmbhe tāhāra bichāra
yemante maribu tuhi āmbhe tote tāhā kahithibā
tadanta kari manare thoithibu āre bābā | 160 |
hāṇuthile lāguthiba ye śira puṇa puṇa | 161 |
hātha goḍa śira tora khaḍagare na cchiḍiba
buku hr̥daẏare tora śahasra na phuṭib | 162 |
agniśara peṣi tote yehu kariba dahana | 163 |
dr̥ḍha kari śuṇa tu ho asurakuḷa rāẏe | 164 |
tebe se maraṇa tora hoiba bīramaṇi | 166 |
svarga mañcha pātāḷe kāhāku na ḍarai | 168 |
gaṇanāthaṁku se nitye darśana kare yāi
gaṇanātha binu se na jāṇe anye debā | 172 |

div.head: {@mr̥ḍhāsurara svarga ātramaṇa@}

lg.l: ẏethu anantare ye bilaṁka deśa rāẏe
kisa carita helā kaha kumbharuṣira tanaẏe | 1 |
svarga mañcha pātāḷare se bīa kāhāku na ḍarilā | 2 |
bāṇijya nāme karaṇa sadhya nāme yoga
āstāne basi moḍhāsur apratagyāṁ kare bega | 4 |
svarga marttya pātāḷe mora kāhāku bhaẏa nāhiṁ | 6 |
asura moḍhāsura yahūm ẏemanta āgyāṁ dilā
se nagrare biṁśalakṣa ghara ye basanti | 10 |
thāṭha sanyamāna tāra na yāi kaḷanā
rathī pādānti māne tāra achanti apāra
ḍhola damā ṭamaka ye ghumurā bājai
boilāka śuṇa tu ho asurakuḷa sāiṁ
thāṭhaku āgyāṁ diel yibe bega hoi | 18 |
mantrīki boilā kete saina sājilu mohora
hāthī rathī aśva kete hoile bāhāra | 19 |
āgyā dile saina āge yibe sajahoi | 21 |
pralaẏa pāṇi prāẏe diśai saina āsibāra
bhaẏeṇa bāsuki ye na ṭekai śira | 25 |
āga hoiṇa mantrī thāṭha ye caḷāiṇa galā
gaṇa gandhabong debatā se kāhāku na ḍarai | 32 |
dhīra dhira kariṇa sehu caḷāilā thāṭha
sabha maṇḍāiṇa tahiṁ ye basicchi suranātha
mukharu rudhira ye bahai jhara jhara
tumbhara pr̥thibī tumbhe samhbāḷa ho bajrasāiṁ | 49 |
ẏeteka bikaḷa kimpāiṁ heucchi tora mati | 52 |
basumatī kahai ye tumbhe śuṇa kuśadhara
asuraṁka bhāra na sahilā mohora śarīra | 53 |
tā pāda paḍante mukharuṁ rudhira gaḷucchi | 54 |
kaha he guru ẏe kāhiṁra asura
kāha kuḷe jāta ẏe kāhara kumara | 56 |
se proḍhāsura beḷe svargaku dhāḍi dilā
amara maṇḍaḷe se aneka yuddha kalā | 60 |
deba dānabare se na pāiba apayaśa | 65 |
indra bole tāhā tule yuddha karibaiṁ
ye yāhāra mate sehu maune rahile | 68 |
haṁsa caḍhi amaruṁ ye hoile bāhāra | 71 |
debasabhāre debatānta gheni indra hāde basithile | 73 |
thāṭha saina tāra kaḷanā na yāi
svargapura yāka āja sabu jūra karideba | 77 |
mane mane cintā bada kale bajrapāṇi | 79 |
br̥haspati boile tāhāra bhaẏe rahi nuāribā
svargapura chāḍi ẏebe chāla paḷāiṇa yibā | 80 |
ẏehā śuṇi debe tahiṁ bhaẏa mane kale
trame trame hoi ye yāhāre paḷāle | 83 |
ye yahim parile se tahiṁ lucile
śacī gheni yāiṁ kusuma banare lucai
amara maṇḍaḷ atucchā kari gale śacisāiṁ | 85 |
gopyāna hoiṇa sabonge rahile ye yāhāre
amara maṇḍaḷe debe na rahile kehi | 87 |
dekhilā svargapure jana manuṣya kehi nāhiṁ
bīratūra bajāi asura amara maṇḍaḷe bulai | 89 |
prāṇa pāāntā ki āja paḍile bajradhara | 90 |
amara sabhāre basi asura aneka pahijya kalā
thṭa leuṭāi chāla rājkyaku āmbhe yibā | 94 |
bhala bhala drabya svarge pāilāka yāhā
śāḍhī prasāde ye bahuta tāku dilā | 99 |
śāḍhī prasāda pāi sehu udeka bhakṣai
bahuta tusti kariṇa se bāhuḍi āsai | 102 |

div.head: {@mūḍhāsurara ekoiśabara svarga ātramaṇa o bināśa@}

lg.l: debatāẏe kisa kale mote kahibā bujhāi | 2 |
trame trame hoi āsiṇa ye samaste miḷile | 5 |
amara maṇḍaḷuṁ indra paḷāi ye thile
śacīṁku gheni kusuma banaru bāhāra hoile | 6 |
bhala bhala padārtha sabu asura jūrakari nelā
indra debatā dekhi bahuta cintā kala | 10 |
amara debatāẏe ye rahile nicinta hoi | 12 |
āja yāi bnddha ye āṇibi ākhaṇḍaḷa | 15 |
mantrī boilā ẏebe thokāẏe dina yāu
pāsorāi dei svargaku yibā asurakuḷa rāhu | 16 |
amara maṇḍaḷaku se ye bāhara nohilā | 17 |
mr̥gaẏā binode ye se yāuthāi niti
tāhāra bhaẏe debe svarge nuāranti rahi
asura asuacchi śuṇile debe yāānti paḷāi | 21 |
na puṇa svargaku bāhai asura mahabaḷī | 22 |
namaste durgā mā go saṁkaṭa tāriṇī
mahiṣāsura marddinī mā go nāma to cahaṭi
siṁghabāhinī tu bhramu svarga mañcha pātāḷa tnigoṭi | 24 |
kāti khapara māgo śohai tora kara
muhiṁ ye arakṣit aadharma aṭai mūrkhabāi | 26 |
tu mohora kaṇṭhe basi ẏehā dia kahi | 27 |
tohora āgyāṁre pada heucchi mote dr̥śya
janme janme śrī saroḷā caṇḍīra mum dāsa | 28 |
ẏethu anantare ye bilaṁka deśara rājana
agastiṁki pachāranti śuṇa ho kumbharuṣira nandana | 29 |
kisa kr̥tya kalā se tahuṁ moḍhāsura
br̥haspatiṁki gheni deba indra ye bhāḷile | 33 |
nityeheṁ asura bhaẏa hoilā amara bhmabana | 34 |
indra boile deba śuṇa sabitrī debīra sāiṁ
asura bhaẏe āmbhe nuāru svarge rahi | 38 |
ye yahim parile se debatāẏe lucile
bhala bhala padārthamāna nele se jūra kari
asura kemanta mariba ẏehā bichāra na karu | 44 |
br̥haspati boile tāra upadarpa kaḷa hoiacchi
indra bedabara tāṁku kahanti puṇi puṇi | 47 |
sebāre manāi se amara bara māgilā | 51 |
prasanna hoiṇa gaṇanātha tāhāku bara dile
kāhāra hāthare tu ye nohibu maraṇa
suragaṇa debatāẏe hāribe tohore kale raṇa | 53 |
muṇḍa kāṭile tu na maribu puṇi | 54 |
amara kariṇa ta tumbhe rakhila mora kāẏe
bhagatibhāba dekhi tote delaiṁ ye bara | 60 |
maraṇa carita ye tuhi pachārilu mote
maraṇa carita tuhi śuṇithāa dei hetumati | 62 |
ẏehi kathā asr̥a hetu kala mane
br̥haspati kahile acchi tahiṁra ye kathā
toho rājye hoilā ye anyāẏe bichāra | 72 |
ruṣi mr̥guṇī duheṁ ye paḍileka ḍhaḷi | 74 |
akāḷa kaṇḍa paḍu to ratiraṅga kāḷe | 75 |

div.note: “tahiṁra rājā ye paṇḍu nr̥pabare” pada pare ‘bahu pothire’<lb/>adhika pāṭha |
sehi rājā dine puṇi mr̥gaẏā yāithilā
ruṣi boile tu mote māilu ye śara
ratiraṅga kāḷe akāḷakāṇḍa paḍu to aṅgara |
sehidinuṁ rati śraddhā na karai paṇḍu nr̥paśiṣi |
māḷā goṭiẏe yācidile ruṣi kointā debīṁki |

lg.l: sehidinu rati śraddhā na karai paṇḍu nr̥paśiṣi | 76 |
ẏe māḷā gheni japile āsibe tora pāśe | 79 |
sehi māḷā gheni baḷakāḷe sūryyaṁku sumarilā
māṭira mañjuṣā goṭiẏe kointā tahiṁ kalā
se putra tahiṁ nei bhitare pūroilā | 84 |
jaḷare meli dilāka se mañjuṣa goṭi nei
śambara rājā rājyare se lāgilāka yāiṁ | 85 |
rādheba tāku nei pāḷilā yatna kari
ẏebe ẏeṇiki tu ho śuṇa svargara daṇḍadhārī | 86 |
puṇi paṇḍu rājāṁku se hoilāka bibhā | 87 |

div.note: boile stirīiccchā karanti sundara puruṣa | (cha, ṇa)

lg.l: sehidinu pāṇḍu āu na kale ratirasa
tāhā jāṇi kontī debī hoile birasa | 89 |
dharmaṁkara nāma dhari kuntī ye japile
yujheṣṭhi boli kari nāma tāṁkar ahoilā | 91 |
bhīma boli tāhāra nāma ye hoilā | 93 |
puṇa surarāṇa tote sumarile kontī debī
arja na boli nāma tāāra ye helā | 95 |
nakuḷa boli kari nāma tāhāra ye dile
brahma ruṣiṁka śāpa kebe anyastā nohilā
daibara akaḷa kāṇḍa ye rati beḷare padilā | 100 |
akāḷa kāṇḍa paḍante duheṁ nāśa gale

div.note: rusiṁkara śāpe paṇḍu rati na kaleka jāṇi |
puṇi māḷā gheniṇa japante aile dharma nr̥pamaṇi | (ja, ṇa, cha)

lg.l: dekhi kointā debī putraku koḷe dhari
tāhāra hāthare asura mariba ho kaśyapara baḷā | 104 |
ẏethu anantare tumbhe śuṇa dibyarasa bāṇī
deba br̥haspati nija pure bije kale | 109 |
śrī mahābhāratha śuṇi kara pāpa kṣaẏe | 111 |
śrī raṅgā adhare ye manda hasa hasi
karuṇā jaladhi nātha tumbha nāma kr̥pasindhu
kisa kr̥tya kalā sehu pāmara asura | 119 |
pāpa kṣaẏa karibi muṁ taba mukhuṁ śiṇi | 120 |
makara saṁkarānti dina bāhuḍilā gheniṇa asura sanya | 121 |
mantrīra bola se asura na pakāilā taḷe
indra debatā ye mohore jaẏe nihilā
tohora parā mantrī thāuṁ mote kathā bhala ta na diśilā | 124 |

div.note: “nirantare bhābai śrīraṅgā caraṇa” pādānta pare<lb/>‘cha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha–
durgati tāriṇī tu aṭu go sabonggyāṁ |
drahasite bhabile go bege pāri karu |
deu dhana dhānya māgo acaḷa sampatti

lg.l: indraku na jiṇile muṁ na āsai ghara | 125 |
sābadhāna hoi śuṇa tumbhe asurakuḷa sāiṁ | 126 |
āpaṇe ratha caḍhi nagr̥ṁ hoilā bāhāra | 131 |
moḍhāsura boilā muṁhi kṣaṇe na rahai
bīratūra bajāiṇa se saina sākhā gheni
se dina śrabaṇā nakṣatra makare candra rahi
dhr̥ti nāme yoge tatulya karaṇa hoi | 137 |
na puṇa asura mote rasāntaḷe pakara | 141 |
ẏete boli debī ye na ṭekai śira
amr̥ta ācchāna śuṇi pāpa kara kṣaẏe | 143 |
ketedūre asura hoilāni dekha brahmāṁka nandana | 145 |
tāṇḍaba nr̥tya kari se yauchanti hasi | 147 |
ẏehāra nāma kisa bola he biśeṣi | 149 |
tāhāra kalyāṇe āṣya hoiba tu mbhara cira | 150 |
kalyāṇa bāñcchā yahuṁ kale nārada mahāruṣi
nārade boile tu āmbhanta na jāṇu ho rāẏe
muniṁka hātha dhari asura rathaku ghenigalā
nārade boile tu thāṭha saina caḷāi
thāṭha saina gheni svargaku yāucchi munibara | 159 |
tuhi ye āmbhara puṇa aṭu hitakārī
gupata kari tote kahibā kathā chāri | 163 |
nārade boile ẏebe yāu thokāẏe dina
dinā kete tote svarge jaẏe nāhiṁ
nāradaṁka bacane asura śyānti ye hoilā
cñchaḷa prakr̥ti āmbhe ṭhāẏe hoi na rahuṁ
nirantare āmbhe ye sapata brahmāṇḍa buluthāuṁ | 173 |
ẏete kahi muni ye hoile bāhāra
bahuta prakāre āmbhe kalu ye kalyāṇa | 180 |
ẏekṣaṇi svargaku tu na kara gabana | 182 |
riṣṭa ariṣṭa ye achai tora kāẏe
ẏebeḷe gale tote nāhiṁ svarge jaẏe | 183 |
thokāẏeka kāḷa tuhi ẏebe thāasi paṭhāri
ẏethu uttāre asura kala kisa rīti
ẏehā mote bujhāiṇa kaha ghaṭarusira santati | 190 |
agasti boile tumbhe śuṇa ho maharāẏe
ẏekamane śuna tu ho kahibā kathāẏe | 191 |
mantrīki saṅge gheni kapiḷāsa pabongte galā
kaha ho kurupāḷa mantrī ẏethira carita | 204 |
gaṇa gandhabong bidyādhara ye pakāibā māri | 207 |
bibidha padārthamāna āmbhe jūra kari āṇibā
ye mukhe paḍiba puṇa tāhāku māriba | 208 |
se mantrīki śāḍhī āẏe aḷamkāra dilā
śabada śuṇi saine ye hoile bāhāra
boile svargaku āja bije kariba asura | 213 |
pādānti pāñchalakṣa aśva caḍhi hele āgusāra | 216 |
kaḍā ghumurā ye bājai ghana ghana | 218 |
anakūḷa gheni nabaru bāhāra se hoi | 224 |
khaḍaga kare dhari jhamakāẏe asurara bacchi | 225 |
pūbongāṣāḍhā nakṣatra dhanu candra se dinara | 226 |
tāhāṁkara pache pache gale rathī hāthī
pache pacchiāṇi daṇḍa majhire rājā acchi
megha uhāḍila prāẏe diśanti rabi śaśī | 233 |

div.note: sehidina asuraku hoicchi sampada tāra | (ṇa, ja)

lg.l: sanya gheni asura gamai dhīre dhīre
debagaṇa gheni adhāsvarge śatra chanti rahi | 237 |
māra māra dhara dhara śabada śubhilā
indra āgyā ṁdile putramānanta ye chāhiṁ
ẏemanta samara tahiṁ hoilā ghaḍiẏe nirāpakṣa
beḷuṁ beḷa samara tahuṁ hoilā agocara
teṇe asura saina svarge karuchanti jūra | 258 |
ye yāha pāile tahiṁ drabyanta āṇile
bicitra bindhāṇa ye jāṇanti dui kṣatrī
gaṇapatiṁka bare asure kāhāku na ḍaranti | 264 |
beḷuṁ beḷa asura tahiṁ mahākopa kalā
bāma hāthare ye bāḷa yāiṁ dharai | 266 |
boilā āja kāhīṁyibu re indrara tanaẏi | 267 |
tāhā dekhi kopakalā citra sena bīra | 270 |

div.note: “gaṇapatiṁka bare asure kāhāku na ḍaranti” pare ‘kha’ potire pāṭha :–
ghāẏe asāṣṭama helā indra rājā baccchi
ṭamaka niśāṇa śuṇi samara chāḍilā | (ṇa, ja, da, ṭha)

lg.l: raṇe jaẏa hoilā boli ye manare bichārilā | 276 |
thāṭha caḷāiṇa ye caḷai dhīra dhīra
aṅgārapannaṅgakaiṁ dhari nelā asura ẏebe kisa ye bichāru | 280 |
ẏetekāḷa yāẏe parabhaba pāi na thilā niśācara | 283 |
boile nāradanta tu ye gheniāsa yāi
indra āgyāṁ dile āpaṇa yiba ẏehikṣaṇa | 287 |
tumbhe yāiṁṇa tāhānta ye chaḍāi gheniāsa
tebe se mohora piṇḍare paśiba sāhāsa | 290 |
kalyāṇaa bāñcchā puṇi tāku kale munimaṇi
muni boile bābu svargare kalu yāhā
indra debatā mr̥tu mora hāthe acchi munibaḷā | 295 |
satya bacanare ye āmbhanta tāhā debu | 296 |
satya karithāa ye āmbha bacana na karibu nāhiṁ
āmbha deha chuiṁ kaha asurakuḷa sāiṁ | 297 |
boilā gosāiṁ ki ki māgiba māga

div.note: “nārade boile aṅgārapannaṅgaku mote deba”<lb/>pādāntapare ‘ṭha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha :–
ẏe tora pita bairi nohai re bābu |
ẏehāku māile tora heba keuṁ yaśa |
āmbha bole chāḍidia yāu nija deśa |

lg.l: ẏehābhābi rathūṁ phiṭāi dilā indraṁka kumara | 301 |
boilā āja ẏehāra prāṇa rakhila gosāiṁ | 302 |
ārogya kalyāṇa tu hua asurkuḷa sāiṁ | 303 |
śuṇa ho bilaṁka rāẏe badanti agasti
thāṭha caḷāiṇa puṇa asura bīra galā
ẏebe kisa upāẏa karibā kaha mote
mantrī boilā ẏebe yāu dinā kete | 310 |
ẏethu anantare śuṇa bilaṁka deśa rāẏe
bahuta trodha kari kahilā aṅgārapannaṅga kumāra | 314 |
ẏete kahi kumāra tahiṁ mahātrodha kale
ẏethakaiṁ cntā tuhi na kara śatrabāḷe | 317 |
br̥haspati boile tumbhe paṭhāra ho kāḷa
samasta debatāẏe gale ye yāha puraku | 320 |
indra debatā āstāna kari na basilā | 321 |
ẏethi uttāre asure kebaṇa kr̥tya kale | 322 |
kemanta prakāre tāku māile nakuḷa kumāra | 323 |
indra debatā mote jaẏa ta nuhilā
pitr̥kāryya mora kicchi ta ne hilā | 327 |
pitāra ruṇa na śujhai yebaṇahiṁ putra
putra hoi muṁ ta na kali kicchi kāryya
asura kahilā tu ho śuṇa mantrībara
biḷamba na kara chāla yibā svargapura | 332 |
aśva pāika lokagahaḷa kaḷaṇā na yāiṁ | 334 |
ṭamaka śabada śuṇi loke hoile bāhāra
kurupāḷa mantrīki gheni rājā digabije kalā
chāla chāla dhāaṁ dhāaṁ āsa āsa śabada śubhai
330 indra debatāku kari nuārili nāśa<lb/>tāku na māile mora nāhiṁ pauraṣa | (kha)
dhāmanti asura baḷa pabana gati jāṇi
gabana karai sehu hoiṇa dhīra dhīra | 340 |
debe na jāṇanti asure asuchanti bāhi | 342 |
deba dagara jaṇāilā tumbhe śuṇa ho suraraṇa
māra māra śabada ye mukhara cahaḷa | 345 |
ye yahiṁki pārilā yāiṁ tahiṁ se lucile | 346 |
raṇa bhaṇa hoilā ye amara maṇḍaḷa | 349 |
bhala bhala padārthamāna asure jūra kale
ẏehāre se surarājā indra paṇa karai | 355 |
ẏete boli asura ye dhasāi paśilā
hā hā daiba boli bikaḷe robile | 359 |
amara jaẏe kari asura hoilā bāhāra
kāli prabhāte indraku dhari karibi bandhana | 361 |
boilā go indrāẏeṇī śuṇa mora bāṇī
ājadina ṭhāru tu mora hoibu gharaṇī | 363 |
indrarājānta muṁ kāli karibaiṁ praṇe nāśa
gaṇa gandhabong apakṣarī khaṭibe mora pāśa | 366 |
surapati paṇe muṁ sudharmā sabhāre basibi | 367 |
mantrī kahilā muṁ ki kahibi tote
asura boilā ye śacīṁkara mukha chāhiṁ
amara maṇḍaḷe mote rājā kara nei | 370 |
śacī boile tuho na pachāra mote
baḷe kimpe mote gheni ailu biarthe | 371 |
tebe se bhāriyā muhiṁ hoibi tohora | 373 |
tote gheni amara maṇḍaḷe abiṣeka hoibi
ẏethaku kicchi cintā nā kara boile śacīdebī | 374 |
brata kariacchi muhiṁ ẏekoiśa dina yāẏe | 376 |
kāhāri mukhaku puṇa na chāhiṁbi muhiṁ
mantrī boilā ẏekānta nabare bege kara
dekhiṇa indra rājara na phurai kicchi | 384 |
sehi ẏeḍe karma ye svargare na kalā | 385 |
se ẏete kr̥tya na kalā amara maṇḍaḷara | 386 |
keḍe keḍe asure pr̥thīre na thileki
boile sabu nāśakalā se chāṇḍāḷa drapiṣṭha | 389 |
tatakṣaṇa mātaḷi ye bahana hoi gale | 392 |
khaṇḍe dūruṁ dekhi mātaḷi pāẏe paḍi śoilā
indra āgyāṁ dile tumbhe yiba dhātikāra | 396 |
deba bhaṇḍāra yāka sabu jūra kari nelā | 397 |
haṁsa piṭhire yāiṁ se basile āpaṇa | 399 |
indra āgyāṁ dile tumbhe āsa he sabhāku | 402 |
aśvinī kumāre ye aṣṭabasu tahiṁ miḷile | 406 |
gaṇa gandhabong debatāẏe ye yahiṁre thile
ye yāhāra mate āsi sabhāre miḷile | 408 |
mukharu rudhira ye bahai jhara jhara
indr aboile ye brahmāṁka mukha chāhiṁ
ki buddhi karibā kaha sābitrī debīṁka sāiṁ | 414 |
amara bhaṇḍāra jūra kari śacīṁki ghenigalā | 415 |
kāhāri hāthare na marai moḍhāsura asura | 419 |
aśvinī kumāra bīryye jāta hoicchi nakuḷa
tahiṁka bichāri tumbhe kaha he gurudeba | 422 |
ẏehā śuṇi indra ye bacana prakāśile
mātaḷi yāu boli śrīmukhe āgyā dile | 424 |
tebe se mariba drapiṣṭha pāmara asura | 428 |
chāridebaṁka tahūṁ mātaḷi ẏemanta āgyāṁ pāi
yujheṣṭhi pachāranta nakuḷa kimarthe yiba svargapura
indra āgyāṁ yebe yāu arjuna kumāra | 435 |
gaṇanāthaṁka bare se kāhākaiṁ na ḍarai
svarga mañcha pātāḷe se nirate bhramai | 441 |
gaṇa gandhabong debatā kāhākaiṁ na ḍarai
svargare paśi debatāṁka saṅge se yujhai | 442 |
lo dibasa kāli ye svargaku āsithilā
sabhā maṇḍāi indra āstāna kariṇa basile
kāhāra hāthare se mariba pāmara asura
ẏe kathā bichāri kaha boile bedabara | 445 |
br̥haspati boile se kāhāri hāthe na marai
paṇḍu dulāḷ nakuḷa hāthare mr̥tu tā achai | 446 |
brahmā br̥haspati imdra rudra thāiṇa āgyāṁ dile

lg.note: “svargare paśi debatāṁka saṅge se yujhai” pare ‘kha’ pothire<lb/>bhinna pāṭha :–
puṇi kāli svargaku ye bāhilā asura

lg.l: arjuna boile yebe surapati āgyāṁ deichanti
nakuḷa na gale kopa karibe surapati | 451 |
sahadebanta pachāra nakuḷa hāthe asura mariba ki nahiṁ | 452 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tu kaha he mantrībara
nakuḷa hāthe mariba ki moḍhāsura asura | 454 |
nakuḷa ṭhākuraṁka hāthe asura mariba gosāiṁ | 455 |
ẏehā śuṇi yujheṣṭhi deba ānanda hoile
yāa ho nakuḷa boli yujheṣṭhi āgyāṁ dile | 456 |
dhanu kamāṇa gheni bīra bāhara huai | 457 |
adhā svarge yāiṁṇa se hoile parabeśa
asuraku na mārile muṁ na yāi svargapura
daitaku māri muṁ draśana karibi ākhaṇḍaḷa | 464 |
ẏethu anantare tahuṁ bilaṁka deśa rāẏe
boilā parama bhāgya hoilā āja mora
kalyāṇa kariṇa muni kahanti tahiṁ hasi | 474 |
teṇu kari saṅkhoḷi tote ailu asura kuḷasāiṁ | 475 |
ẏebe gupata kathāẏe kahuṁ tohor āgare
tāhā śuṇi asura ye garjiṇa uṭhilā
nārada muniṁki se bahuta paraśṁsā kalā | 479 |
kebeheṁ śatr̥ku ye na ḍarai hāde | 480 |
kāhiṁ achai dekhāa se paṇḍura nandana | 482 |
boilā sajahoiṇa bege āsa sabong saina

lg.note: tāhā śuṇi asur abahuta pratagyāṁ ye kalā | (cha)

lg.l: nānā barṇṇa śahasra ye rathare thoilā | 492 |
nārade boile āmbhe na yibu kemante
māra māra dhara dhara ye śabada śubhai
nāradaṁka mukhu se samasta bāratā śuṇilā | 501 |
asura nibāraṇe tumbhe nānā rūpa dhara | 503 |
daita nibāraṇe tumbhe tumbha nāma daitāri
āmbhe paṇḍura putre ye tumbhara koẏara
tahuṁ aṅge baḷa tāra bahuta hoilā | 509 |
nakuḷaku beḍhile ye asura saina baḷa | 511 |
asuraṁka uparaku mo ratha dia camakāi | 512 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ asure ye ma ranti śasramāna
nakuḷa śasra māri tāhā karai chedana | 513 |
ẏeka na paḍuṇu āreka śahasra āsiṇa paḍaiṁ
kaḷi kutūhe ḷa ye dekhi na rada munibara
bīṇābādya bajāi se nācanti dhīra dhīra | 515 |
kaḷi dhokaḍi muṇiru dhūḷi muṭhāẏe kāḍhile
hāthī rathī pādānti ye nakuḷaku beḍhichanti
aṅge na bājuṇu tāhā nakuḷa nibārai
asuraṁka śasra tāra aṅge na bājai | 519 |
beḷu beḷa samara ye hoilā apāra
droṇa guruṁku sumari nārāja peṣi dilā | 521 |
māhunta sahite yahuṁ hoile sabong kṣaẏe
jhara jhara hoiṇa ye bahai rudhira | 525 |
mantra sumari nārāja chāḍi dilā bege
benikhaṇḍa hoi asure paḍile bhumi bhāge | 527 |
asura maḍā bhumire paḍi yāuchanti gaḍi | 528 |
aṅgare na bāju nakuḷa chedai tāhā dūra | 530 |
nakuḷa upare neiṇa se piṭanti gadā konta | 531 |
muṇḍā br̥kṣa hoiṇa ye asure paḍile
nakuḷa hāthare ye aneka saina malā
pacana bahile yehne kadaḷī bana bhāṁjai
tesaneka parakāre asura saina mahīre loṭai | 536 |
nakuḷa chāmuku ratha mora dia bege bāhi | 538 |
saina māru maru dibaseka rātreka bahigalā
rātra dibase asura saina nakuḷa nibārilā
dhanya re pāntabā tote kehi nāhīṁ pr̥thīre samāne | 541 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ kurupāḷa mantrī ratha bāhinelā
boilā ẏehi tora aṭai śatr̥ dekha
ẏehāku māri sainaṁka dukha ye upekha | 543 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ asura ye mahākopa kalā
nakuḷaku chāhiṁṇa ye aneka pahija kalā | 544 |
ẏeke na rāja bindhabinddha honti mahātīcha | 545 |
kopeṇa nakuḷa bindhai dui sahasra śara | 548 |
asura aṅgare paḍi agni jaḷiṇa uṭhilā
yāuṁ yāuṁ nakuḷa tāhā hūruṁ nibārii | 552 |
duhiṁkara teje ye agni jaḷi uṭhi | 553 |
śahasraṁka teje ye āditya na diśai

lg.note: nakuḷaku chāhiṁṇa aneka gāḷi dila | (kha, cha, ja)
lg.l: bijuḷira jhaṭaka prāẏe śahasre gagane diśanti
ẏekara bindhante ye tāhā āreka nibārai
kāhāri śahasra kāhāri aṅgare na bājai | 557 |
beḷa pahaḍaka ṭhāru sāṁgrāma ghora kale
rātra tini pahaḍa sariki kehi na ghuñchile | 559 |
kāṇḍa ghāāre rudhira aṅgaru jhara jhara bahai | 560 |
nakuḷa yete śasra mantri kopeṇa binddhalā
sāṁgrāma karu karuṁ aruṇa udaẏa hoẏe | 562 |
puṇi yāiṁ muṇḍa tāra bekare lāgilā
sābadhāna hoiṇa ye bindhu kinā mote
guru śasra tote deichanti puṇi yete | 567 |
cchida kari yahuṁ se asura boilā
puṇi yāi śira tāra lāgila pālaṭi | 570 |
tuhi se pr̥thīki sinā hoilu achārgaḷa | 572 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ nārāja paḍilā tāra aṅge yāi
bukure bāji śahasra bhūmire leuṭi paḍai | 573 |
boilā ki buddhi karibā kaha he mātaḷi
binddhale śahasra ye na kāṭai tāhāra mauḷi | 575 |
kemante mariba asura mātaḷi kaha ho bichāra | 577 |
mātaḷi boilā śuṇa ye sābadhāna hoi
yemante mariba asura sekathā muhi temanta kahai | 578 |
boilā amara ye hoiba mora kāẏe
astu hou boliṇa ye boile gaṇapati
ābara bareka māgilā asura kuḷa chatrī | 581 |
ẏemanta bara debā mote pābongtīra śiṣa | 582 |
kalyāṇa kariṇa boile tote ẏe bara cira heu
amara hoiṇa ye kāẏeāgoṭi tora thāu | 583 |
asura boilā muṁ maribi kāhā hāthe
bichāriṇa mote kahibā ho gaṇa nāthe | 584 |
gaṇapati boile muṇḍa kāṭile na maribu
agni śara gheniṇa ye tohore māriba
ẏemanta prakāreṇa tuhi nohibu prāṇe hata
aśvinī kumāraṁka bīryye yehu hoithiba jāta | 587 |
sehi yebe agni śara kari tora aṅgaku binddhaba
mantrī mukhaku chāhiṁṇa ye bolai asura | 591 |
ẏehikṣaṇi aṅga ta deba mora jāḷi | 592 |
guru droṇa sumari ye nakuḷa nārāja binddhalā
bāṇa paḍanteṇa ye agni jaḷiṇa uṭhilā
asura kāẏā goṭika ye dahana hoilā | 595 |
kurupāḷa mantrī ye asura saṅgatare thilā
aśva ratha sahiteṇa yahūṁ hoilā bhasmarāśi
śūnye thāiṁ nr̥tya karanti nārada mahāruṣi | 597 |
tekhiṇa mātaḷi ye aneka toṣa hoẏe

lg.head: {@nakuḷa śire pāṭabandhana@}
lg.l: śuṇa ho bilaṁka rāẏe badanti agasti
ẏe samaẏe yāiṁṇa miḷile nārada tapobanta | 3 |
kisa carita kariaila kaha ho muniẏe | 4 |
ẏemanta samaẏe br̥haspatiṁku sehu hakarāi āṇile | 10 |
tetiśa koṭi debatā ye yāhāre aile
ye yāhāra mate ye sabhāre basile
asura malāṇita āu svargapure bhaẏe nāhiṁ | 15 |
bho deba pitā maha śuṇa mo uttara
dhanyare nakuḷa boli praśaṁsā se kale | 18 |
br̥haspati boile ho tumbhe śuṇa surarāṇa
indra boile surasena gandhabonghiṁ begahoi yāu
āmbhara āgyāṁ boli se nakuḷaku kahu | 20 |
nakuḷa kumāra chāmure yāiṁṇa prabeśa hoilā | 21 |
boilā bāsabaṁkara āgyāṁ prabeśa hoiacchi tumbhanta
boile yibā ẏebe chāla asurara pura
śacī ṭhākurāṇī bandī ye achanti tahiṁra | 24 |
rathare basi nakuḷa surasena mātaḷi caḷigale
ẏemantara samaẏe tiniheṁ yāiṁ prabeśa hoile
pāẏe paḍi śutile śire kara dei
āsa āsa mātā go mora rathare bijekara
tumbhara na thile svarga śobhā na pāi gosāmaṇī | 34 |
apakṣarī kinnarī gheni śacī rathare bijekale | 35 |
dhīra dhīra hoiṇa ratha yāuacchi caḷi | 36 |
apakṣarī bidyādharī kahṭile ye yāhā sebā gheni | 38 |
sudharmā sabhāra taḷe sehu yāiṇa miḷilā | 39 |
indra boile uṭha ho paṇḍura tanaẏa
karapatra yoḍi nakuḷa sabhātaḷe ubhāhoi rahilā | 42 |
indra āgyāṁ dile nakuḷaku uparaku gheniāsa
dhanyare nakuḷa tumbeh paṇḍu rājāra śiṣa | 43 |
dhāiṁ yāiṁ aśvinī kumāre putraku koḷakale | 44 |
brahmā rudra br̥haspati ye kalyāṇa bāñccha{??}le
amare maṇḍaḷe adhikārī huasi boliṇ boile | 46 |
ye yāhāra mate nakuḷaku kalyāṇa bāñchākale | 47 |
ẏe amara maṇḍaḷa tohora arjilā sinā sabu | 49 |
purandara rāẏe nakuḷaku bahu puruṣārtha kale
āpaṇā aṅgare aḷaṁkāra yete thilā nakuḷa aṅgare lāile | 50 |
amara sabhāre abiṣeka karānti nakuḷa kumāra | 52 |
amara maṇḍaḷe pāṭa tote ho ājhuṁ hoilā boile | 55 |
gaṇa gandhabong debatāẏe kalyāṇa kale puṇa | 56 |
ājyuṁ amare pāṭa tote hoilā re nakuḷa kumāra | 57 |
aśvinī kumāre bahuta kalyāṇa kale tahiṁ | 59 |
haṁsa caḍhi brahmā nija puraku caḷigale | 61 |
gaṇa gandhabong debatāẏe gale ye yāhāra pura | 62 |
śacī mathāpoti kathā na kahile maghabāṁku | 64 |
lg.note: nārade bīṇābāi kalyaṇa dhuna kale<lb/>aśvinī kumāre bahuta kalyāṇa bāñchile | (cha)
lg.l: indra boile kopa na kara mahāmāẏī
ẏehimati svargaku kete apacaẏa na paḍai | 65 |
yibi boli kumara ye udabega hoilā | 67 |
yibi hastinā āgyāṁ dia he maghabāna | 68 |
nakuḷa bacana śuṇi maghabāna hasiṇa boile
yāa boliṇa nakuḷaku kalyāṇa dhuni kale | 69 |
kalyāṇa hoi bābu thāa tu subhāgye | 71 |
suranātha āgyāṁ dile mātaḷi tume yāa
dhīra dhīra hoi ratha svargaru uhlāilā

lg.note: “hastinā nagare se yāiṁṇa miḷilā” pare keteka pothire<lb/>bhinna pāṭha :-

lg.l: namaskāra kalā yāiṁ yujheṣṭhi bhīma arajunaṁku chāhiṁ | 76 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tu yāare sahadeba bahana
boilā ṭhākuraṁka āgyāṁ hoilā uṭhibā gosāiṁ | 78 |
karapatra yoḍi yāiṁ yujheṣṭhiṁka chāmure miḷila | 79 |
yujheṣṭhira boile kisa carita svargare hoilā kahani nakuḷa
agni śara peṣi asuraka dahana kali puṇi | 82 |
hāthī rathī sanya tahiṁ aneka kṣaẏa galā
yujheṣṭhi deba śuṇi bahuta ānanda hoile

lg.note: “nakuḷa kumarakaiṁ paraśaṁsa kale” pada pare ‘kha’ pothire<lb/>bhinna pāṭha –
śuṇa ho bilaṁka rājā agasti kahile |

lg.l: pūjābidhi pāiṇa śire pāṭeka bānddha āstānare basili | 85 |
gauroba kariṇa indra mo aṅgare khañjilā | 86 |
brahmāẏe thāi aneka kalyāṇa dhuni kale | 87 |
śuṇa ho bilaṁka rājā agasti kahile | 88 |
boile mahārājā śuṇiluṭi ki moḍhāsura badha
yesane nakuḷa pāṭa bānddhalā amara madhya | 89 |
dhanu jana bipuḷa lakṣmī tāhāku miḷai | 91 |
bahuta kaṣṭa saṁsāre pāānti se prāṇī | 92 |
muhiṁ ye arakṣita aṭai sāroḷa dāsa

lg.head: {@nārakāsura badha o pārijāta haraṇa@}
lg.l: ẏethu anantare ye bilaṁka deśa rājā
agasti muniṁka caraṇe kalā dibya pūjā | 1 |
gandha puṣya naibedya chāmure dile nei
karapatra yoḍi bolai binoẏī bhāba hoi | 2 |
bho muni boilu ye debadatta ailā kāhiṁ
ẏe kathā sañchapi mote kahibā mahāmuni | 4 |
rājāra bacane ye kahanti agasti yati
śuṇa tu sābadhāne bilaṁka deśara napati | 5 |
se kathā nr̥pati tu śuṇilu biśeṣi | 6 |
ābara bibhā hoile hari ṣoḷasahasra śatenārī
ati bhāgye bhāratha ẏe karṇṇaku amr̥ta | 8 |
sabadhāne śuṇa tu ho bilaṁka deśa rāẏe
baruṇatahuṁ se kanaka chatra daṇḍa nilā
tāhāku dekhile deba indra bhaẏe pāi | 11 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa bāratā yahūṁ dūte kahile indraku
dvārikā pure bheṭilā se śrī biṣṇunāthaṁku | 12 |
bolibu nārakāsura uparaku danta sājibe dāmodara
śrīkr̥ṣṇa āgyāṁ pāi garuḍa bahana caḷigale
saina danta sāja boli āgyāṁ dile maharājā | 20 |
bherī marddana śaṅkha ye ābara kāhāḷa
andhaka bāmana hoi ye biṣṇa bongśa uccāṭa | 26 |
ẏekaku āreka ye mahā baḷīẏāra aṭanti | 28 |
bīra marddaḷa bīradhū se bahithānti bānā | 31 |
rasāṇilā chāẏeṇī pīḍhā ye subarṇṇa bistāra
hīrā pagaḍa kāṭhi darpaṇa panti panti | 35 |
campā bakuḷa jāi ye nāgeśvara puṣya
melā pāṭa jhumpā ye subarṇṇara kaṇṭhī
nīḷā poẏeḷā lambai ye mukutā māḷagoṭi | 37 |
mārāga ratna kaḷasa ye saṣṭikara stambha
madhyare marakata stambha ye diśai ārambha | 38 |
gagana ādrābaḷī yesaneke nirmaḷa jyoti tarā | 39 |
tīra konta śābeḷī ye lāṁkiā kodaṇḍa
asipatra nirmāṇa ye tr̥ṇa ādi kari
nānā śahasra dhariṇa ye bīrabeśa hoi
bida mudi kaṁkaṇa ye apūbong rūparekhā | 43 |
āgapacha hoiṇa ye caḷanti pala pala | 47 |
hāthī ārohiṇa ye māhunte caḷanti āgasari
tahimra pāruśe māhunte kare śasra dhari | 48 |
neta patani ye sindhu pāga pinddha | 53 |
lg.note: amāri = hāti upare manuṣya basibā pāiñ kasāhebā ābaraṇa<lb/>yukta āsana, hāudā |
lg.l: ānandeṇa pādānti baḷa ye kiḷikiḷā nāda kari
kare haḷa mūṣaḷa ye beśa beśana hoi
dvārikā dānte ubhā hoile se yāiṁ | 56 |
aneka yādaba bīre achanti śahasra dhari | 59 |
kaṇṭhare ābharaṇa ye mukutā sari māḷā | 61 |
tāḍa toḍara kirīṭa bāhuti bida mudi
śubha maṅgaḷa yogare rathe basileka yaiṁ | 64 |
aneka sambhare ratha rathī hoileka saja
gajaku ārohi ye rahile raṇa yodhī
ẏebidhi caturaṅga baḷa caurāśi koṭi lekhā
uḍanti panti panti ye cirāḷa jhīna neta | 68 |
aneka chandeṇa bājaṇā bāji pulakai tāra kāẏe | 70 |
basudeba hakāri ye śrīmukhe dile bhikṣā
bho pitā āmbhara āsibā yāẏe kaṭeka karithāa raẏā | 72 |
nārakāsuraku badha kari sabongśubhe ye āsibu | 73 |
baiśākha śukḷa tr̥tīẏā ye br̥haspati bāra bhoga
bāṇijya nāme karaṇa biṣkumbha nāme yoga | 75 |
apramita saina saṅgare ye achanti biśeṣi | 76 |
uttara mukhe caḷile baḷa dvarikāru bāhāra hoi | 78 |
māra māra dhara dhara ye goḷanāda śabade
basāku basā ye caḷaile baḷa gheni
bakuḷāñcha pabongta taḷe prabeśa hoile saini | 81 |
apramita saina ye tāhāra aṭai akaḷaṇā
batiśa kṣauṇī baḷa tāra aṭai jagujiṇā | 83 |
gaṇa gandhabong debatānta tāhāra bhaẏa nāhiṁ
aneka rājā se ye jiṇilā daṇḍa bāhi | 84 |
yete rājāmānaṁkara yete sundara hohitā thilā
baḷe bandī kari sabu antapuraku āṇila | 85 |
gaṇitā naba yubā ye lakṣeka rājajemā
saṁkalpa kari mane bāñcchā kariacchi yāhā
lakṣeka sundarī hoile hoiba tebe bibhā | 87 |
teṇu kari kanyāmānanta antapure thoicchi nr̥pamaṇi
beḷe beḷe paśi baḷe sabunti acchi āṇī | 88 |
tetiśa koṭi debatā yāhāra nāmaku karanti bhaẏe | 89 |
se rājāra sannidhye yāi miḷile catradhara
mana pabana tridaṇḍī kandhare chatra pāḍi
mathāre tuḷasī gabhā ye kuṇḍaḷa karṇṇamūḷe
kaḷi dhokaḍi kandhe deba karāṇḍi kuśa pīḍhā sāje
raṅgapāṭa kaupuni kaṭire dibyaśobhā ye birāje | 95 |
āstāna teji āsi pāẏe paḍi śoilā | 97 |
bho muni dhanya āja jībana mohora | 98 |
dhanya se pitā mātā kalā mote janma
tote draśana pāili saphaḷa mora karma | 99 |
mahāmantra sumari muni kalyāṇa bāñcchā kale | 101 |
nārakāsura boilā muni he pathaśrānta pāi
teṇu mohora puraku bije kala ki gosāiṁ | 102 |
nārade boile āmbhara daẏā yahuṁ tote
śraddhā kari ailu āmbhe tote dekhibā nimante | 103 |
trailokye bikhyāta ye aṭai tora kathā | 104 |
svarga marttya pātāḷe tu hoilu kāreṇī
aneka abatara ye hoichu deha bahi | 106 |
ye tohora śauryya baḷa tuhi tāhā jāṇu
ẏebe tote bipada paḍilā nihāi tuhi śuṇu | 107 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa tohora tahiṁki aile daṇḍa bāhi
bakuḷāñchaḷa pabongta taḷe achanti saini rahi | 108 |
koṭiẏe indra hoile tu jiṇipāru heḷe | 109 |
marttyara rājāẏe tote kehi nuhanti sama
śūrabantā śakatā tu ye sāṁgrāmare aṭu yama | 110 |
tohora bhaḷi loka ẏekā sahucchi kemante
nirbhaẏe thāṭha gheni tote bheṭibe deba jagannāthe | 111 |
ẏeḍe baḍa bharasā kāhāra rabi taḷe hoilā
mohora tahiṁki se bīratūra bajāi ailā | 113 |
mantrī boilā deba ki karibā upāẏe
sābadhāne śuṇa deba bujhiaili muhiṁ yāhā
mahā mahā yodhī deba achanti tāhāra saṅge
jaṇa jaṇake saptadvīpā pr̥thīki jiṇanti raṇaraṅge | 116 |
mahāghora sāṁgrāmare kehi na karanti śaṁkā | 117 |
aṭhāra beḷa dhāḍi dile kehi jiṇi nuāranti | 118 |
svaẏeṁ biṣṇu abatāra se aṭanti jagujitā
svarga marttya pātāḷe tāṁku nāhiṁ ke jiṇantā | 119 |
ẏekathā śuṇi mote baḍa haraṣa lāgilā | 121 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa mahimāṁ ye kahilu mora āge
ẏeḍe baḍa yoddhā se hoilā keuṇa bāge | 122 |
ẏe mora pure kehne bharasi paśucchi | 123 |
yamara bhmabanaku ye prasthāna kalā āsi
deha bahi jībanaku na kalāka āśa
nicaẏe maṇili se ye hoiba prāṇe nāśa | 125 |
koṭiẏe ndraṁku muṁ ye jiṇi pārai dhari
puṇi āgyāṁ dilā saina sajakara mohori | 126 |
āṭhakṣauṇī pādānti sājile kodaṇḍa kāṇḍa sāji | 129 |
nausāgara ratha ye sājile ati bege
sakaḷa saina sajahoi miḷile nārakāsura āge | 130 |
mudara daita ye nārakāsura pāśe thilā
āpaṇe mudara daita ye dibyabeśa hoi
śabade kampu acchi ye sapata brahmāṇḍa | 133 |
hāthī rathī pāika rāuta raṇaraṁkā yodhī
aneka saina gheni mudara asura bāhilā
meghā bīratūra ye bājai puṇa puṇi
pr̥thī daladalita ye kampu acchi jāṇi | 138 |
bho deba mudara daita āsi paṭuāri rahilā | 139 |
bhagadatta boli ye nārakāsura putra raṇaraṁkā
āga thāthe acchi se kāhāku nāhiṁ śaṁkā | 141 |
beḷuṁ beḷuṁ saina ye māḍipaḍu acchi bege bege
ḍagarā mukharu hari ẏesaneka bāratā pāi
tāḷadhvaja ratha ārohi baḷadeba paḍileka ḍeiṁ | 143 |
baḷadeba boile kr̥ṣṇa chāragaṇa kahileka yāhā
sābadhāna hoi tu śuṇilu ṭiki tāhā | 144 |
kāhara bichāraku ẏekathā kemanta prāẏe maṇi | 145 |
darahasita hoile hari tāhāṁkara kathakaiṁ śuṇi | 148 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile kāhiṁ āmbhara ẏeḍe bhāgya
paṭoāre rahibā bhaḷi āmbhe pāibā raṇyāga | 149
ẏeteka śuṇik baḷarāme paḍile bege dhāiṁ
re re kāra kariṇa paḍile bege māḍi
huṁkāra nāda kariṇa se chāḍile ghoraraḍi | 152 |
gadā mudugara asi chela catra pahuḍile | 153 |
adhare danta chāpi ke mārai bajramuṣṭi
ratha āgakari ke dhāmaiṁ puṇa heṭi | 154 |
sānande meda medā bhmañjanti yognīgaṇa miḷi | 156 |
gaḍanti paḍanti yekehu raṇe hoẏe bhāṅgi
konta sābeḷi kāhāra hr̥dare acchi lāgi | 159 |
dekhiṇa yādaba saina mane kale śaṁkā | 160 |
pratakṣe baḷadeba tāhā dekhile ka āge
raha raha boli yāi ugāḷile bege | 162 |
dekhila matrake ye paḍile bege dhāiṁ | 166 |
uhobaḷa saini śaṁkā pāile tāhā śuṇi | 168 |
gaja marma bidāraku se jāṇai mauṣadhi | 170 |
re re kāra kari bege ugāḷile hāthībaḷa puṇa | 172 |
haḷa mūṣaḷa dhari hāḷī thile ubhā hoi | 173 |
pracaṇḍa nāda kari ye dharanti thorahasta
buku bidāriṇa ye karanti khaṇḍa khaṇḍa | 176 |
puṇi aśisahasra bāṇa binddhalā ati roṣe
niśvāsa mātrake bāṇa bindhai koṭi koṭi
cūnā kuḍha hoiṇa ye padileka uḍi
bābala śateka bāṇa māilā nārakāsurara tanuja
mukha bistāriṇa tāhā gilile haḷapāṇi acyutagraja | 185 |
kehuṇasi prakāre baḷadebaṁka aṅge nohilāka bheda
dhanu śahasra chāḍiṇa bīra rathara upare
niśvāsa phandi phuṭilā dekhi hoilā kātare | 188 |
āhe debaśahasra goṭāẏe achuṭi ki pāi | 189 |
ẏete boli baḷadeba hāthīṁka lāñja dhari
dianti phopaḍāi kāhāku nānā dukha deikari | 190 |
re re kāra kariṇa dhāmanti gaḷagāji
ẏeka megha upare āreka megha paḍai ki bhāji | 191 |
bhāñjile bhagadatta saina kehi na rahile pāśe | 192 |
daśamarbhmata sainaru āṭhamarbhmata saina ye paḍilā
duimarbhmata saina gheni bhagadatta rājyaku paḷailā | 193 |
bhāñjile thāṭha mohora paḍile bahuta sehnā | 196 |
akāraṇe śatr̥ mote miḷileka kāhuṁ āsi
ẏeḍe baḍa sampada harilā rājyare mohora paśi | 197 |
sainara baikulya dekhi byākuḷa mohora citte
āhe sārathi ratha me hora bege bāhā
mohora thānte saina ye hoile asāhā | 199 |
prāṇa gheni ẏethuṁ jaṇe na yibeṭi brati | 200 |
raṇa dekhi kātara hoilu tora tuccha buddhi | 201 |
ẏe tohe ra deha ye kemante pāru rakhi
sakaḷa sainama ne ye tahuṁ paḷāile
beḷuṁ beḷuṁ saini ye paḍuchanti māḍi
bātagha te megha yehne dhāmaiṁ taḍabaḍi | 207 |
ẏedā dekhi mudara daitara kampilāka aṅga
raha raha mudara boli ugāḷile āge | 210 |
tumbhe bāḷuta nare aṭa re mānabā
bāṭa na jāṇi baṇāhoi mala abā | 212 |
ẏe mohora bala abā kimpe māruachu gañji
nicaẏeṁ yama debatā pocchilā tumbhara ye pāñji | 213 |
na jāṇi śatr̥ kimpe re hoila me hora tule
jaṇe ki tumbhe prāṇagheni yiba ẏethu bhale | 214 |
ẏete boli bīra ye kopānaḷe chāhiṁlā | 215 |
āre āre mohora pratagyāṁ śuṇilā tora nāhiṁ
hāthīṁkara upare padi mūrddhana yai phāṭi | 220 |
ẏeka ratha upare ye āreka ratha kachāḍai roṣabhare
garjana nāda kaci kachāḍai ẏekaku āreka upare | 221 |
caukati dekhiṇa ye mārai takṣaṇe śare
chāpoḍe mārante se bhāñjile ye yāhāre | 222 |
aśvaṁka upare nei se aśvanta kachāḍi
bitrama gati kari ye diai siṁgharaḍi | 223 |
beḷu beḷu kopa ye baḍhai uguḷi
adhare danta chāpi ye dhāmaiṁ mahābaḷī | 226 |
pabongta ākāra kari ye baḍhāilā kāẏā | 227 |
beni pabongta prāẏeka ye diśai benibhmaja
laha laha jibhyā ye bhaẏaṁkara mūrtti
nirdhūma agni jāṇi ye beni naẏana jyoti | 231 |
niśvāsa bātaghāte ye ratha gaje uḍanti
hāthī rathī aśva saina marddai pācabhare | 233 |
dekhiṇa yādabe ye kehi na radanti pāśe | 235 |
paḷānti pachaku ye na chāhānti kehi
antarddhāna hoi tu daṇḍeka karibu biśrāma
datyara tule āmbhe ye karibu sāṁgrāma | 241 |
ketu maṅgaḷa prāẏe ye diśai mahāteja
meru pabongte bheṭi yesaneke ailā mattagaja | 244 |
re re kāra kariṇa ye asura mahākope
dekhina sārathi ratha nelāka ye kāḍhi
gadā bhāñji bhūmire ye śatekhaṇḍa hoi paḍi | 246 |
gadābhagna hoile ye mudara daityara āge
ati kopānaḷe ye kampai tāra ka ẏe | 248 |
bhagna saina dekhiṇ ye kampilāka tanu
dhātikāre dhaile ye śāraṅga nāme dhanu | 249 |
puṇa puṇa bāṇa ye tīkṣamūnā gheni
hāthara byagre ye puṇa daśasahasra bāṇa binddhale
adhara pr̥ṣṭa kari ye dānabaku māile | 252 |
beḷu beḷa kopa ye badhilā uguḷi
huṁkāra nāda kariṇa ye binddhale dibyaśara
tesaneke śara br̥ṣti hoilā ākāśa maṇḍaḷa | 255 |
ghora garjana kari svāmī ye māileka tuhāi | 256 |
koṭiẏe indra yāhaku samāna nuhanti raṇe
daita mātrake ki jiṇima tāhāṁku ẏekājaṇe | 258 |
mandāra puṣya prāẏe hoilā datyaṁkara aṅga | 259 |
kebaṇa bhāgye basudeba kr̥ṣṇaṁku kale jāta
dhanya jībana tora debakī debī māta | 263 |
niśvāsa mātrake śara māranti koṭi koṭi
pr̥thīyāka pūrila yesaneke śrīkr̥ṣṇara bāṇa jāḷā | 266 |
ẏehā dekhi mudra daita thambībhūta hoilā
kāhuṁṇa ailu tu aṭu keuṁṇa deśī
akārane tu ye mohora baḷa kāhiṁki puṇa dhvaṁsi | 268 |
muhiṁta śutr̥ tohora pūbongre nohi bādī
adoṣe tu kimpāi ailu mote sādhi | 269 |
kebaṇa kuḷe jāta nāma tora kisa | 270 |
aneka kāḷaru muhiṁ ye achai ẏethi rahi
śrījagannāthe boile śuṇa re asura bīra
basudebara putra muṁ nāma mohora catradhara | 272 |
daita māri mora nāma aṭai daitāri | 273 |
sāṁgrāma chāḍi mudara daita bhājilāka tahūṁ | 274 |
bhājileka saina ye na rahile kehi
yādabe ye tāha dekhile dure thāiṁ
tahiṁra khaṇḍe dūre ye anaḷa pāgerī
ati yatane asura nibongāṇa acchi kari | 279 |
mudara daita ye siṁghadvāre acchi rahi | 280 |
lakṣe koṭi marbhmata kari bindhanti debahari | 283 |
pañchajanya śaṅkha śabada kale deba tahiṁ | 285 |
dūre thāiṇa tāhā mudara daita śuṇi
kopeṇa dhāiṁlā bajra mūṣaḷa kare gheni | 287 |
hāthe jūṣaḷa dhari ye mudara daita bīra
māilāka śūḷa nei nandighoṣa rathara upara | 289 |
tikṣamūna dui bāṇa ye māile debahari
puṇi dhāiṁlā dānaba ye pāṭi bistāra kari
tuṇḍara bhitaraku bege paśupatra bāṇa māri | 292 |
puṇa daita bīra śakti goṭaẏeka dhari
dhr̥maśare māri tāhāra śira ye kāṭile | 294 |
jaḷa bhitare se paḍilāka muhaṁ māḍi
pañchagoṭi bāṇare tāhāra pāñchagoti muṇḍa cchiḍi | 295 |
tāhāra saṅge tāhāra ye śateputra thile
piṭhoḷa boli kari tāhara yebaṇa senāpati
śrābaṇa māse yesaneke baraṣ tesaneke nārāja baraṣile | 298 |
dekhiṇa śrīkr̥ṣṇa ye paśupatra bāṇa māri
māṁsa kāṭile tāṁkara ṭiki ṭiki kari | 299 |
takṣane muṇḍa se kāṭi pakāile āga kari | 300 |
ḍagara mukharu ye nārakā ẏehā śuṇi
begeṇa dhāiṁlā ye garjiṇa baḷa gheni | 301 |
airābrata aṁśe upuji achanti samasta hāthī
garuḍa piṭhire thāi śrīkr̥ṣṇa tāhā ye dekhile | 306 |
ke kahi pāriba ye śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka magimā | 308 |
dhāiṁṇa bajra mūṣaḷa ye māilā raṇaraṁkā | 309 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa dekhiṇa ye dūru bāṇa māri
āpaṇe śrīkr̥ṣṇa ye aneka bāṇa māri
sainamāne māranti se khaṇḍa khaṇḍa kari | 312 |
prati prati kari ye kāṭanti bhinna bhinna | 313 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka saṁgate se aneka yuddha kalā | 315 |
paśupatra bāṇa pośi tāhāra muṇḍa kāṭile ananta | 316 |
jaẏe jaẏe śabada ye ākāśe śubhilā | 317 |
dibyarakṣu gheni māẏe ye chāhiṁle ẏekacitte
dekhile sarūpa ye śaṅkhacatra acchi hāthe | 320 |
aneka stuti karai kārpuṇya hoi kari | 321 |
jaẏa jaẏa nirañjana prabhma nirākāra debasvāmī
aśeṣa koṭi brahmāṇḍe tuhi se antaryyāmī | 322 |
lakṣmīra ballabha svāmī tuhi se debarājā
śuka saunaka muni karanti yāhāṁku pādapūjā | 323 |
rūpa rekha barṇṇa nāhiṁ ye tora tini
tuhi se sañchilu nātha sacarācara medinī | 324 |
jaḷa sthaḷa anaḷa ye sabuṭhāre achu pūri
śubhāśubha karma tu ye pāru āna kari | 325 |
akṣaẏa ajaẏa amara tu ye kalpānteka puruṣa
bhuta bhabiṣya barttamāna samasta tote dr̥śya | 326 |
mada macchara ahaṁkāra śarīre tora nāhiṁ
acchidra puruṣa pūrṇṇānanda acchidre achu rahi | 327 |
svāmī mūrkha nārakāsur atote se na cihnilā
āpaṇe yāhā arajilā se tāhā bhogakalā | 328 |
prabhma saṅge bigraha kalāka ẏeḍe mānī
āgo bhārābhara nibāribāku jāta hoiacchi muhiṁ | 331 |
pātāḷa baikuṇṭhe mote guhāri kalu yāi | 332 |
duṣṭaṁkara bhārā sahi nuārai boliṇa boilu
tohora nimante sinā tohora putraku māiluṁ | 333 |
bodha bacane pr̥thīdebī śānti ye hoile
puṇa praḷamba kari ye yoḍilā benikara
ẏe nārakāsura kumara bhagadattaku debā dāna | 337 |
ẏe tohora prasāde ye hoithāu abhaẏe
bhagadattaku kr̥pā ye kale tahuṁ puṇi | 339 |
śrīhaste tociṇa śāḍhī tāhāku ye dile
dekhile ṣoḷasahasra kanyā achanti ye rahi | 341 |
seṭhāre yāiṇa śrī jagannāthe kaleka bijaẏe
mane mane patikari ye āgorile tahuṁ | 343 |
bāñcchā kalpataru boli yehu nāmagoṭi bahi
airābrata gaja aṁśe yeteka gaja jāta
pāpadhi mahāpātaka ye harai tāhā śuṇi | 351 |
agasti muniṁki pucchā kale puṇa puṇi | 353 |
ẏethu anantare puṇa hoilā kebaṇa carita
bilaṁka deśa rājāra ye nirmaḷa citta śuṇi
purāṇa pustaka ye pheḍile agasti mahāmuni | 355 |
kare śaṅkha catra gadā ābara śāraṅga dhanu
hr̥dare kaustubha maṇi mukutā sari māḷa
ānanda kanda rūpa ye dhaile nandabāḷa | 359 |
muṇi māṇikya hīrā ye bīrājai koṭi koṭi | 360 |
koṭi madana rūpa prabhma dhaile jagujitā | 362 |
amara bhmabane bije se deba antaryyāmī | 363 |
lakṣmī nārāẏaṇa mūrtti kisa debāka upamā | 364 |
tetiśa koṭi deba āstānare thile basi
indra debatā sahite bāṭaku aile pāchoṭi | 366 |
paḷāi paḷāi yādabe pāile ati dukha | 373 |
teṇu kari mathurā āmbhe ye chāḍigalu
debagaṇe boile tu ye bahu danujāntaka bānā
bhārābhara nibāraṇa arthe ye hoiachu abatāra
saṁsāra samudraku tu ye nāukā karṇṇadhāra | 377 |
tohora thāpilāra āmbhe ye samaste debatā
bhagata bāndhaba tu ye prabhma jagujitā | 378 |
nicinta hoilu āmbhe ye samasta debatāẏe | 379 |
tu ye dvārikā bhmabane rahilu hr̥ṣīkeśī
ẏebe āmbhe nicinta ye hoilu svargabāsī | 380 |
aneka prakāre ye debatāẏe bodhi kahi
satyabhāmāṁku draśana kale se tini nāẏekā | 383 |
ẏesaneka samaẏe āsuacchi ye pārijātaka gabhā | 384 |
āḍo āḍo boli ye pāṭachatra dharāi
rambhāra mukha chāhim satya bhāmā pachārile | 386 |
dāntare kisa goḷa go śubhmaacchi sakhī
pārijātaka puṣyara kathā tumbhara śuṇilāka nāhiṁ | 388 |
apūbong phula phuṭai go subarṇṇara jyoti
pañchāśa yojana pariyante puṣya cahaṭai caukati | 389 |
beni baraṣa uttāru br̥kṣara patara paḍai ye jhaḍi | 390 |
idnra debatānta niyoga gabhāẏe śaciṁka nityamāḷe | 391 |
indra debatānta niyoga gabhāẏe śacīṁka nityamāḷe | 392 |
indra indrāẏaṇī ye puṣya gheninti ye ẏekā
samudra manthana kāḷe se upujilā kaḷapa śākhā | 393 |
svarga marttya pātāḷaku se uttama tarubara
pabana ātape se antarīkṣe yāi uḍi | 395 |
śuṇa āho bilaṁka deśa rājā badanti mahāmuni
iti śrī mahābhāratha purāṇa puṇya dhuni | 399 |
samasta debatāmāne ye yāhā purakaiṁ gale | 400 |
nityakarma bebhāra sāri muṇohire bije kari | 401 |
nānā kautuka raṅge nirantare thānti khaṭi | 402 |
indra debatāṁka gauroba pāiṇa rahile dina daśa | 403 |
śacī ādi kari samaste karithānti sebā | 404 |
pārijātaka puṣya gacha dvārikāku nebi muhiṁ | 406 |
