śrījagannāthe boile inda debatāṁkara aṭai se pāṭa
chāla se pusya tumbhanta dekhāibā ẏekānte
dhādi dhāḍi rekha rekha apūbong br̥ṣaḷa panti panti | 412 |
aṣṭaratna caurā bedī sabu br̥kṣaṁkara mūḷe
karpr̥ra panira pāṇi kṣata br̥kṣaṁkara tule | 413 |
abasante basanta ye bahai ghana ghana
manda gandha suśītaḷa latā bahi bāẏe
dhanya se nandanabana kisa paṭāntara debā
caturddaśa bhmabane yahiṁ apūbong puṣya thile
jāi yui mallī māḷatī puṣya nānā
punāṅga pāṭaḷi bakuḷ anageśvara churī anā | 418 |
nānā barṇṇe taru achanti phuṭi phaḷi | 421 |
āmba paṇasa guā kadaḷī naṭīkāḷa taru | 423 |
koḷāhaḷa dhvani ye karanti śārī śuā | 424 |
br̥kṣara upare uṭhi ḍākanti dibya ḍāka | 425 |

div.note: yāṣṭimadhu = eka prakāra br̥kṣara jiñchita tikta miṭhā mūḷa |

lg.l: ẏeka ẏeka nāma dhari kahante anta nāhiṁ
amr̥ta apūbong phaḷapāci paḍanti br̥kṣaṁkara taḷa | 431 |
br̥kṣanta pratipāḷanti toṭāḷe ye yāha beḷa jāṇi | 432 |
patra patrake dharai āne āne mūrtti | 435 |
ābrttaka sambarttaka drona ye puṣkara megha chāri | 437 |
puṣya dekhiṇa śraddhā ye kale śatrābatī | 440 |
bho deba tumbhe ye boila āmbhe śatrābatīra sāiṁ
ẏe puṣya tatubara goṭi āmbha dvāraku nebā
mohora pure nei ẏe puṣya thāpibā | 442 |
hou nemā boli pārijātaka br̥kṣa upaḍile | 443 |
huṁkāra nāda kari upāḍile pārijātaka br̥kṣa
garuda mukha chāhiṁṇa prabhma āgyām dile
pārijātaka puṣya br̥kṣa upāḍi nele bhābagrāhī | 447 |
garuḍa piṭhire deba tridaśya deba kāhna | 449 |
raha raha boli bege ugāḷile yāiṁ
chaẏāṇoiṁ koṭi gandhabonge beḍhichanti sabu tahīṁ | 451 |
rāgeṇa deba indra gandhabongṁku ḍāka dilā
dhara dhara māra māra paḍilāka mahāgoḷa
raha raha gauḍa āja kāhiṁ yibu re paḷāi | 454 |
gauḍa bāuḍa hāuḍa tu ye aṭu manda jāti
tini nāma baha tumbhara kisa gati | 455 |
sabūnti harilu tu banasta bhitare āṇi | 457 |
āḍacarā yubatīṁki kalu cauryya bandhe rati
āna yonireṇa citta nuhai tohora saṁjāti | 458 |
gauḍaṁka anna tu ye samaẏe achu khāi
aṣṭa baraṣa paryyante thilu tahiṁ rahi | 460 |
ẏeke ẏeke nāma dhari tāhā kahibāka kete | 461 |
āpaṇāra kathā ki tāhā āpaṇe na jāṇu | 462 |
boile āmbhanta nindākalu ye hoilu mahāpāpī | 467 |
agyāna pāmara tu ho aḷapa tora buddhi
ki abā āborilā tote bhuta preta byādhi | 468 |
āmbhe biśvanātha tu āmbhanta bolu manda
āẏuṣa kṣaẏa hoilā tuṭilā tora sampada | 469 |
ẏe bacana śuṇi indra debatā boile
sāna baḍa jāṇi sinā ẏethuṁ uburi gale | 470 |
guṇa ṭaṁkāra kari kodaṇḍa āmañchana kale
bhumiki dr̥ṣṭidei ye binddhale sthira kari
kare dhanu dhari ye māranti ye yāhāri | 474 |
ke daśa tiriśa ke biṁśa pañchiśa māranti
śrābaṇa māse yehne karai jaḷa br̥ṣṭi
sehi rūpe gandhabonge bāṇa māranti heṭi | 476 |
garuḍa piṭhire paḍi samasta cūra hoi | 477 |
śrī jagannāthe tāhā dekhile dūre thāi
hāthīra kumbhasthaḷe ye bāṇa paḍilā bajra ghoṭi
chaichāḍe bāṇa ye galāka dehe phuṭi | 481 |
pache māhuntaṁku ye māile aṭi rāge | 482 |
se bāṇa bājilā yāi airābrata upare | 483 |
garuḍa piṭhire bāṇa paḍi paḍai upuḍi | 489 |
kathāra begre hari ye śahasra bābala tīkṣa
bho pitā indradebatā puraku ye gobinde bijekale
satyabhāmā dekhiṇa ye śaradhā kale yahuṁ
nirbhare beḍhi sāṁgrāma kaleka se puṇi | 496 |
madhyare ubhā hoi stuti kalyāṇa karanti apāra | 500 |
jaẏa tu biśvanātha ye saṁsāra kāreṇi
jaẏa tu biśvanātha go brāhmaṇa hitakārī
jaḷa sthaḷa anaḷe tu sabuṭhāre achu puri | 505 |
dvāpare jāta hela mānaba deha bahi | 506 |
brahmāṁkara bacana śuṇi hari hoileka toṣa
niśaṁke miḷile yāi indra debatāṁka āge | 510 |
brahmāra beni caraṇe abhiṣeka kale yāi | 512 |
puṇa puṇa śatebāra ye gaḍaghāli śutilā | 513 |
boile bhopitā tora prasāde sinā ẏesana bibhūti | 514 |
tu se sañchilā mote karichu ẏeḍejaṇa
svārga marttya pātāḷa muṁ ye karipārai sādhya
sāṁgrāme jiṇantā nāhiṁ mote tinibhmabana madhya | 516 |
ẏebe ye dvārikāpuraku sabongdebe debe dhāḍi
bāunakoṭi bhaṇḍāra jūra kari āṇimi sabong
boile āmbhara bola chāḍi ki laghiṁbu dharmamārga | 519 |
bābu tohora bhaḷi loka yebe karibu abichāra
āmbhara bacana laghiṁle nāhiṁ tote bhala | 522 |
pitāmaha boile yuddha ye na kara
śrīkr̥ṣṇa saṅgate tumbhe na yujhibā kadācita | 525 |
āhe nicaẏe kariṇa tumbhe śuṇa surarāẏe
ẏe tohora icchā nimante āmbhe boluchuṁ parighāi
sāṁgrāma kale tohora āja bartti nāhiṁ | 527 |
kapaṭa kūṭa māẏā ye deba nārāẏaṇa
āmbhe tridaśyaṁkara ki uprodha pāru chāḍi
ẏekatha bichāri bege yāa yā bāhuḍi | 531 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa bacana tote nāhiṁṭi ye bhala | 532 |
bilā tohora āgyāṁ kemante laṅghibi bedapati | 533 |
aṅgārapannaṅgaku āgyāṁ dilā bāhuḍāi āṇa thāṭha
amarābatī kaṭake yāiṁ indra debatā miḷi
gobindaṁka sannidhaku boli brahmāẏe gale caḷi | 536 |
boile nārada muni tumbhe kāhiṁ thila
śabada śuṇi ẏeṇe ailu tora pura
śuṇa ho nārada tumbhe mohora bacana
kanyāẏe acchi mora haraṁku karibi pradāna | 168 |
ye yāhāra pure yāiṁ prabeśa hoile | 173 |
yāuachuṁ āmbhe se svarga ye bhmabana | 175 |
dekhiba nāhiṁki hara ki ki chanti dei | 176 |
ẏehā śaṇi nārade ye haraṣa hoile
ki ki drabya deichanti dekhibā boile | 177 |
phiṭāi dekhanti tahiṁ nārada muni basi
haḷadiā māṇi acchi pāñcha ye bhārara
ānanda hoiṇa se hasanti kara kara | 187 |
ẏe bhabiṣya dekhi pichāḍi nuāranti ākhi | 188 |
jāṇu jāṇu tuhi puṇa kalu ẏehu kr̥ta | 189 |
tāhānta kemante tu debu tohora dohita | 190 |
lg.note: āḍakhura = betara peḍi bā mañjuṣā, kāṭhara peḍi |

lg.l: tuhi ta jāṇu tāhāra kuḷa gotra nāhiṁ | 191 |
pāuṁśa lochāẏe goḷi hoithāẏe se dehare | 192 |
mr̥gacarma goṭāẏe se kāndhe pakāiṇa thāi
samaste ye sthara hele muniṁka bacane | 201 |
dhyāna kari brahmāṁku sehu kale cintā | 203 |
brahmāẏe boile cintā kimpe kalu mote
bhitaraku āsa tumbhe tāhā dekha thare | 207 |
bichārile āmbha dilā drabya kicchi nahiṁ | 209 |
kehu ẏeḍe biparīta kalā ẏethe puṇa
boile ho hemabanta śuṇa āmbha bāṇī
āna kehi āsithilā ẏe ṭhābaku puṇi | 212 |
ẏehā śuṇi brahmā hemabanta mukha chāhiṁ
ẏe kathāku śocanā tu na kara maneṇa
hemabanta puraku samaste kara ho gabana
bibhāra ye dina bāra gheniāsa puṇa | 223 |
bibhāra ye lagnadina dia tumbhe mote
meru upare sabhā kari basiachanti samaste | 230 |
kumha caubiṁśa dine baḍa śubha hoi
tithibāra nākṣatra sabong śubha ye aṭai | 232 |
tithibāra koṣṭhīgoṭi bujhi kahilu ye āmbhe | 233 |
śrīhari caraṇa sebai kabi sāroḷa dāsa | 242 |
birasa nāgaku se kaṭire ḍora kale
śveta nāgaku se kaupīna kariṇa pinddhale | 246 |
padma nāga takṣakaku se lambāi gaḷāre
bhoḷe se bijekale yāi br̥ṣabha upare | 247 |
tumbhuru na bajāi śūnyare rahile munimaṇi | 251 |
śūnya tejyākari āsi tā pure miḷile | 252 |
āja ta baḍa utsaba ẏe tohora pura | 257 |
bho deba nārada śuṇa bacana mohori
ẏehā śuṇi nārada ye bacana kahanti
ẏeḍe sundara jhiaku akhaḍe nāśa kalu
janmakāḷe biṣa dei kimpe na māilu | 265 |
bāḷakāḷe goḍa kimpe na dilu gaḷāre | 266 |
sthirakari chāhāṁ nije haraku ye tahiṁ
ẏe tora jhiaku kimpe ẏehāku kalu bara | 271 |
janama kāḷaru kimpe ẏehāku na māilu | 272 |
ẏebe kemanta kari deha dharibu ye tuhi
ẏe sundara jhia haraku puṇa dei | 273 |
ẏe bibhā utsabe ẏehāṁkara ẏesanaka rīti | 274 |
yeṇu ẏehāra kuḷa gotra nāhiṁ puṇa
basra ābharaṇa se pāiba kāhiṁ jāṇa | 277 |
dekha yeuṁ sarpamāne phu phu karuchanti
bibhākāḷe na puṇa se jhiaku daṁsanti | 278 |
phu phu kāra kari sehu garjanti garutara | 280 |
asāṣṭama hoi hemabantī rodana karai puṇi | 282 |
kānta mukha chāhiṁṇa se rodana karanti | 284 |
hemabanta tahiṁ ye aneka trodha kale
hemabantī kara dhari tāṁku bahuta prabodhile | 285 |
hemabantī kahe nāradaṁkara dhari pāda dui | 287 |
bho muni śuṇa tumbhe mohora bacana
hemabantī mane cintā na kara tohora | 290 |
āmbhe munimāne jāṇu sakaḷa ye kathā
āmbhe yāhā debā tumbhe jhia hāthe thiba dei
ẏe jaḍi saṅge thile pheru na ṭekibe ahi | 293 |
ẏete kahi muni kaḷi dhokaḍi pheile
ẏeka jaḍi khaṇḍiẏe ye hāthare ghenile | 295 |
boile go hemabantī ẏe khaṇḍi rakhithibu
jhia bedīki galābeḷe tāhāra hāthe debu | 296 |
lakṣmī nārāẏaṇa caraṇe śaraṇa muhiṁ sāroḷa dāsa | 298 |
ẏe bibhā sabhāre lajjā ye pāile paśupati | 299 |
lakṣeka śiṣya gheni aile lomaṇa gāṅgabe
jaḍiguṇa āna tāhā kehi na jāṇi | 314 |
ẏethi anantare tu ho śuṇa dibyarasa
rahi nuāranti tahīṁ puṇa sustha hoi | 321 |
tahūṁ ulagna hoi hara bedīre basile | 323 |
gaha gaha śabade ye huḷahuḷi dei
nārade hasi nācanti bīṇā dhari kara
dūru dekhile ulagna hoi hara basichanti se sabhāra | 327 |
saṁkuce basile hara bahuta lajjā pāi | 328 |
kāhāra dehe buddhi na rahai hasare
tinipure ẏe bhabiṣya dekhila nāhiṁ ta | 333 |
jhia karamare ta ẏehi daśā thilā
bhitara puraku se gale bega hoi | 336 |
lāja teji basra aḷaṁkāramāna se pinddhale | 339 |
gaha gaha huḷahuḷi sarba bāmā dei
barakanyā śītaḷatuṇḍi kale se ye tahuṁ | 347 |
karpūra pāna biḍiā samasta ye pāi
santoṣa hoile ye sarba debe tahṁ | 350 |
ẏekā mātra pabana debatā na bhmañjile
jaga muṇḍa dekhiṇa pārbatī bhaẏe kari | 356 |
baḍa bhaẏe kale ye pābongtī tāṁku dekhi | 358 |
kārttikara bāhāna ye maẏura goti hoi | 359 |
maẏura bāḍire phula phaḷa na rakhiba | 360 |
ẏe mūṣika goṭi lugā bhitareṇa paśi
khaṇḍi khaṇḍi kariṇa ye kāṭiba niśeṣi | 361 |
ki buddhi karibi mote buddhi diśu nāhiṁ
ākhi pichāḍi nuāranti pārbatī ye dekhi | 365 |
mane bichārile muṁ ki buddhi karibi
ẏe bhabiṣya dekhi deha kemante dharibi | 366 |
beni naẏanaru nīra bahai ghana ghana | 367 |
jaẏa jaẏa pārbatī tu harara gharaṇī
jaẏa jaẏa pārbatī go saṁsāra rakṣākara | 372 |
tohoreṇa debe svarge rakṣā hebe puṇi
jaẏa jaẏa durgā māgo durgati tāreṇī | 373 |
manuṣya janmare ke jāṇima to sīmā | 374 |
naẏanu loteka māgo na pakāa tuhi | 375 |
ẏe naẏana jaḷare ye svarga ācchādiba
tusti śuṇi pārbatī ye tereche chāhiṁle
tāhā dekhi pārbatī ye hoile kātara | 378 |
puṇi brahmāṁka upare dr̥ṣṭi paḍilaka yāi
sthira kari pārbatī ye nirekhiṇa chāhiṁ | 379 |
svargare ta ẏe bhabiṣya achai boile | 381 |
ẏehā śuṇi baibasuta manu ānanda hoile
bho agasti muni mote kala ye kāraṇa
tumbha mukhuṁ śuṇili hara pārbatīṁka bibhā puṇa | 386 |
ẏe bibhā carita śuṇi mo śarīra ullāsa
padmapāde śaraṇa muṁ śūdramuni sāroḷa dāsa | 387 | 13357 |
lg.head: madhyaparbara pariśiṣṭa
kuntī gāndhārīṅga kaḷi
lg.l: badanti agasti śuṇa ho manu nr̥pati
kisa arthe kaḷi hoilā kaha ho muni moe | 2 |
śuṇa ho manurāẏe bhāgīrathī nāme gaṅgākūḷe
nīḷa utpaḷa nāme ye pabongtara taḷe | 3 |
birājeśvara boli tahīṁ bijaẏe deba kāśī
pratakṣe bara diai ye yāhā mane bāñcchai | 5 |
indrapraśastha rājya teji nityeheṁ āsanti kointī
se birājeśvara debatānta āsi pūjā karai niti | 6 |
praharaka rātra thāuṁ se pūjābidhi karma sāri
nitiprati kointā pūjābidhi sāri bhakti māni | 8 |
lg.note: śrīhaste bara diai ye yāhā mane bāñcchai | (ja, gha)
śukaḷa barṇṇa campāpuṣya śategoṭi gheni | (ḍha, gha, ṅa, kha, ṭha, da)

lg.l: manara harase se caḷanti nija pure | 10 |
kointāṁka pūjā ta gāndhārī na jāṇanti
gāndhārīṁka pūjā na jāṇanti debī kontī | 11 |
debatā pūjāku upahāramāna gheni dāsīmāne achanti saṅgata | 14 |
deuḷa bhitare prabeśa hoile gāndhāra dohitī | 15 |
rājyara bhoge gariṣṭha se driyodhanara māta
liṅga pūjā dekhiṇa se hoanti prajvaḷita | 16 |
mohora ṭhāru gariṣṭhi ke jambodvīpa bhāge | 17 |
pratakṣe pūjā karai se sulabha kāminī | 18 |
jambodīpa madhye putra mora ẏekāṅga catrabratī hoi | 20 |
tāhāṁkara caraṇe sebā muṁ karai aharniśi | 21 |
lg.note: pratakṣe pūjā karai muhiṁ sulabha kāmenī | (ṭha, gha, ja, ṭa, da)

lg.l: bhr̥tya pūjā dekhi mora śarīra bikaḷī | 22 |
mohora bhagati bhāṅgi ke karai sebā
liṅga pūjā kale saptadīpe hoi rājā | 23 |
ẏesaneka boli bāndhārī gale hastinā nabara | 24 |
biṣmaẏa hoi hastinā pure bijaẏe gāndhārī
sannidhye rāi driyodhanaku āgyāṁ dleka hakāri | 25 |
bābu birājeśvara liṅga āmbhe pūjā karuṁ niti
se liṅga pujākale hoi sapata dīpe nr̥pati | 26 |
bibidha barṇṇa kari campā sahasre kusuma
kanaka campa pūji ke āsai debasthāne | 28 |
teṇu kari bismaẏe bābu mohora pañchumati
tuhi ye mora putra ẏekāṅga rājana
tohora prasāde bābu mohora sabong śubhamāna | 30 |
ẏekā kāśīpati prasanne muṁ māgibi sadagati
ẏe īśvara prasāde tumbhe ye ẏekāṅga catrabratī | 31 |
ẏehā bichāri mote kaha boile rājamāta | 32 |
ẏehā śuṇi driyodhaan boila mātā go na jāṇa ki ẏesana
pāṇḍabaṁkara jananī ẏe śibaṁku pūjā karai pratidina | 33 |
rāta prahareka thāuṁ pūjā karai debī kontī
nānā barṇṇe campā gaicha dudurā gheni niti | 34 |
lg.note: ānajana pūjā dekhi mora śarīra bikaḷi | (ja, ḍa)
lg.l: tāhāṁkara pūjāku tumbhe yebe abhimāna kara
abhimā na sahibaṭi māta go samaste chāḍibā śarīra | 35 |
gāndhārīṁka agrate kahanti mānagobinda nr̥pa catrabratī
subarṇṇara lakṣe campāre tumbhe pūjākara niti | 36 |
aḷapa dina rājya aṭanti sina pāṇḍabaṁkara
kisa acchi tāhāṁkara kaṇaẏa dhanaratna bhaṇḍāra | 37 |
nityeheṁ subarṇṇa campā bhiāi pāribeṭi ki kontī
āreka dine pūjā kari aile debī kontī
subarṇṇara campa dekhi bismaẏa tāṁkara ye mati | 41 |
āradine subarṇṇa campā gheni kointāẏe aile | 42 |
prabhāta kāḷe kointāẏe pūjā karanti begi begi | 43 |
muhiṁ se liṅga pujibāku aṭai bhājana | 46 |
tu se pūjā mohora bhāṅgukinā yugate
ẏete boli kope se bolai kointe | 47 |
kointāẏe boile go pūjai muhiṁ niti
tumbhe kimpe ẏebe go bolucha anīti | 49 |
gāndhārī boile liṅga mohora se pūjā
tu se niti pūjā go bhāṅguchu mohora | 51 |
ubhā hoiṇa madhye se ye boile deba hara
duheṁ śuṇa ho tumbhe āmbhara uttara | 53 |
ki nimante duheṁ tumbhe hoa anyoanyi
kuru pāṇḍabaṁkara aṭā tumbhe go jananī | 54 |
ājuṁ āsi mohora pūjā se bhāñjilā
ki nimante āsi mo laṅga pūjākalā | 56 |
ẏebe tumbhe māẏe go mohora bole caḷa | 57 |
kāli prabhāte yehu sahasre campā gheni
āja yāa tumbhe duheṁ noha bimukha citte | 59 |
sahasre subarṇṇa campā gheni ye āge pūjā kari
yathāarthe liṅga se ye hoiba tāhāri | 61 |
ẏete boli kopa kale gāndhārī rājamāte | 62 |
yujheṣṭhi pachāranti māẏe go kimpāiṁ bkr̥ta mati
mote ki sakhya ye aṭai sehu kathā
subarṇṇa sahasreka campā gheni ye pūjiba prātakāḷe | 70 |
tāhāra se suphaḷa hoiba pūjāra bidhāne
ẏesanaka pratagyāṁ bābu gāndhārī kale mane | 71 |
ẏe chāra kathāku kimpe bismaẏe tumbhara ye mana | 72 |
bābu subarṇṇara campā gheni karibe liṅga pūjā
daśa daśa dile subarṇṇa campa sahasreka sari | 75 |
āmbhe duijaṇa gāḍha pratagyāṁ ye kalu
sahasreka campā dei āge ye kariba pūjā
muṁ kisa karibi boli boile putraṁkara āge | 78 |
tumbhe putra śūrabanta karibi muṁ kisa
abaśya kāli gāndhārī ghenima mora yaśa | 79 |
sabonge pāñchagoṭi putra muṁ pāñchoṭi campa pāibi kāḷi | 80 |
kāhūṁ ẏete campā ẏehu debe muṁ bhāḷai
ẏete kahiṇa debī ye trandana karai | 81 |
mātāṁka bikaḷa dekhi pārtha mane bhāḷi
arjuna boile muṇohi kara tu go māẏe
yemante manabāñcchā kāli pūriba karibi sañchaẏe | 83 |
kāli prabhātuṁ pūjāku yāa āgo āī
mana udabege ye nidrā na māḍai beni netre | 86 |
īśvaraṁka pūjā nimante gale pāṇḍaba garbhadhārī | 87 |
laẏe kari arjuna pūjāra beḷa jāṇi
bāmakare bīra arjuna gāṇḍima dhanudhari ṭāṇi | 89 |
asraku tiāri bolai caḷa tu turita | 90 |
indra debatāṁkara bhaṇḍāra ye kubera debatā tahiṁ
manabhedī paḍilā ye indra āge yāi | 93 |
kuberaku ḍāki āgyāṁ dile ye turita | 94 |
āho kubera āmbhara bola tumbhe kara

subarṇṇa campāre ye deuḷa aṭ{??}āḷi diśunāhiṁ
tu ye pucchākalu ho manu mahārājā
santhaātmā jananta samaste karanti ye pūjā | 106 |
citta laẏekari śuṇa baibasuta manu śrotā | 108 |
yemanta dāna dei temanta phaḷa pāi
dakṣaṇā na dile phaḷa kebeheṁ nuhai | 112 |
sāroḷa dāsa kabi boile phaḷaśr̥ti gheni | 113 |
